 181+ 9A16
 182+ 9A16 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 9A3E              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 9A3E 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 9A46 FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 9A4A EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 9A4E              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 9A4E              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 9A4E              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 9A4E 25 9A 26 9A  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 9A52 27 9A 28 9A
 189+ 9A56 30 9A
 190+ 9A58 2F 9A 20 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 9A5C 1B 9A 21 9A
 190+ 9A60 1C 9A
 191+ 9A62 39 9A 24 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 9A66 1E 9A 23 9A
 191+ 9A6A 22 9A
 192+ 9A6C 32 9A 16 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 9A70 3C 9A 38 9A
 192+ 9A74 37 9A
 193+ 9A76 1F 9A 35 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 193+ 9A7A 3D 9A 1A 9A
 193+ 9A7E 19 9A
 194+ 9A80 29 9A 2E 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 194+ 9A84 2D 9A 2C 9A
 194+ 9A88 2B 9A
 195+ 9A8A 17 9A 30 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 195+ 9A8E 3D 9A 35 9A
 195+ 9A92 1D 9A
 196+ 9A94 33 9A 2A 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 196+ 9A98 20 9A 1B 9A
 196+ 9A9C 1E 9A
 197+ 9A9E 33 9A 3C 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_PressedYes   ,Keys+KeyCode_PressedNo
 198+ 9AA2
 199+ 9AA2 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 199+ 9AA6 56
 200+ 9AA7 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 200+ 9AAB 47
 201+ 9AAC 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 201+ 9AB0 54
 202+ 9AB1 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 202+ 9AB5 35
 203+ 9AB6 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 203+ 9ABA 36
 204+ 9ABB 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 204+ 9ABF 59
 205+ 9AC0 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 205+ 9AC4 48
 206+ 9AC5 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 206+ 9AC9 42
 207+ 9ACA
 208+ 9ACA              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 9ACA              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 225+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 226+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 227+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 228+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 229+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 230+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 246+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 247+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 248+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 249+ 9ACA              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 250+ 9ACA
 251+ 9ACA
 252+ 9ACA              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 9ACA ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 9ACA ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 9ACA ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 9ACA                                      ENDM
 257+ 9ACA
 258+ 9ACA 21 16 9A     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 9ACD 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 9AD0 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 9AD2 CD CC 99                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 9AD5 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 9AD6
 264+ 9AD6
 265+ 9AD6
 266+ 9AD6 DD 21 3E 9A  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 9ADA 21 46 9A                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 9ADD 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 9ADF 11 16 9A                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 9AE2 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 9AE3 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 9AE5 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 9AE8 DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 9AEA 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 9AEB 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 9AED 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 9AEE CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 9AF0 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 9AF2 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 9AF4                                      ZeroA
 280+ 9AF4 AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 9AF5 C3 02 9B                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 9AF8 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 9AFA FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 9AFC 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 9AFD FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 9AFF 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 9B01 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 9B02 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 9B03 FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 9B05 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 9B06 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 9B08 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 9B09 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 9B0B C9                                   ret
 295+ 9B0C
 296+ 9B0C
 297+ 9B0C
 298+ 9B0C              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 9B0C ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 9B0C ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9B0C                                      ENDM
 305+ 9B0C
 306+ 9B0C              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 9B0C ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 9B0C ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 9B0C ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 9B0C                                      ENDM
 314+ 9B0C
 315+ 9B0C
 316+ 9B0C              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 317+ 9B0C              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 318+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code
 319+ 9B0C              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 320+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 321+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 322+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 323+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 324+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 325+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 326+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        rra
 327+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 328+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 329+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 330+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 331+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 332+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 333+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 334+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 335+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 336+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 337+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 338+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 339+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 340+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 341+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 342+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ret
 343+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 344+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 345+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 346+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 347+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 348+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code
 359+ 9B0C              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 360+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 361+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 362+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 363+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 364+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 365+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 368+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ret
 369+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 370+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 371+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 372+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 373+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ret
 374+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 375+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 376+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 377+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 378+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code                        ret
 379+ 9B0C              ;;old debug code
 380+ 9B0C
 381+ 9B0C
 382+ 9B0C              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 9B0C              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 9B0C              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 400+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 401+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 402+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 403+ 9B0C              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 9B0C
 405+ 9B0C              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 9B0C              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 9B0C 21 4E 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 9B0F ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 9B11 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 9B12 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 9B13 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 9B14 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 9B15 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 9B16 C9                                   ret
 409+ 9B17
 410+ 9B17              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 9B17              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 9B17 21 4E 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 9B1A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 9B1C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 9B1D 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 9B1E 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 9B1F 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 9B20 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 9B22 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 9B23 C9                                   ret
 415+ 9B24
 416+ 9B24              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 9B24 21 4E 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 9B27 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 9B29 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 9B2A 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 9B2B 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 9B2C 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 9B2D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 9B2E FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 9B30 C9                                   ret
 420+ 9B31
 421+ 9B31              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 9B31              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 9B31 21 4E 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 9B34 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 9B36 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 9B37 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 9B38 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 9B39 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 9B3A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 9B3B FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 9B3D C9                                   ret
 426+ 9B3E
 427+ 9B3E              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 9B3E              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 9B3E 21 4E 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 9B41 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 9B43 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 9B44 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 9B45 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 9B46 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 9B47 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 9B48 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 9B4A C9                                   ret
 432+ 9B4B
 433+ 9B4B              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 9B4B 21 16 9A     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 9B4E 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 9B51 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 9B53 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 9B55 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 9B57                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 9B57 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 9B59 C9                                   ret
 441+ 9B5A 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 9B5C 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 9B5D C9                                   ret
 444+ 9B5E
 445+ 9B5E 21 16 9A     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 9B61 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 9B63 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 9B65 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 9B66 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 9B68 C2 72 9B                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 9B6B 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 9B6C 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 9B6D 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 9B6F                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 9B6F 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 9B71 C9                                   ret
 456+ 9B72 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 9B73 C9                                   ret
 458+ 9B74
 459+ 9B74
 460+ 9B74 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 461+ 9B92 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 462+ 9B93 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 463+ 9B94 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 464+ 9B95 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 465+ 9B96              InputLimit              EQU 20
 466+ 9B96
 467+ 9B96 21 74 9B     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 468+ 9B99 3A 93 9B                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 469+ 9B9C FE 00                                    cp      0
 470+ 9B9E 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 471+ 9BA0 4F                                       ld      c,a
 472+ 9BA1 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 473+ 9BA3 ED B0                                    ldir
 474+ 9BA5 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 475+ 9BA7 12                                       ld      (de),a
 476+ 9BA8 C9                                       ret
 477+ 9BA9
 478+ 9BA9 AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 479+ 9BAA 32 93 9B                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9BAD                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 480+ 9BAD 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 480+ 9BAF 32 94 9B    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 481+ 9BB2                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 481+ 9BB2 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 481+ 9BB4 32 95 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 482+ 9BB7 21 74 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 483+ 9BBA 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 484+ 9BBC 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 485+ 9BBD 23                                   inc     hl
 486+ 9BBE 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 487+ 9BC0 C9                                   ret
 488+ 9BC1
 489+ 9BC1              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 489+ 9BC1 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 489+ 9BC3 32 95 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 490+ 9BC6 CD 4B 9B                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 491+ 9BC9 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 492+ 9BCB C8                                   ret     z
 493+ 9BCC 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 494+ 9BCD 3A 93 9B                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 495+ 9BD0 FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 496+ 9BD2 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 497+ 9BD4 21 A2 9A                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 498+ 9BD7 79                                   ld      a,c
 499+ 9BD8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 500+ 9BDA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 9BDB FE 41                                cp      "A"
 502+ 9BDD 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 503+ 9BDF              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 504+ 9BDF FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 505+ 9BE1 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 506+ 9BE3 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 507+ 9BE5 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 508+ 9BE7 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 509+ 9BE9 C9                                   ret
 510+ 9BEA 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 511+ 9BEB 3A 93 9B                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 512+ 9BEE 4F                                   ld      c,a
 513+ 9BEF 21 74 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 514+ 9BF2 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 515+ 9BF4 78                                   ld      a,b
 516+ 9BF5 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 517+ 9BF6 79                                   ld      a,c
 518+ 9BF7 21 93 9B                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 519+ 9BFA 34                                   inc     (hl)
 520+ 9BFB                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 520+ 9BFB AF          >                        xor     a
 520+ 9BFC 32 95 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 521+ 9BFF C9                                   ret
 522+ 9C00 3A 93 9B     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 523+ 9C03 21 74 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 524+ 9C06 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 525+ 9C08                                      ZeroA
 525+ 9C08 AF          >                        xor a
 526+ 9C09 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 527+ 9C0A                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 527+ 9C0A AF          >                        xor     a
 527+ 9C0B 32 94 9B    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 528+ 9C0E                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 528+ 9C0E AF          >                        xor     a
 528+ 9C0F 32 95 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 529+ 9C12 CD CA 9A                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 530+ 9C15 C9                                   ret
 531+ 9C16 3A 93 9B     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 532+ 9C19 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 533+ 9C1B C8                                   ret     z
 534+ 9C1C 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 535+ 9C1D 32 93 9B                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 536+ 9C20 21 74 9B                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 537+ 9C23 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 538+ 9C25                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 538+ 9C25 AF          >                        xor a
 539+ 9C26 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 540+ 9C27                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 540+ 9C27 AF          >                        xor     a
 540+ 9C28 32 95 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 541+ 9C2B C9                                   ret
 542+ 9C2C
 543+ 9C2C              TargetMissileTest:      JumpIfMemZero NbrMissiles,      .ClearTargetting
 543+ 9C2C 3A 71 9E    >                        ld  a,(NbrMissiles)
 543+ 9C2F A7          >                        and a
 543+ 9C30 CA 47 9C    >                        jp  z,.ClearTargetting
 544+ 9C33 3A 06 A1                             ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; if we are comitted to launch
 545+ 9C36 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                         ; then don't scan
 546+ 9C38 C8                                   ret     z                           ; as it will be cleared on launch
 547+ 9C39 3E 16        .ScanForKey:            ld      a,c_Pressed_TargetMissle    ; if not pressed we are done
 548+ 9C3B CD 31 9B                             call    is_key_pressed              ; .
 549+ 9C3E C0                                   ret     nz                          ; .
 550+ 9C3F 3A 06 A1     .TargetPressed:         ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; get flag back
 551+ 9C42                                      JumpIfAEqNusng StageMissileNoTarget, .SetTargetting
 551+ 9C42 FE FF       >                        cp     StageMissileNoTarget
 551+ 9C44 CA 4D 9C    >                        jp      z,.SetTargetting
 552+ 9C47              .ClearTargetting:       SetMemToN   MissileTargettingFlag, StageMissileNoTarget
 552+ 9C47 3E FF       >                        ld      a,StageMissileNoTarget
 552+ 9C49 32 06 A1    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 553+ 9C4C C9                                   ret
 554+ 9C4D              .SetTargetting:         SetMemToN   MissileTargettingFlag, StageMissileTargeting
 554+ 9C4D 3E FE       >                        ld      a,StageMissileTargeting
 554+ 9C4F 32 06 A1    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 555+ 9C52 C9                                   ret
 556+ 9C53
 557+ 9C53 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 558+ 9C54 32 F2 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 559+ 9C57 3A 11 9E                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 560+ 9C5A E6 FC                                and     $FC
 561+ 9C5C 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 562+ 9C5E 2A 5C 9A     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 563+ 9C61 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 564+ 9C62                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey

 573+ 9C7C F6 40                                or      $40
 574+ 9C7E 32 F2 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a

 133+ 9CE9              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 134+ 9CE9              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa

 136+ 9CE9              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders

 324+ 9F18 00           FlashToggle				DB  0				; 03CA \ FLH \ flash toggle

 326+ 9F1A 00           JoystickToggle			DB	0				; 03CD  \ JSTK    \ K toggle keyboard/joystick
 327+ 9F1B 00           DigitalJoystick			DB	0				; 03CE \ JDB   \ . = toggle between keyboard and bitpaddle
 328+ 9F1C 00           DiskReadFailFlag		DB	0				; 03CF \ CATF \ Disk catalog fail flag
 329+ 9F1D
 330+ 9F1D              ; Working Data
 331+ 9F1D
 332+ 9F1D              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 333+ 9F1D              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 334+ 9F1D              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 335+ 9F1D              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 336+ 9F1D              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 337+ 9F1D              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 338+ 9F1D              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 339+ 9F1D              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 340+ 9F1D              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 341+ 9F1D              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 342+ 9F1D              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 343+ 9F1D              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 344+ 9F1D              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 345+ 9F1D              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 346+ 9F1D
 347+ 9F1D
 348+ 9F1D
 349+ 9F1D              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save
 350+ 9F1D              ; Now MissionData VarTP					DB	0				; 0358 TP? The Plan  \ mission uses lower 4 bits
 351+ 9F1D              											; Bit mask XXXX10XX - Thargoid plan mission
 352+ 9F1D

 389+ A104 00           CompassX				DB	0				; 03A8
 390+ A105 00           CompassY				DB	0				; 03A9
 391+ A106              ; Simplification of missile targetting
 392+ A106              ; $FF no missile targettting enabled
 393+ A106              ; $FE missile targetting, no target selected
 394+ A106              ; bit 7 set then tagetting and lower nibble holds missile target and launching
 395+ A106              ; bit 7 clear launch at selected target in lower nibble
 396+ A106 00           MissileTargettingFlag   DB  0
 397+ A107              ;;MissileTarget			DB  0				; 45
 398+ A107              ;;MissileLaunchFlag       DB  0

 401+ A117 00           BadnessStatus           DB  0
 402+ A118              ;note rapidly changing views could reset these so need to consider it in an array
 403+ A118              ; LaserType
 404+ A118              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
 405+ A118              ; LaserPulsePause                         ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
 406+ A118              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0
 407+ A118              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
 408+ A118              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
 409+ A118              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
 410+ A118              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
 411+ A118              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
 412+ A118              ; LaserInMarkets                          ; can this laser be purchased 0 = yes 1 = no
 413+ A118              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from
 414+ A118              ; need to add copy table routines

 116+ A2B1
 117+ A2B1              ; sets carry to true if target
 118+ A2B1 3A 06 A1     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 119+ A2B4 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 120+ A2B6 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 121+ A2B8 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 122+ A2BA CA BF A2                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 123+ A2BD                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 123+ A2BD B7          >                        or a
 124+ A2BE C9                                   ret
 125+ A2BF              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 125+ A2BF 21 D7 9E    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 125+ A2C2 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 125+ A2C4 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 125+ A2C5 3C          >                        inc     a
 125+ A2C6 CA CC A2    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 125+ A2C9 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 126+ A2CA                                      SetCarryFlag
 126+ A2CA 37          >                        scf
 127+ A2CB C9                                   ret
 128+ A2CC 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNoTarget     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 129+ A2CE 32 06 A1                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 130+ A2D1 C9                                   ret
 131+ A2D2
 132+ A2D2              SetMissileTargetting:   MACRO
 133+ A2D2 ~                                    SetMemTrue MissileTargettingFlag
 134+ A2D2                                      ENDM
 135+ A2D2
 136+ A2D2              ClearMissileTargetting: MACRO
 137+ A2D2 ~                                    SetMemTrue MissileTargettingFlag
 138+ A2D2                                      ENDM
 139+ A2D2
# file closed: ./Variables/general_variablesRoutines.asm

   1+ A2D2              ; Note this code is core code and can not be in a memory bank unless do explosion code is changed too
   2+ A2D2 AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   3+ A2D3 21 D7 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
   4+ A2D6 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize ; prbably not needed + UniverseSlotTypeSize
   5+ A2D8 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   6+ A2D9 23                                   inc     hl
   7+ A2DA 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   8+ A2DC C9                                   ret
   9+ A2DD
  10+ A2DD              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  11+ A2DD              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  12+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  13+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  14+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  15+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize
  16+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  17+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         cp      $FF
  18+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         jr      z,.SkipSlot
  19+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  20+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  21+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      (hl),1
  22+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  23+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  24+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK .SkipSlot               inc     de
  25+ A2DD              ; DOE NOT WORK                         djnz    .fillLoop
  26+ A2DD C9                                   ret
  27+ A2DE              ; Wipe all items
  28+ A2DE 3E FF        ClearUnivSlotList:      ld      a,$FF
  29+ A2E0 21 D7 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  30+ A2E3 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  31+ A2E5 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a

  33+ A2E7 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
  34+ A2E9 C9                                   ret

  52+ A303              ; Clears all except slot A, used when say restarting a space station post launch
  53+ A303 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  54+ A304 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  55+ A306 21 D7 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  56+ A309 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2

  60+ A30F 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  61+ A311 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  63+ A313 23                                   inc     hl
  64+ A314 10 F5                                djnz    .fillLoop
  65+ A316 C9                                   ret
  66+ A317

  71+ A320 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  72+ A322 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  73+ A324 C9                                   ret

  75+ A325

 646  A3A2                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ A3A2              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ A3A2              doRND2:
   3+ A3A2 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ A3A3              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ A3A3              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ A3A3              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ A3A3              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ A3A3 3A F9 9C                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ A3A6 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ A3A8 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ A3A9 21 FB 9C     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ A3AC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ A3AD 32 F9 9C     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ A3B0 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ A3B1 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ A3B2 32 FB 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ A3B5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ A3B6 3A FA 9C                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ A3B9 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ A3BA 21 FC 9C     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ A3BD 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ A3BE 32 FA 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ A3C1 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ A3C2 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ A3C3 32 FC 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ A3C6 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ A3C7                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ A3C7 C9                                   ret
  29+ A3C8
  30+ A3C8 21 F9 9C     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ A3CB 11 FD 9C                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ A3CE 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ A3D1 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ A3D3 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ A3D5 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ A3D7 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ A3D9 C9                                   ret
  38+ A3DA
  39+ A3DA 21 FD 9C     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ A3DD 11 F9 9C                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ A3E0 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ A3E3 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ A3E5 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ A3E7 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ A3E9 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ A3EB C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ A3EC 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ A3F0 58 59 53 45
   1+ A3F4 45 44
   2+ A3F6 21 08 9F     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ A3F9 11 F2 9D                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ A3FC ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ A3FE ED A0                                ldi
   6+ A400 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ A402 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ A404 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ A406 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ A408 C9                                   ret
  11+ A409
  12+ A409 21 F2 9D     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ A40C 11 08 9F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ A40F 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ A411
  16+ A411 21 08 9F     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ A414 11 FC 9E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ A417 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ A419
  20+ A419 21 FC 9E     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ A41C 11 08 9F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ A41F 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ A421
  24+ A421 21 FC 9E     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ A424 11 F2 9D                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ A427 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ A429
  28+ A429 21 F2 9D     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ A42C 11 FC 9E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ A42F 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ A431
  32+ A431              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ A431 CD 34 A4     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ A434              .NextStep:
  35+ A434 CD 37 A4     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ A437              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ A437 3A F2 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ A43A B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ A43B 21 F4 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ A43E 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ A43F 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ A440 3A F3 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ A443 21 F5 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ A446 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ A447 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ A448 3A F4 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ A44B 32 F2 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ A44E 3A F5 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ A451 32 F3 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ A454 3A F7 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ A457 32 F5 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ A45A 3A F6 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ A45D 32 F4 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ A460 B7           		or		a
  55+ A461 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ A462 21 F4 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ A465 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ A466 32 F6 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ A469 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ A46A 21 F5 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ A46D 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ A46E 32 F7 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ A471 C9           		ret
  64+ A472
  65+ A472              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ A472 CD 75 A4     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ A475              .NextStep:
  68+ A475 CD 78 A4     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ A478              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ A478              ; x = a + c
  71+ A478 3A FC 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ A47B B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ A47C 21 FE 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ A47F 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ A480 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ A481              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ A481 3A FD 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ A484 21 FF 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ A487 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ A488 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ A489 3A FE 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ A48C 32 FC 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ A48F 3A FF 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ A492 32 FD 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ A495 3A 01 9F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ A498 32 FF 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ A49B 3A 00 9F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ A49E 32 FE 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ A4A1 B7           		or		a
  90+ A4A2 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ A4A3 21 FE 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ A4A6 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ A4A7 32 00 9F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ A4AA 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ A4AB 21 FF 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ A4AE 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ A4AF 32 01 9F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ A4B2 C9           		ret
  99+ A4B3
 100+ A4B3 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ A4B4 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ A4B5 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ A4B6
 104+ A4B6 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ A4B7 32 0B 9E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ A4BA 3A F3 9D     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ A4BD 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ A4BE 3A 0F 9F     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ A4C1 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ A4C2 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ A4C3 90                                   sub		b
 112+ A4C4 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ A4C6 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ A4C8 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ A4CA 32 B5 A4     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ A4CD ED 5B B3 A4                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ A4D1 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ A4D2 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ A4D4 3A F5 9D     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ A4D7 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ A4D8 3A 0E 9F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ A4DB 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ A4DC 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ A4DD 90                                   sub		b
 125+ A4DE CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ A4E0 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ A4E2 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ A4E4 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ A4E5 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ A4E6 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ A4E8 3A B5 A4     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ A4EB 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ A4EC ED 43 B3 A4                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ A4F0 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ A4F1 CD 29 A4                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ A4F4 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ A4F5 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ A4F6 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ A4F7 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ A4F8 CD 31 A4     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ A4FB 3A 0B 9E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ A4FE 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ A4FF FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ A501 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ A502 32 0B 9E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ A505 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ A507
 148+ A507              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ A507 3A FD 9E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ A50A E6 07        		and		7
 151+ A50C 32 90 9E     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ A50F 3A FE 9E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ A512 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ A514 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ A516 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ A518 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ A51A E6 07        		and		7
 158+ A51C 32 91 9E     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ A51F CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ A521 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ A523 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ A525              .Fedual:
 163+ A525 3A 90 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ A528 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ A52A 32 90 9E     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ A52D              .CanBeRich:
 167+ A52D 3A 90 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ A530 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ A532 32 92 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ A535 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ A536 3A FF 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ A539 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ A53B 80           		add		a,b
 174+ A53C 32 92 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ A53F 3A 91 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ A542 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ A544 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ A545 3A 92 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ A548 80           		add		a,b
 180+ A549 32 92 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ A54C CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ A54E CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ A550 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ A551 3A 90 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ A554 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ A555 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ A556 3A 91 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ A559 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ A55A 32 93 9E     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ A55D 3A 90 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ A560 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ A562 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ A564 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ A565 3A 91 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ A568 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ A56A 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ A56B ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ A56D 3A 93 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ A570 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ A571 ED 30        		mul
 201+ A573 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ A575 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ A577 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ A579 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ A57B CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ A57D CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ A57F ED 53 95 9E  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ A583              .DoRadius:
 209+ A583 3A FF 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ A586 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ A587 3A 01 9F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ A58A E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ A58C C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ A58E 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ A58F ED 43 99 9E  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ A593 C9           		ret
 217+ A594
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  37+ A6DA
  38+ A6DA              getTableText:
  39+ A6DA              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ A6DA              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ A6DA D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ A6DB ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ A6DD ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ A6DF 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ A6E0 23           	inc		hl
  46+ A6E1 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ A6E2 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ A6E3 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ A6E4 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ A6E5
  51+ A6E5
  52+ A6E5              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ A6E5              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ A6E5              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ A6E5              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ A6E5              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ A6E5              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ A6E5              getRankIndex:
  59+ A6E5              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ A6E5              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ A6E5 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ A6E6 B3           	or		e
  63+ A6E7 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ A6E9 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ A6EA AF           	xor 	a
  66+ A6EB 21 39 A6     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ A6EE              .testLoop:
  68+ A6EE 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ A6EF 23           	inc		hl
  70+ A6F0 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ A6F1 E5           	push	hl
  72+ A6F2 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ A6F3 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ A6F4 CD 80 B3     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ A6F7 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ A6F9              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ A6F9 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ A6FA 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ A6FB 23           	inc		hl
  80+ A6FC 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ A6FD 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ A6FF              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ A6FF E1           	pop		hl
  84+ A700 C9           	ret
  85+ A701
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 177+ AB82
 178+ AB82              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ AB82              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ AB82
 181+ AB82              CapitaliseString:
 182+ AB82              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ AB82              .CapLoop:
 184+ AB82 23           	inc		hl
 185+ AB83 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ AB84 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ AB86 C8           	ret		z
 188+ AB87 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ AB89 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ AB8B FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ AB8D 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ AB8F              .LowerCase:
 193+ AB8F C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ AB91 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ AB92 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ AB94
 197+ AB94              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ AB94 21 05 AA     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ AB97 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ AB99 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ AB9B D5           	push	de
 202+ AB9C 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ AB9D 23           	inc		hl
 204+ AB9E 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ AB9F EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ ABA0 D1           	pop		de
 207+ ABA1 C9           	ret
 208+ ABA2
 209+ ABA2
 210+ ABA2              expandTokenToString:
 211+ ABA2              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ ABA2 21 2B AB     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ ABA5 CD DA A6     	call	getTableText
 214+ ABA8 11 61 AB     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ ABAB              .ReadLoop:
 216+ ABAB 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ ABAC FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ ABAE 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ ABB0 E5           	push	hl
 220+ ABB1 D5           	push	de
 221+ ABB2 21 05 AA     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ ABB5 CD DA A6     	call	getTableText
 223+ ABB8 D1           	pop		de
 224+ ABB9              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ ABB9 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ ABBA FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ ABBC 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ ABBE              ;.GetChar:
 229+ ABBE 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ ABBF 13           	inc		de
 231+ ABC0 23           	inc		hl
 232+ ABC1 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ ABC3              .AddSpace:
 234+ ABC3 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ ABC5 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ ABC6 13           	inc		de
 237+ ABC7 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ ABC8 23           	inc		hl
 239+ ABC9 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ ABCB              .ReadDone:
 241+ ABCB 1B           	dec		de
 242+ ABCC AF           	xor		a
 243+ ABCD 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ ABCE C9           	ret
 245+ ABCF

  12+ AC48              NamingLoop:
  13+ AC48 3A 01 9F     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ AC4B E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ AC4D FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ AC4F 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ AC51 C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ AC53 CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ AC55 21 CF AB     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ AC58 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ AC5A ED A0        	ldi
  22+ AC5C 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ AC5D FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ AC5F 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  25+ AC61              .AddExtra:
  26+ AC61 ED A0        	ldi
  27+ AC63              .SkipPhrase:
  28+ AC63 D5           	push	de
  29+ AC64 CD 78 A4     	call	working_seed
  30+ AC67 D1           	pop		de
  31+ AC68 C9           	ret

  86+ AC69              ;ExpandToken:
