  88+ AC69              ;	a = token
  89+ AC69              ;
  90+ AC69              ;PlanetDigram:
  91+ AC69              ;	cp		&A0							; >- 160
  92+ AC69              ;	jr		c,MorePage4
  93+ AC69              ;	and		$7F							; 128 to 159 now 0 to 31
  94+ AC69              ;	asl		2							; Multiply by 2
  95+ AC69              ;	ld		hl, name_digrams2
  96+ AC69              ;	add		hl,a
  97+ AC69              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  98+ AC69              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
  99+ AC69              ;	inc		hl
 100+ AC69              ;	ld		a,(hl)
 101+ AC69              ;	cp		'?'
 102+ AC69              ;	ret		z
 103+ AC69              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
 104+ AC69              ;	ret
 105+ AC69              ;MorePage4:
 106+ AC69              ;	sub		$A0
 107+ AC69              ;ExtraTokenCheck:
 108+ AC69              ;	push	de							; save target address
 109+ AC69              ;	push	bc
 110+ AC69              ;	ld		b,a
 111+ AC69              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ AC69              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ AC69              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ AC69              ;	ld
 115+ AC69              ;
 116+ AC69              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ AC69              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ AC69              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ AC69              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ AC69              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ AC69              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ AC69              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ AC69              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ AC69              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ AC69              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ AC69              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ AC69              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ AC69              ;
 129+ AC69              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ AC69              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ AC69              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ AC69              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ AC69              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ AC69              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ AC69              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ AC69              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ AC69              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ AC69              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ AC69              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ AC69              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ AC69              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ AC69              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ AC69              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ AC69              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ AC69              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ AC69              ;C8                      INY
 149+ AC69              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ AC69              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ AC69              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ AC69              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ AC69              ;98                      TYA
 156+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ AC69              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ AC69              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ AC69              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ AC69              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ AC69              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ AC69              ;68                      PLA
 165+ AC69              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ AC69              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ AC69              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ AC69              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ AC69              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ AC69              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ AC69              ;
 174+ AC69              ;
 175+ AC69              ;
 176+ AC69              ;
 177+ AC69              ;
 178+ AC69              ;
 179+ AC69              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ AC69              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ AC69              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ AC69              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ AC69              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ AC69              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ AC69              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ AC69              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ AC69              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ AC69              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ AC69              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ AC69              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ AC69              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ AC69              ;60                      RTS
 199+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ AC69              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ AC69              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ AC69              ;60                      RTS
 204+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ AC69              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ AC69              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ AC69              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ AC69              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ AC69              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ AC69              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ AC69              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ AC69              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ AC69              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ AC69              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ AC69              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ AC69              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ AC69              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ AC69              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ AC69              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ AC69              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ AC69              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ AC69              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ AC69              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ AC69              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ AC69              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ AC69              ;
 227+ AC69              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ AC69              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ AC69              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ AC69              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ AC69              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ AC69              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ AC69              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ AC69              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ AC69              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ AC69              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ AC69              ;
 239+ AC69              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ AC69              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ AC69              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ AC69              ;
 243+ AC69              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ AC69              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ AC69              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ AC69              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ AC69              ;
 248+ AC69              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ AC69              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ AC69              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ AC69              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ AC69              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ AC69              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ AC69              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ AC69              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ AC69              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ AC69              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ AC69              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ AC69              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ AC69              ;
 262+ AC69              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ AC69              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ AC69              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ AC69              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ AC69              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ AC69              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ AC69              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ AC69              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ AC69              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ AC69              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ AC69              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ AC69              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ AC69              ;
 275+ AC69              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ AC69              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ AC69              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ AC69              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ AC69              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ AC69              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ AC69              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ AC69              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ AC69              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ AC69              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ AC69              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ AC69              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ AC69              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ AC69              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ AC69              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ AC69              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ AC69              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ AC69              ;C8                      INY
 295+ AC69              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ AC69              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ AC69              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ AC69              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ AC69              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ AC69              ;98                      TYA
 302+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ AC69              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ AC69              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ AC69              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ AC69              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ AC69              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ AC69              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ AC69              ;68                      PLA
 311+ AC69              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ AC69              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ AC69              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ AC69              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ AC69              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ AC69              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ AC69              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ AC69              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ AC69              ;

   1+ AC69              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ AC69              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ AC69              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ AC69 78           AHLEquBHLaddCDE:        ld      a,b
   5+ AC6A A9                                   xor     c
   6+ AC6B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   7+ AC6D                                      JumpIfNegative   .OppositeSigns
   7+ AC6D FA 80 AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeSigns
   8+ AC70 DD 60        .SameSigns:             ld      ixh,b                      ; ixh = b
   9+ AC72                                      ClearSignBit b                      ; b = ABS b
   9+ AC72 78          >                        ld      a,b
   9+ AC73 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
   9+ AC75 47          >                        ld      b,a
  10+ AC76 19                                   add     hl,de                      ; hl = hl + de
  11+ AC77 78                                   ld      a,b                        ; a = b + c + carry
  12+ AC78 89                                   adc     c                          ;
  13+ AC79 47                                   ld      b,a                        ;
  14+ AC7A DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                      ;
  15+ AC7C                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ;
  15+ AC7C E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  16+ AC7E B0                                   or      b                          ;
  17+ AC7F C9                                   ret                                ;
  18+ AC80 DD 60        .OppositeSigns:         ld      ixh,b
  19+ AC82 DD 69                                ld      ixl,c
  20+ AC84                                      ClearSignBit c                      ; c = ABS C
  20+ AC84 79          >                        ld      a,c
  20+ AC85 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ AC87 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  21+ AC88 78                                   ld      a,b
  22+ AC89                                      ClearSignBitA
  22+ AC89 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  23+ AC8B 99                                   sbc     c
  24+ AC8C                                      JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  24+ AC8C FA 9B AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  25+ AC8F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  26+ AC91                                      JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  26+ AC91 FA 9B AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  27+ AC94 47                                   ld      b,a
  28+ AC95 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
  29+ AC97                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ;
  29+ AC97 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  30+ AC99 B0                                   or      b                          ;
  31+ AC9A C9                                   ret                                ;
  32+ AC9B EB           .OppositeCDEgtBHL:      ex      de,hl
  33+ AC9C 78                                   ld      a,b
  34+ AC9D 41                                   ld      b,c
  35+ AC9E 4F                                   ld      c,a
  36+ AC9F C3 80 AC                             jp      .OppositeSigns
  37+ ACA2
  38+ ACA2
  39+ ACA2 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  40+ ACA3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ ACA5 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  42+ ACA6                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  42+ ACA6 FA B4 AC    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  43+ ACA9 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  44+ ACAA B1                                   or      c
  45+ ACAB                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  45+ ACAB FA B0 AC    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  46+ ACAE 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  47+ ACAF C9                                   ret
  48+ ACB0 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  49+ ACB1 78                                   ld      a,b
  50+ ACB2 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  51+ ACB3 C9                                   ret
  52+ ACB4              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  52+ ACB4 B7          >                        or a
  53+ ACB5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  54+ ACB7 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  55+ ACB9 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                        ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  56+ ACBA C9                                   ret
  57+ ACBB              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  57+ ACBB AF          >                    xor a
  57+ ACBC 95          >                    sub l
  57+ ACBD 6F          >                    ld l,a
  57+ ACBE 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  57+ ACBF 94          >                    sub h
  57+ ACC0 67          >                    ld h,a
  58+ ACC1 78                                   ld      a,b
  59+ ACC2 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  60+ ACC4 C9                                   ret
  61+ ACC5
  62+ ACC5
  63+ ACC5 CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
  64+ ACC7 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
  65+ ACC9 CD 96 B3                             call    negate16hl
  66+ ACCC CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
  67+ ACCE 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
  68+ ACD0 CD 9D B3                             call    negate16de
  69+ ACD3 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  70+ ACD4 AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  71+ ACD5 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  72+ ACD7 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  73+ ACD8 CD 96 B3                             call    negate16hl
  74+ ACDB 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  75+ ACDD C9                                   ret
  76+ ACDE
  77+ ACDE
  78+ ACDE              ; HL(2sc) = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
  79+ ACDE 16 00        HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:  ld      d,0
  80+ ACE0 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; set up DE = A
  81+ ACE1 7C                                   ld      a,h
  82+ ACE2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  83+ ACE4 28 07                                jr      z,.HLPositive               ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  84+ ACE6 67           .HLNegative:            ld      h,a                         ; hl = ABS (HL)
  85+ ACE7                                      NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
  85+ ACE7 AF          >                    xor a
  85+ ACE8 95          >                    sub l
  85+ ACE9 6F          >                    ld l,a
  85+ ACEA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  85+ ACEB 94          >                    sub h
  85+ ACEC 67          >                    ld h,a
  86+ ACED              .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
  86+ ACED B7          >                        or a
  87+ ACEE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c
  88+ ACF0 C9                                   ret
  89+ ACF1
  90+ ACF1 5F           HLEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:    ld      e,a
  91+ ACF2 7C                                   ld      a,h
  92+ ACF3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ ACF5 20 04                                jr      nz,.HLNegative              ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  94+ ACF7 7B           .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
  95+ ACF8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  96+ ACFA C9                                   ret
  97+ ACFB              .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
  97+ ACFB 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  97+ ACFC E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  97+ ACFE 67          >                        ld      h,a
  98+ ACFF                                      NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
  98+ ACFF AF          >                    xor a
  98+ AD00 95          >                    sub l
  98+ AD01 6F          >                    ld l,a
  98+ AD02 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  98+ AD03 94          >                    sub h
  98+ AD04 67          >                    ld h,a
  99+ AD05 16 00                                ld      d,0
 100+ AD07                                      ClearCarryFlag
 100+ AD07 B7          >                        or a
 101+ AD08 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
 102+ AD0A FA 12 AD                             jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
 103+ AD0D                                      SetSignBit      h
 103+ AD0D 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 103+ AD0E F6 80       >                        or      SignOnly8Bit
 103+ AD10 67          >                        ld      h,a
 104+ AD11 C9                                   ret
 105+ AD12              .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 105+ AD12 AF          >                    xor a
 105+ AD13 95          >                    sub l
 105+ AD14 6F          >                    ld l,a
 105+ AD15 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 105+ AD16 94          >                    sub h
 105+ AD17 67          >                    ld h,a
 106+ AD18 C9                                   ret
