 110+ AD19              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 111+ AD19 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 112+ AD1A 5C                                   ld      e,h
 113+ AD1B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 114+ AD1C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 115+ AD1E 67                                   ld      h,a
 116+ AD1F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 117+ AD20 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 118+ AD22 7B                                   ld      a,e
 119+ AD23 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 120+ AD25 B4                                   or      h
 121+ AD26 C9                                   ret
 122+ AD27              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 123+ AD27 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 124+ AD28 4F                                   ld      c,a
 125+ AD29 78                                   ld      a,b
 126+ AD2A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 127+ AD2C 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 128+ AD2E EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 129+ AD2F 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 130+ AD31 69                                   ld      l,c
 131+ AD32                                      ClearCarryFlag
 131+ AD32 B7          >                        or a
 132+ AD33 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 133+ AD35 C9                                   ret
 134+ AD36 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 135+ AD37 ED 31                                add hl,a
 136+ AD39 C9                                   ret
 137+ AD3A              ;tested mathstestsun2
 138+ AD3A              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 139+ AD3A 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 140+ AD3B AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 141+ AD3C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 142+ AD3E 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 143+ AD40 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 144+ AD41 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 145+ AD43 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 146+ AD45 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 147+ AD46 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 148+ AD48 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 149+ AD49 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 150+ AD4A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 151+ AD4C 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 152+ AD4D 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 153+ AD4E 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 154+ AD4F 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 155+ AD50 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 156+ AD51 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 157+ AD52 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 158+ AD53 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 159+ AD54 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 160+ AD55 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 161+ AD57 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 162+ AD58 C9                                   ret                         ; done
 163+ AD59 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 164+ AD5A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 165+ AD5C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 166+ AD5E 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 167+ AD5F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 168+ AD60 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 169+ AD62 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 170+ AD64 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 171+ AD65 E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 172+ AD66 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 173+ AD68 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 174+ AD6A E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 175+ AD6B 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 176+ AD6D 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 177+ AD6F 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 178+ AD70                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 178+ AD70 BD          >                        cp      l
 178+ AD71 DA 7B AD    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 179+ AD74 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 180+ AD76              ; The same so its just zero
 181+ AD76 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 182+ AD77 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 183+ AD78 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 184+ AD79 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 185+ AD7A C9                                   ret                        ; .
 186+ AD7B              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 187+ AD7B 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 188+ AD7C 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 189+ AD7D 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 190+ AD7E 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 191+ AD7F 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 192+ AD80 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 193+ AD81 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 194+ AD82 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 195+ AD83 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 196+ AD84 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 197+ AD86 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 198+ AD88 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 199+ AD89 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 200+ AD8A C9                                   ret
 201+ AD8B 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 202+ AD8C 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 203+ AD8D 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 204+ AD8E 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 205+ AD8F 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 206+ AD90 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 207+ AD91 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 208+ AD92 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 209+ AD93 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 210+ AD94 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 211+ AD96 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 212+ AD98 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 213+ AD99 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 214+ AD9A C9                                   ret
 215+ AD9B
 216+ AD9B
 217+ AD9B              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 218+ AD9B 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 219+ AD9C 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 220+ AD9D A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 221+ AD9E CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 222+ ADA0 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 223+ ADA2 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 224+ ADA3 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 225+ ADA4 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 226+ ADA6 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 227+ ADA7 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 228+ ADA8 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 229+ ADA9 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 230+ ADAA ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 231+ ADAC 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 232+ ADAD C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 233+ ADAE
 234+ ADAE
 235+ ADAE
 236+ ADAE              ; a = value to add
 237+ ADAE              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 238+ ADAE              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 239+ ADAE              addINWKbasigned:
 240+ ADAE 21 10 C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 241+ ADB1 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 242+ ADB2 78           		ld		a,b
 243+ ADB3 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 244+ ADB5 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 245+ ADB6 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 246+ ADB8 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 247+ ADB9 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 248+ ADBA E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 249+ ADBC              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 250+ ADBC              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 251+ ADBC              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 252+ ADBC              addhlcsigned:
 253+ ADBC 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 254+ ADBD 23                   inc     hl
 255+ ADBE 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 256+ ADBF 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 257+ ADC0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 258+ ADC1 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 259+ ADC2 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 260+ ADC3 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 261+ ADC5 28 2B                jr      z,.postivecalc
 262+ ADC7              .negativecalc:
 263+ ADC7 7C                   ld      a,h
 264+ ADC8 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 265+ ADCA 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 266+ ADCB DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 267+ ADCD 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 268+ ADCF ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 269+ ADD1 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 270+ ADD3 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 271+ ADD4 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 272+ ADD5 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 273+ ADD7 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 274+ ADD9 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 275+ ADDB A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 276+ ADDC 77                   ld      (hl),a
 277+ ADDD 2B                   dec     hl
 278+ ADDE 72                   ld      (hl),d
 279+ ADDF 2B                   dec     hl
 280+ ADE0 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 281+ ADE1 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 282+ ADE2 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 283+ ADE3              .nocarry:
 284+ ADE3                      NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 284+ ADE3 AF          >                    xor a
 284+ ADE4 95          >                    sub l
 284+ ADE5 6F          >                    ld l,a
 284+ ADE6 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 284+ ADE7 94          >                    sub h
 284+ ADE8 67          >                    ld h,a
 285+ ADE9 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 286+ ADEA EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 287+ ADEB 73                   ld      (hl),e
 288+ ADEC 23                   inc     hl
 289+ ADED 72                   ld      (hl),d
 290+ ADEE 23                   inc     hl
 291+ ADEF 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 292+ ADF0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 293+ ADF1 C9                   ret
 294+ ADF2              .postivecalc:
 295+ ADF2 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 296+ ADF4 06 00                ld      b,0
 297+ ADF6 19                   add     hl,de
 298+ ADF7 EB                   ex      de,hl
 299+ ADF8 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 300+ ADFA 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 301+ ADFB 2B                   dec     hl
 302+ ADFC 72                   ld      (hl),d
 303+ ADFD 2B                   dec     hl
 304+ ADFE 73                   ld      (hl),e
 305+ ADFF C9                   ret
 306+ AE00
 307+ AE00              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 308+ AE00              ;MVT1
 309+ AE00              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 310+ AE00              ;    A = sign bit => T
 311+ AE00              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 312+ AE00              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 313+ AE00              ;
 314+ AE00              ;        and h, 7F
 315+ AE00              ;        b = 0
 316+ AE00              ;        c = varS
 317+ AE00              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 318+ AE00              ;        retain carry
 319+ AE00              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 320+ AE00              ;        and 7F
 321+ AE00              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 322+ AE00              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 323+ AE00              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 324+ AE00              ;
 325+ AE00              ;    else
 326+ AE00              ;MV10.
 327+ AE00              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 328+ AE00              ;        or      sign bit
 329+ AE00
 330+ AE00
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
 657  AE00                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ AE00              ; Note its big endian
   2+ AE00 2A 68 A3     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ AE03 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ AE04 22 68 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ AE07 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ AE0A 2A 6A A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ AE0D ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ AE0F 22 6A A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ AE12 C9                                   ret
  10+ AE13
  11+ AE13 2A 68 A3     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ AE16 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ AE17 B5                                   or      l
  14+ AE18 2A 6A A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ AE1B B4                                   or      h
  16+ AE1C B5                                   or      l
  17+ AE1D C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ AE1E B7                                   or      a
  19+ AE1F 2A 68 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ AE22 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ AE24 22 68 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ AE27 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ AE2A 2A 6A A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ AE2D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ AE2F 22 6A A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ AE32                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ AE32 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ AE34 C2 38 AE    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ AE37 C9                                   ret
  28+ AE38 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ AE3B 22 68 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ AE3E 22 6A A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ AE41 C9                                   ret
  32+ AE42
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
 658  AE42                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ AE42              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ AE42              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ AE42 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ AE43 E5                                   push hl
   5+ AE44 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ AE46 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ AE48 E5                                   push hl
   8+ AE49 AF                                   xor a
   9+ AE4A 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ AE4B 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ AE4C DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ AE4E CB 10                                rl b
  13+ AE50 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ AE52 17                                   rla
  15+ AE53 B9                                   cp c
  16+ AE54 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ AE56 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ AE58 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ AE5A 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ AE5B 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ AE5D ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ AE5F 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ AE60 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ AE62 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ AE63 2D                                   dec l
  26+ AE64 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ AE65 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ AE67 D1                                   pop de
  29+ AE68 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ AE69 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ AE6B D1                                   pop de
  32+ AE6C C9                                   ret
  33+ AE6D
  34+ AE6D FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ AE6F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ AE71 CD 42 AE                             call    Div24by24
  37+ AE74 F5                                   push    af
  38+ AE75 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ AE77 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ AE79 B1                                   or      c
  41+ AE7A 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ AE7B F1                                   pop     af
  43+ AE7C C9                                   ret
  44+ AE7D
  45+ AE7D                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ AE7D FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ AE7F A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ AE80 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ AE82 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ AE84 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ AE85 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ AE87 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ AE88 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ AE8A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ AE8C CD 42 AE                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ AE8F FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ AE91 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ AE93 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ AE94 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ AE96 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ AE97 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ AE99 C9                                   ret
  63+ AE9A
  64+ AE9A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ AE9A              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ AE9A              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ AE9A              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ AE9A 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ AE9B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ AE9D 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ AE9F 3A 06 9E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ AEA2 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ AEA3 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ AEA6 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ AEA7 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ AEA9 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ AEAB 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ AEAC ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ AEAE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ AEB0 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ AEB2 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ AEB3 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ AEB4 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ AEB6 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ AEB7 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ AEBA C9                                   ret
  87+ AEBB
  88+ AEBB
  89+ AEBB
  90+ AEBB
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
 659  AEBB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ AEBB              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ AEBB 2A 07 9E                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ AEBE 3A 06 9E                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ AEC1 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ AEC3 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ AEC6 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ AEC7                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ AEC7 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ AEC9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ AECB CB 20                                sla b
   9+ AECD 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ AECF EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ AED0 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ AED1 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ AED2              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ AED2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ AED4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ AED6 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ AED8 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ AEDA 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ AEDC EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ AEDD D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ AEDF C9                                   ret
  20+ AEE0
  21+ AEE0
  22+ AEE0              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ AEE0 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ AEE0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ AEE0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ AEE0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ AEE0 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ AEE0 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ AEE0 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ AEE0                                      ENDM
  40+ AEE0
  41+ AEE0
  42+ AEE0
  43+ AEE0                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ AEE0              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ AEE0 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ AEE1 3A 06 9E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ AEE4 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AEE5 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ AEE6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AEE8 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ AEE9 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ AEEA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AEEC 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ AEED 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ AEEE E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AEF0 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AEF1 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ AEF3 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ AEF4 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ AEF5 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ AEF6 2A 07 9E     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ AEF9 CD 02 AF                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ AEFC EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ AEFD                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ AEFD B7          >                        or a
  49+ AEFE DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ AF00 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ AF01 C9                                   ret
  52+ AF02
  53+ AF02
  54+ AF02 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ AF03 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ AF05 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ AF06 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ AF07                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ AF07 FA 1F AF    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ AF0A 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ AF0B B2                                   or      d
  61+ AF0C                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ AF0C FA 11 AF    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ AF0F 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ AF10 C9                                   ret
  64+ AF11 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ AF12 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ AF14 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ AF15 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ AF16 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ AF18 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ AF19 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ AF1A 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ AF1C B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ AF1D 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ AF1E C9                                   ret
  75+ AF1F 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ AF20 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ AF22 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ AF23 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ AF24 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ AF26 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ AF27 B7                                   or      a
  82+ AF28 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ AF2A 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ AF2C 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ AF2D B4                                   or      h
  86+ AF2E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ AF2F C9                                   ret
  88+ AF30              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ AF30 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ AF31 95          >                    sub l
  88+ AF32 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ AF33 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ AF34 94          >                    sub h
  88+ AF35 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ AF36 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ AF37 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ AF39 B4                                   or      h
  92+ AF3A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ AF3B C9                                   ret
  94+ AF3C
  95+ AF3C
  96+ AF3C                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ AF3C                  ;
  98+ AF3C                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ AF3C                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ AF3C                  ;
 101+ AF3C                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ AF3C                  ;         carry reset
 103+ AF3C                  ;
 104+ AF3C                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ AF3C 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ AF3D 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ AF3E ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ AF40 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ AF41 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ AF43
 111+ AF43 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ AF44 85                                   add a,l
 113+ AF45 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ AF46 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ AF47
 116+ AF47 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ AF48 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ AF4A C9                                   ret
 119+ AF4B
 120+ AF4B 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 121+ AF4C 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 122+ AF4D ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 123+ AF4F EB                                   ex      de,hl
 124+ AF50 C9                                   ret
 125+ AF51
 126+ AF51                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 127+ AF51                 ;
 128+ AF51                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 129+ AF51                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 130+ AF51                 ;
 131+ AF51                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 132+ AF51                 ;         carry reset
 133+ AF51                 ;
 134+ AF51                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 135+ AF51
 136+ AF51
 137+ AF51
 138+ AF51 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 139+ AF52 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 140+ AF53 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 141+ AF54 6A                                   ld l,d
 142+ AF55 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 143+ AF56 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 144+ AF57              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 145+ AF57 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 146+ AF59 EB                                   ex de,hl
 147+ AF5A ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 148+ AF5C
 149+ AF5C AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 150+ AF5D 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 151+ AF5E 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 152+ AF5F
 153+ AF5F 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 154+ AF60 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 155+ AF61 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 156+ AF63
 157+ AF63 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 158+ AF64 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 159+ AF65
 160+ AF65 7A                                   ld a,d
 161+ AF66 85                                   add a,l
 162+ AF67 67                                   ld h,a
 163+ AF68 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 164+ AF69
 165+ AF69 D1                                   pop de
 166+ AF6A ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 167+ AF6C
 168+ AF6C EB                                   ex de,hl
 169+ AF6D ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 170+ AF6F EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 171+ AF70
 172+ AF70 C9                                   ret
 173+ AF71
 174+ AF71              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 175+ AF71              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 176+ AF71              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 177+ AF71              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 178+ AF71              ;         carry reset
 179+ AF71              ; maths is
 180+ AF71              ;        hl = y , de= x
 181+ AF71              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 182+ AF71              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 183+ AF71              ;
 184+ AF71              ;
 185+ AF71              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 186+ AF71 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 187+ AF72 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 188+ AF73 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 189+ AF74 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 190+ AF75 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 191+ AF76 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 192+ AF77 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 193+ AF79 EB                                   ex de,hl
 194+ AF7A ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 195+ AF7C 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 196+ AF7D 59                                   ld e,c
 197+ AF7E 50                                   ld d,b
 198+ AF7F ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 199+ AF81 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 200+ AF82 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 201+ AF83 67                                   ld h,a
 202+ AF84 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 203+ AF85                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 204+ AF85 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 205+ AF86 C1                                   pop     bc
 206+ AF87 C9                                   ret
 207+ AF88
 208+ AF88
 209+ AF88              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 210+ AF88              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 211+ AF88 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 212+ AF89 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 213+ AF8A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 214+ AF8C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 215+ AF8E 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 216+ AF8F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ AF91 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 218+ AF92 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 219+ AF93 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 220+ AF95              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 221+ AF95 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 222+ AF96 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 223+ AF97 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 224+ AF99 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 225+ AF9A 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 226+ AF9B 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 227+ AF9C 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 228+ AF9D 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 229+ AF9E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 230+ AF9F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 231+ AFA1 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 232+ AFA2 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 233+ AFA3 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 234+ AFA4 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 235+ AFA5 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 236+ AFA6 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 237+ AFA7 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 238+ AFA8 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 239+ AFAA 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 240+ AFAB 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 241+ AFAC FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 242+ AFAE 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 243+ AFAF C9                                   ret
 244+ AFB0
 245+ AFB0              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 246+ AFB0              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 247+ AFB0              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 248+ AFB0              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 249+ AFB0              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 250+ AFB0              ;mult3
 251+ AFB0              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 252+ AFB0              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 253+ AFB0              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 254+ AFB0              ; Algorithm
 255+ AFB0              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 256+ AFB0              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 257+ AFB0              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 258+ AFB0              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 259+ AFB0              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 260+ AFB0              ;
 261+ AFB0              ;
 262+ AFB0 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 263+ AFB1 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 264+ AFB2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 265+ AFB4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 266+ AFB6 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 267+ AFB7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 268+ AFB9 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 269+ AFBA 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 270+ AFBB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 271+ AFBD 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 272+ AFBE B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 273+ AFBF 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 274+ AFC1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 275+ AFC2 B5                                   or      l
 276+ AFC3 B3                                   or      e
 277+ AFC4 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 278+ AFC6              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 279+ AFC6 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 280+ AFC7 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 281+ AFC9 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 282+ AFCA FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 283+ AFCC 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 284+ AFCD 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 285+ AFCE ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 286+ AFD0 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 287+ AFD2 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 288+ AFD3 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 289+ AFD4 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 290+ AFD6 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 291+ AFD7 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 292+ AFD8 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 293+ AFDA FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 294+ AFDC 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 295+ AFDD 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 296+ AFDE 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 297+ AFDF CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 298+ AFE1 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 299+ AFE3 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 300+ AFE4 C9                                   ret
 301+ AFE5 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 302+ AFE8                                      ZeroA
 302+ AFE8 AF          >                        xor a
 303+ AFE9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 304+ AFEA 6F                                   ld      l,a
 305+ AFEB C9                                   ret
 306+ AFEC
 307+ AFEC              ;;;
 308+ AFEC              ;;;
 309+ AFEC              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 310+ AFEC              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 311+ AFEC              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 312+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 313+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 314+ AFEC              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 315+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 316+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 317+ AFEC              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 318+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 319+ AFEC              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 320+ AFEC              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 321+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 322+ AFEC              ;;;                        or      l
 323+ AFEC              ;;;                        or      e
 324+ AFEC              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 325+ AFEC              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 326+ AFEC              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 327+ AFEC              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 328+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 329+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 330+ AFEC              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 331+ AFEC              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 332+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 333+ AFEC              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 334+ AFEC              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 335+ AFEC              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 336+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 337+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 338+ AFEC              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 339+ AFEC              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 340+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 341+ AFEC              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 342+ AFEC              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 343+ AFEC              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 344+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 345+ AFEC              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 346+ AFEC              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 347+ AFEC              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 348+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 349+ AFEC              ;;;                        ret
 350+ AFEC              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 351+ AFEC              ;;;                        ZeroA
 352+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 353+ AFEC              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 354+ AFEC              ;;;                        ret
 355+ AFEC
 356+ AFEC              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 357+ AFEC              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 358+ AFEC              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 359+ AFEC              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 360+ AFEC              ;         carry reset
 361+ AFEC              ;
 362+ AFEC              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 363+ AFEC 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 364+ AFED AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 365+ AFEE 32 EC AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 366+ AFF1 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 367+ AFF2 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 368+ AFF5 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 369+ AFF7 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 370+ AFF9 57                                   ld      d,a
 371+ AFFA 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 372+ AFFC 32 EC AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 373+ AFFF 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 374+ B000 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 375+ B003 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 376+ B005 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 377+ B007 67                                   ld      h,a
 378+ B008 3A EC AF                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 379+ B00B EE 80                                xor     $80
 380+ B00D 32 EC AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 381+ B010 CD 71 AF     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 382+ B013 3A EC AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 383+ B016 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 384+ B019 C8                                   ret     z
 385+ B01A AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 386+ B01B 95                                   sub 	l
 387+ B01C 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 388+ B01D 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 389+ B01E 94                                   sub 	h
 390+ B01F 67                                   ld 		h,a
 391+ B020 C9                                   ret
 392+ B021
 393+ B021 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 394+ B022 32 EC AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 395+ B025 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 396+ B026 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 397+ B029 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 398+ B02B E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 399+ B02D 57                                   ld      d,a
 400+ B02E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 401+ B030 32 EC AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 402+ B033 CD 71 AF     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 403+ B036 3A EC AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 404+ B039 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 405+ B03C C8                                   ret     z
 406+ B03D AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 407+ B03E 95                                   sub 	l
 408+ B03F 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 409+ B040 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 410+ B041 94                                   sub 	h
 411+ B042 67                                   ld 		h,a
 412+ B043 C9                                   ret
 413+ B044
 414+ B044
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 660  B044                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ B044              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ B044              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ B044
   4+ B044              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ B044 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ B044 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ B044 ~            			mul
   8+ B044              			ENDM
   9+ B044
  10+ B044              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ B044 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ B044 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ B044 ~            			mul
  14+ B044 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ B044              			ENDM
  16+ B044
  17+ B044
  18+ B044              asm_squa:
  19+ B044 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ B046              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ B046              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ B046              asm_squa2:
  23+ B046 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ B047 57           	ld d,a
  25+ B048 ED 30        	mul
  26+ B04A ED 53 04 9D  	ld (varP),de
  27+ B04E 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ B04F C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 661  B050                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ B050              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ B050              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ B050              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ B050              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ B050              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ B050              asm_sqrt:
   7+ B050 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ B053 61           	ld h,c
   9+ B054 69           	ld l,c
  10+ B055              .sqrloop:
  11+ B055 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ B057 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ B059 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ B05A EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B05B ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ B05D 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ B05F EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ B060 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ B061 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ B063              .sqrbit:
  21+ B063 19           	add hl,de
  22+ B064 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ B065 B7           	or a
  24+ B066 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ B068              .sqrfi:
  26+ B068 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ B06A CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ B06C CB 38        	srl b
  29+ B06E CB 19        	rr c
  30+ B070 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ B072 C9           	ret
  32+ B073
  33+ B073
  34+ B073              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ B073 3A 06 9E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ B076 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ B077 3A 07 9E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ B07A 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ B07B CD 50 B0     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ B07E 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ B07F 32 06 9E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ B082 C9           	ret
  43+ B083
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 662  B083                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ B083
   2+ B083
   3+ B083
   4+ B083              ;
   5+ B083              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ B083              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ B083              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ B083              ;               if a >= D
   9+ B083              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ B083              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ B083              ;           else
  12+ B083
  13+ B083              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ B083              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ B083              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ B083              ;
  17+ B083              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ B083              ;
  19+ B083              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ B083              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ B083
  22+ B083 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
  23+ B084 15                                   dec     d
  24+ B085 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
  25+ B087 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
  26+ B089 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
  27+ B08B 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
  28+ B08C B3                                   or      e
  29+ B08D 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
  30+ B08F 14                                   inc     d
  31+ B090 15                                   dec     d
  32+ B091 CD 3C B2                             call    BC_Div_DE
  33+ B094                                      ZeroA
  33+ B094 AF          >                        xor a
  34+ B095 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
  35+ B096 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
  36+ B098 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
  37+ B099 C9                                   ret
  38+ B09A AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
  39+ B09B 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
  40+ B09C 67                                   ld      h,a
  41+ B09D 6F                                   ld      l,a
  42+ B09E C9                                   ret
  43+ B09F 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
  44+ B0A1 67                                   ld      h,a
  45+ B0A2 6F                                   ld      l,a
  46+ B0A3                                      SetCarryFlag
  46+ B0A3 37          >                        scf
  47+ B0A4 C9                                   ret
  48+ B0A5
  49+ B0A5              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  50+ B0A5 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
  51+ B0A7 CB 27                                sla		a							;
  52+ B0A9 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
  53+ B0AA CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
  54+ B0AC 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
  55+ B0AE BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
  56+ B0AF 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
  57+ B0B1              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
  57+ B0B1 B7          >                        or a
  58+ B0B2 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
  59+ B0B3                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
  59+ B0B3 B7          >                        or a
  60+ B0B4 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
  61+ B0B5 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
  62+ B0B7 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
  63+ B0B9 BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
  64+ B0BA 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
  65+ B0BC                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
  65+ B0BC B7          >                        or a
  66+ B0BD 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
  67+ B0BF 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
  68+ B0C0 CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
  69+ B0C2 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
  70+ B0C4 BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
  71+ B0C5 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
  72+ B0C7 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
  73+ B0C8 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
  74+ B0C9 CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
  75+ B0CB 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
  76+ B0CD C9                                   ret
  77+ B0CE 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
  78+ B0CF                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
  78+ B0CF 37          >                        scf
  79+ B0D0 CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
  80+ B0D2 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
  81+ B0D4 C9                                   ret
  82+ B0D5 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
  83+ B0D7 C9                                   ret
  84+ B0D8
  85+ B0D8 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
  86+ B0D9 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
  87+ B0DB 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
  88+ B0DD 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  89+ B0DF CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  90+ B0E1 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  91+ B0E3                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  91+ B0E3 BA          >                        cp      d
  91+ B0E4 DA E9 B0    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  92+ B0E7 92                                   sub     d
  93+ B0E8                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  93+ B0E8 B7          >                        or a
  94+ B0E9              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  94+ B0E9 3F          >                        ccf
  95+ B0EA CB 13                                rl      e
  96+ B0EC 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  97+ B0EE 7B                                   ld      a,e
  98+ B0EF C9                                   ret
  99+ B0F0 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 100+ B0F1                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 100+ B0F1 37          >                        scf
 101+ B0F2 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 102+ B0F4 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 103+ B0F6 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 104+ B0F7 C9                                   ret
 105+ B0F8 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 106+ B0FA C9                                   ret
 107+ B0FB 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 108+ B0FD C9                                   ret
 109+ B0FE
 110+ B0FE
 111+ B0FE              ; Divide 8-bit values
 112+ B0FE              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 113+ B0FE              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 114+ B0FE              ;
 115+ B0FE              ;;;Div8:
 116+ B0FE              ;;;    xor a
 117+ B0FE              ;;;    ld b,8
 118+ B0FE              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 119+ B0FE              ;;;    rl e
 120+ B0FE              ;;;    rla
 121+ B0FE              ;;;    sub c
 122+ B0FE              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 123+ B0FE              ;;;    add a,c
 124+ B0FE              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 125+ B0FE              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 126+ B0FE              ;;;    ld b,a0
 127+ B0FE              ;;;    ld a,e
 128+ B0FE              ;;;    rla
 129+ B0FE              ;;;    cpl
 130+ B0FE              ;;;    ret
 131+ B0FE
 132+ B0FE              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 133+ B0FE              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 134+ B0FE              ;;         A is a copy of E
 135+ B0FE              ;;         HL is the remainder
 136+ B0FE              ;;         BC is not changed
 137+ B0FE              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 138+ B0FE              ;140 bytes
 139+ B0FE              ;145cc
 140+ B0FE
 141+ B0FE              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 142+ B0FE ~                                rla
 143+ B0FE ~                                adc     hl,hl
 144+ B0FE ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 145+ B0FE ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 146+ B0FE ~                                add     hl,bc
 147+ B0FE                                  ENDM
 148+ B0FE
 149+ B0FE              DEequDEDivBC:
 150+ B0FE AF               xor a
 151+ B0FF ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 152+ B101 7A               ld a,d
 153+ B102                  MacroDEDivBC
 153+ B102 17          >                    rla
 153+ B103 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 153+ B105 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 153+ B107 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 153+ B109 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 154+ B10A                  MacroDEDivBC
 154+ B10A 17          >                    rla
 154+ B10B ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 154+ B10D ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 154+ B10F 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 154+ B111 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 155+ B112                  MacroDEDivBC
 155+ B112 17          >                    rla
 155+ B113 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 155+ B115 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 155+ B117 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 155+ B119 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 156+ B11A                  MacroDEDivBC
 156+ B11A 17          >                    rla
 156+ B11B ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 156+ B11D ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 156+ B11F 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 156+ B121 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 157+ B125 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 157+ B127 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 157+ B129 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 158+ B131 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 178+ B18A
 179+ B18A
 180+ B18A
 181+ B18A              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 182+ B18A              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 183+ B18A              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 184+ B18A              ; Our use
 185+ B18A              ; BC = A0
 186+ B18A              ; DE = 0C
 187+ B18A              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 188+ B18A              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 188+ B18A B9          >                        cp     c
 188+ B18B D2 B6 B1    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 189+ B18E 47                                   ld      b,a
 190+ B18F 59                                   ld      e,c
 191+ B190 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 192+ B192 16 00                                ld      d,0
 193+ B194 C3 A1 B1                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 194+ B197 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 195+ B198 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 196+ B19A 21 06 9E                             ld      hl,varQ
 197+ B19D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 198+ B19E 16 00                                ld      d,0
 199+ B1A0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 200+ B1A1              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 201+ B1A1 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 202+ B1A4 78                                   ld      a,b
 203+ B1A5 06 10                                ld      b,16
 204+ B1A7 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 205+ B1A9 17                                   rla			; ...
 206+ B1AA ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 207+ B1AC ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 208+ B1AE 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 209+ B1B0 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 210+ B1B1 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 211+ B1B2 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 212+ B1B4 47                                   ld   b,a
 213+ B1B5 C9                                   ret
 214+ B1B6 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 215+ B1B9 C9                                   ret
 216+ B1BA
 217+ B1BA              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 218+ B1BA 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 219+ B1BC AF                                   xor a
 220+ B1BD CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 221+ B1BF 17                                   rla
 222+ B1C0 BA                                   cp d
 223+ B1C1 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 223+ B1C3
 224+ B1C3 0C                                   inc c
 225+ B1C4 92                                   sub d
 226+ B1C5 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 227+ B1C7 C9                                   ret
 228+ B1C8              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 229+ B1C8 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 230+ B1CA AF                                   xor a
 231+ B1CB CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 232+ B1CD CB 14                                rl	h
 233+ B1CF              ;    add hl,hl
 234+ B1CF 17                                   rla
 235+ B1D0 B9                                   cp c
 236+ B1D1 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 237+ B1D3 2C                                   inc l
 238+ B1D4 91                                   sub c
 239+ B1D5 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 240+ B1D7 C9                                   ret
 241+ B1D8              ;
 242+ B1D8              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 243+ B1D8              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 244+ B1D8              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 245+ B1D8              ;
 246+ B1D8              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 247+ B1D8 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 248+ B1D8 ~            					rla				; ...
 249+ B1D8 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 250+ B1D8 ~            					jr	1F
 251+ B1D8 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 252+ B1D8 ~            1:
 253+ B1D8 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 254+ B1D8              					ENDM
 255+ B1D8
 256+ B1D8
 257+ B1D8
 258+ B1D8              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 259+ B1D8 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 260+ B1DB 78                               ld a,b
 261+ B1DC 06 08                            ld b,8
 262+ B1DE 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 263+ B1DF ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 264+ B1E1 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 265+ B1E3 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 266+ B1E5 19                               add hl,de
 267+ B1E6 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 268+ B1E8 17                               rla
 269+ B1E9 2F                               cpl
 270+ B1EA 47                               ld b,a
 271+ B1EB 79                               ld a,c
 272+ B1EC 48                               ld c,b
 273+ B1ED 06 08                            ld b,8
 274+ B1EF 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 275+ B1F0 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 276+ B1F2 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 277+ B1F4 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 278+ B1F6 19                               add hl,de
 279+ B1F7 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 280+ B1F9 17                               rla
 281+ B1FA 2F                               cpl
 282+ B1FB 41                               ld b,c
 283+ B1FC 4F                               ld c,a
 284+ B1FD C9                               ret
 285+ B1FE
 286+ B1FE
 287+ B1FE              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 288+ B1FE ~                                    rl  e
 289+ B1FE ~                                    rla
 290+ B1FE ~                                    sub c
 291+ B1FE ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 292+ B1FE ~                                    add a,c
 293+ B1FE ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 294+ B1FE                                      ENDM

 313+ B23C              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 314+ B23C ~                                    rla
 315+ B23C ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 316+ B23C ~                                    add	    hl,de
 317+ B23C ~                                    jr	    c,1F

 322+ B23C
 323+ B23C              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 324+ B23C              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 325+ B23C              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 326+ B23C              ;min: 738cc
 327+ B23C              ;max: 898cc
 328+ B23C              ;avg: 818cc
 329+ B23C              ;144 bytes
 330+ B23C AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 331+ B23D 67                                   ld h,a
 332+ B23E 6F                                   ld l,a
 333+ B23F 93                                   sub e
 334+ B240 5F                                   ld e,a
 335+ B241 9F                                   sbc a,a
 336+ B242 92                                   sub d
 337+ B243 57                                   ld d,a
 338+ B244 78                                   ld a,b
 339+ B245                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 339+ B245 17          >                        rla

 339+ B248 19          >                        add	    hl,de

 339+ B24D             >1:
