 352+ B291 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 352+ B293 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 352+ B294 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 352+ B296 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 352+ B298             >1:
 353+ B298                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 353+ B298 17          >                        rla
 353+ B299 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 353+ B29B 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 353+ B29C 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 353+ B29E ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 353+ B2A0             >1:
 354+ B2A0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 354+ B2A0 17          >                        rla
 354+ B2A1 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 354+ B2A3 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 354+ B2A4 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 354+ B2A6 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 354+ B2A8             >1:
 355+ B2A8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 355+ B2A8 17          >                        rla
 355+ B2A9 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 355+ B2AB 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 355+ B2AC 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 355+ B2AE ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 355+ B2B0             >1:
 356+ B2B0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 356+ B2B0 17          >                        rla
 356+ B2B1 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 356+ B2B3 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 356+ B2B4 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 356+ B2B6 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 356+ B2B8             >1:
 357+ B2B8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 357+ B2B8 17          >                        rla
 357+ B2B9 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 357+ B2BB 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 357+ B2BC 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 357+ B2BE ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 357+ B2C0             >1:
 358+ B2C0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 358+ B2C0 17          >                        rla
 358+ B2C1 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 358+ B2C3 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 358+ B2C4 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 358+ B2C6 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 358+ B2C8             >1:
 359+ B2C8 17                                   rla
 360+ B2C9 4F                                   ld c,a
 361+ B2CA C9                                   ret
 362+ B2CB
 363+ B2CB              ;Inputs:
 364+ B2CB              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 365+ B2CB              ;Outputs:
 366+ B2CB              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 367+ B2CB              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 368+ B2CB              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 369+ B2CB              ;Otherwise:
 370+ B2CB              ;min: 1107cc
 371+ B2CB              ;max: 1319cc
 372+ B2CB              ;avg: 1201cc
 373+ B2CB 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 374+ B2CC AA                                   xor d
 375+ B2CD F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 376+ B2CE              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 377+ B2CE A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 378+ B2CF F2 D8 B2                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 379+ B2D2 AF                                   xor a
 380+ B2D3 91                                   sub c
 381+ B2D4 4F                                   ld c,a
 382+ B2D5 9F                                   sbc a,a
 383+ B2D6 90                                   sub b
 384+ B2D7 47                                   ld b,a
 385+ B2D8 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 386+ B2D9 B2                                   or d
 387+ B2DA FA E3 B2                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 388+ B2DD AF                                   xor a
 389+ B2DE 93                                   sub e
 390+ B2DF 5F                                   ld e,a
 391+ B2E0 9F                                   sbc a,a
 392+ B2E1 92                                   sub d
 393+ B2E2 57                                   ld d,a
 394+ B2E3 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 395+ B2E4 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 396+ B2E6 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 397+ B2E8 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 398+ B2E9 83                                   add a,e
 399+ B2EA 7A                                   ld a,d
 400+ B2EB 8C                                   adc a,h
 401+ B2EC 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 402+ B2EE 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 403+ B2EF 79                                   ld a,c
 404+ B2F0 CD 0B B3                             call div_fixed88_sub
 405+ B2F3 4F                                   ld c,a
 406+ B2F4 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 407+ B2F5 CD 0B B3                             call div_fixed88_sub
 408+ B2F8 51                                   ld d,c
 409+ B2F9 5F                                   ld e,a
 410+ B2FA F1                                   pop af
 411+ B2FB F0                                   ret p
 412+ B2FC AF                                   xor a
 413+ B2FD 93                                   sub e
 414+ B2FE 5F                                   ld e,a
 415+ B2FF 9F                                   sbc a,a
 416+ B300 92                                   sub d
 417+ B301 57                                   ld d,a
 418+ B302 C9                                   ret
 419+ B303
 420+ B303 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 421+ B306 F1                                   pop af
 422+ B307 F0                                   ret p
 423+ B308 13                                   inc de
 424+ B309 1C                                   inc e
 425+ B30A C9                                   ret
 426+ B30B
 427+ B30B              ;min: 456cc
 428+ B30B              ;max: 536cc
 429+ B30B              ;avg: 496cc
 430+ B30B 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 431+ B30D 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 432+ B30E ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 433+ B310 19                                   add hl,de
 434+ B311 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 435+ B313 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 436+ B315 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 437+ B317 8F                                   adc a,a
 438+ B318 C9                                   ret
 439+ B319
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 663  B319                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ B319              asm_tis2:
   2+ B319              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ B319              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ B319 F5           	push af
   5+ B31A E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ B31C 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ B31D 3A 06 9E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ B320 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ B321 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ B322 BB           	cp e
  11+ B323 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ B325 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ B327 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ B329 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B32A 3A 06 9E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ B32D 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ B32E CD C8 B1     	call asm_div16
  18+ B331 F1           	pop af
  19+ B332 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ B334 B5           	or l
  21+ B335 C9           	ret
  22+ B336              .tis2_set96:
  23+ B336 F1           	pop af
  24+ B337 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ B339 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ B33B C9           	ret
  27+ B33C
  28+ B33C
  29+ B33C              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ B33C              squareregfx:
  31+ B33C 3A 92 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ B33F 57           	ld d,a
  33+ B340 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ B341 ED 30        	mul
  35+ B343 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ B344              squareregfy:
  37+ B344 3A 94 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ B347 57           	ld d,a
  39+ B348 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ B349 ED 30        	mul
  41+ B34B 19           	add hl,de
  42+ B34C              squareregfz:
  43+ B34C 3A 96 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ B34F 57           	ld d,a
  45+ B350 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ B351 ED 30        	mul
  47+ B353 19           	add hl,de
  48+ B354 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ B355              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ B355 CD 50 B0     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ B358 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ B359 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ B35A E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ B35B              normfx:
  55+ B35B 3A 92 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ B35E E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ B35F 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ B360 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ B361 CD 19 B3     	call asm_tis2
  60+ B364 32 92 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ B367              normfy:
  62+ B367 3A 94 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ B36A E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ B36B 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ B36C 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ B36D CD 19 B3     	call asm_tis2
  67+ B370 32 94 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ B373              normfz:
  69+ B373 3A 96 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ B376 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ B377 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ B378 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ B379 CD 19 B3     	call asm_tis2
  74+ B37C 32 96 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ B37F              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ B37F C9           	ret
  77+ B380
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 664  B380                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ B380              ; Input:
   2+ B380              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ B380              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ B380              ; Output:
   5+ B380              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ B380              ;
   7+ B380              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ B380              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ B380              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ B380              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ B380              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ B380              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ B380              ;
  14+ B380
  15+ B380 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ B381 A7                               and     a
  17+ B382 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ B384 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ B385 C9                               ret
  20+ B386
  21+ B386              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ B386              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ B386
  24+ B386 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ B388 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ B389 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ B38B 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ B38C 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ B38D E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ B38F 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ B390 A7                               and     a
  32+ B391 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ B393 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ B395 C9                               ret
  35+ B396
  36+ B396
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 665  B396                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ B396              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ B396              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ B396              negate16:
   4+ B396              negate16hl:
   5+ B396                      ; Input:
   6+ B396                      ;       HL = value
   7+ B396                      ; Output:
   8+ B396                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ B396                      ; Destroys:
  10+ B396                      ;       AF
  11+ B396                      ;
  12+ B396 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ B397 95           	sub 	l
  14+ B398 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ B399 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ B39A 94           	sub 	h
  17+ B39B 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ B39C C9           	ret
  19+ B39D
  20+ B39D              negate16de:
  21+ B39D AF           	xor 	a
  22+ B39E 93           	sub 	e
  23+ B39F 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ B3A0 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ B3A1 92           	sub 	d
  26+ B3A2 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ B3A3 C9           	ret
  28+ B3A4
  29+ B3A4              negate16bc:
  30+ B3A4 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ B3A5 91           	sub 	c
  32+ B3A6 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ B3A7 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ B3A8 90           	sub 	b
  35+ B3A9 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ B3AA C9           	ret
  37+ B3AB
  38+ B3AB
  39+ B3AB              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ B3AB ~            					xor 	a
  41+ B3AB ~            					sub 	l
  42+ B3AB ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ B3AB ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ B3AB ~            					sub 	h
  45+ B3AB ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ B3AB              					ENDM
  47+ B3AB
  48+ B3AB              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ B3AB ~            					xor 	a
  50+ B3AB ~                                sub 	e
  51+ B3AB ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ B3AB ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ B3AB ~                                sub 	d
  54+ B3AB ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ B3AB              					ENDM
  56+ B3AB              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ B3AB ~            					xor 	a
  58+ B3AB ~                                sub 	c
  59+ B3AB ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ B3AB ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ B3AB ~                                sub 	b
  62+ B3AB ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ B3AB              					ENDM
  64+ B3AB
  65+ B3AB              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ B3AB ~            					xor 	a
  67+ B3AB ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ B3AB ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ B3AB ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ B3AB ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ B3AB ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ B3AB              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 666  B3AB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ B3AB DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ B3AD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ B3AD BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B3AE D2 C3 B3    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ B3B1 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ B3B2 CD BA B1                             call		asm_div8
   5+ B3B5 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ B3B6 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ B3B8 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ B3B9 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ B3BB 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ B3BC 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ B3BD DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ B3BF E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ B3C1 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ B3C2 C9                                   ret
  15+ B3C3              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ B3C3              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ B3C3 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ B3C5 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ B3C7 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ B3C9 C9                                   ret
  21+ B3CA
  22+ B3CA
  23+ B3CA
  24+ B3CA
  25+ B3CA              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ B3CA                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ B3CA 3A 92 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ B3CD DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ B3CF E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ B3D1              N96SQX:
  31+ B3D1              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ B3D1 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ B3D2 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ B3D3 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ B3D5 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ B3D6 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ B3D7              N96SQY:
  35+ B3D7 3A 93 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ B3DA DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ B3DC E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ B3DE              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ B3DE 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ B3DF 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ B3E0 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ B3E2 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ B3E3              N96SQZ:
  41+ B3E3 3A 94 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ B3E6 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ B3E8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ B3EA              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ B3EA 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ B3EB 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ B3EC ED 30       >			mul
  45+ B3EE              N96SQADD:
  46+ B3EE 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ B3EF EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ B3F0              N96SQRT:
  49+ B3F0 CD 50 B0     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ B3F3              N96NORMX:
  51+ B3F3 3A 92 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ B3F6 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ B3F8 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ B3F9 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ B3FA CD FE B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ B3FD 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ B3FE DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ B400 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ B402 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ B403 32 92 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ B406              N96NORMY:
  62+ B406 3A 93 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ B409 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ B40B 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ B40C 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ B40D CD FE B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ B410 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ B411 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ B413 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ B415 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ B416 32 93 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ B419              N96NORMZ:
  73+ B419 3A 94 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ B41C E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ B41E 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ B41F 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ B420 CD FE B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ B423 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ B424 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ B426 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ B428 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ B429 32 94 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ B42C C9           	ret
  84+ B42D
  85+ B42D              ; Normalise vector
  86+ B42D              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ B42D              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ B42D              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ B42D              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ B42D              ;
  91+ B42D              ;
  92+ B42D              ;
  93+ B42D
  94+ B42D              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ B42D 3A 92 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ B430                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ B430 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ B431 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ B432 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ B434 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ B435 32 07 9E                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ B438 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ B439 32 06 9E                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ B43C 32 04 9D                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ B43F 3A 93 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ B442                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ B442 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ B443 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ B444 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ B446 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ B447 32 22 9E                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ B44A 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ B44B 32 04 9D                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ B44E 21 06 9E                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ B451 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ B452 32 06 9E                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ B455 3A 22 9E                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ B458 21 07 9E                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ B45B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ B45C 32 07 9E                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ B45F 3A 94 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ B462                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ B462 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ B463 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ B464 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ B466 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ B467 32 22 9E                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ B46A 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ B46B 32 04 9D                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ B46E 21 06 9E                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ B471 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ B472 32 06 9E                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ B475 3A 22 9E                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ B478 21 07 9E                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ B47B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ B47C 32 07 9E                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ B47F CD 73 B0                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ B482 3A 92 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ B485 CD F8 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ B488 32 92 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ B48B 3A 93 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ B48E CD F8 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ B491 32 93 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ B494 3A 93 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ B497 CD F8 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ B49A 32 93 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ B49D C9                                   ret
 139+ B49E
 140+ B49E
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 667  B49E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ B49E              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ B49E              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ B49E              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ B49E              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ B49E              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ B49E              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ B49E              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ B49E 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ B4A1 CD B7 B4     	call	Num1
  10+ B4A4 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ B4A7 CD B7 B4     	call	Num1
  12+ B4AA 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ B4AD CD B7 B4     	call	Num1
  14+ B4B0 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ B4B2 CD B7 B4     	call	Num1
  16+ B4B5 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ B4B7              Num1:
  18+ B4B7 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ B4B9              .Num2:
  20+ B4B9 3C           	inc	a
  21+ B4BA 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ B4BB 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ B4BD ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ B4BF 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ B4C0 13           	inc	de
  26+ B4C1 C9           	ret
  27+ B4C2
  28+ B4C2              DispAtoDE:
  29+ B4C2 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ B4C4 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ B4C5 C3 9E B4     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ B4C8
  33+ B4C8              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ B4C8 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ B4CA 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ B4CB 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ B4CE CD DE B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ B4D1 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ B4D3 CD B7 B4     	call	Num1
  40+ B4D6 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ B4D8 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ B4D9 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ B4DA 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ B4DC 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ B4DE              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ B4DE 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ B4E0              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ B4E0 3C           	inc	a
  49+ B4E1 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ B4E2 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ B4E4 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ B4E6 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ B4E8              .Blank:
  54+ B4E8 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ B4EA              .DontBlank:
  56+ B4EA ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ B4EC 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ B4ED 13           	inc	de
  59+ B4EE C9           	ret
  60+ B4EF
  61+ B4EF              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ B4EF FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ B4F1 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ B4F3 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ B4F5 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ B4F6 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ B4F9 CD 05 B5     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ B4FC 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ B4FE CD 05 B5     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ B501 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ B503 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ B505              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ B505 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ B507              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ B507 3C           	inc	a
  76+ B508 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ B509 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ B50B FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ B50D 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ B50F              .Blank:
  81+ B50F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ B511              .DontBlank:
  83+ B511 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ B513 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ B514 13           	inc	de
  86+ B515 C9           	ret
  87+ B516              .NoStock:
  88+ B516 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ B518 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ B519 13           	inc	de
  91+ B51A 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ B51B 13           	inc	de
  93+ B51C 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ B51E 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ B51F 13           	inc de
  96+ B520 C9           	ret
  97+ B521
  98+ B521
  99+ B521              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ B521              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ B521              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ B521              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ B521 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ B525 0A 00 00 00
 103+ B529 64 00 00 00
 103+ B52D E8 03 00 00
 103+ B531 10 27 00 00
 104+ B535 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ B539 40 42 0F 00
 104+ B53D 80 96 98 00
 104+ B541 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ B545 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ B549 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ B54D
 107+ B54D              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ B54D CD 5C B5     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ B550 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ B553 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ B556 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ B558 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ B55B C9                                   ret
 114+ B55C
 115+ B55C DD 22 49 B5  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ B560 ED 53 4B B5                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ B564 DD 21 45 B5                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ B568 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ B56A 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ B56C 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ B56E B7                                   or a
 122+ B56F DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ B572 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ B575 2A 49 B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ B578 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ B57A 22 49 B5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ B57D DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ B580 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ B583 2A 4B B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ B586 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ B588 22 4B B5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ B58B 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ B58D 0C                                   inc c
 134+ B58E 3C                                   inc a
 135+ B58F 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ B591 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ B594 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ B597 2A 49 B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ B59A 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ B59B 22 49 B5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ B59E DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ B5A1 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ B5A4 2A 4B B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ B5A7 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ B5A9 22 4B B5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ B5AC 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ B5AF DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ B5B1 0C                                   inc c
 149+ B5B2 0D                                   dec c
 150+ B5B3 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ B5B5 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ B5B8 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ B5BA 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ B5BC 3A 49 B5                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ B5BF C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ B5C1 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ B5C4 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ B5C8 C9                                   ret
 159+ B5C9
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 668  B5C9              ;;    include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
 669  B5C9              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 670  B5C9              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 671  B5C9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ B5C9              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ B5C9 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ B5CA D2 E5 B5    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ B5CD 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ B5CF CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ B5D1                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ B5D1 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ B5D2 DA E8 B5    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ B5D5 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ B5D6 37                                   scf
   7+ B5D7 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ B5D9 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ B5DB 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ B5DC CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ B5DE CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ B5E0 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ B5E1 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ B5E3 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ B5E4 C9                                   ret
  16+ B5E5 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ B5E7 C9                                   ret
  18+ B5E8 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ B5E9 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ B5EB 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ B5ED C3 DB B5                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ B5F0
  23+ B5F0
  24+ B5F0              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ B5F0              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ B5F0              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ B5F0 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ B5F2 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ B5F4 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ B5F6 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ B5F8              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ B5F8              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ B5F8              TIS2:
  34+ B5F8 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ B5F9 3A 06 9E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ B5FC 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ B5FD 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ B5FE              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ B5FE 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ B5FF E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ B601              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ B601 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ B602 D2 22 B6    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ B605 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ B607              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ B607 CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ B609              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ B609 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ B60A DA 28 B6    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ B60D 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ B60E 37           	scf
  48+ B60F CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ B611 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ B613              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ B613 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ B614 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ B616 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ B618 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ B619 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ B61B 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ B61C 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ B61D 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ B61E E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ B620 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ B621 C9           	ret
  62+ B622              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ B622              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ B622 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ B623 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ B625 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ B627 C9           	ret
  68+ B628              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ B628 B7           	or			a
  70+ B629 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ B62B 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ B62D C3 13 B6     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ B630
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 672  B630                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ B630              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ B630              fmltu:
   3+ B630 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ B631 3A 06 9E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ B634 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ B635 ED 30                                mul
   7+ B637 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ B638 C9                                   ret
   9+ B639
  10+ B639 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ B63A ED 30                                mul
  12+ B63C 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ B63D C9                                   ret
  14+ B63E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 673  B63E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ B63E              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ B63E              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ B63E 21 E6 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ B641 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ B643 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ B645 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ B646 C3 52 B6     		jp		DV41
   8+ B649              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ B649 21 E6 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ B64C 3A EE 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ B64F ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ B651 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ B652              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ B652 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ B653 3A 02 9E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ B656              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ B656 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ B658 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ B65A 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ B65B AF           		xor		a
  21+ B65C              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ B65C CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ B65E 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ B660 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ B661 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ B663              DV8:
  27+ B663 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ B664 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ B665              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ B665 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ B667 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ B669              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ B669              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ B669 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ B66B 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ B66C              .RollRemainder:
  37+ B66C CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ B66E 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ B670 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ B671 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ B673              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ B673 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ B674              .DontSBC:
  44+ B674 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ B676 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ B678 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ B679 32 07 9E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ B67C 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ B67D 32 04 9D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ B680 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ B681              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ B681 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ B682 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ B683 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ B685 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ B687 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ B688 32 07 9E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ B68B 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ B68C 32 04 9D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ B68F C9           		ret
  61+ B690              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ B690 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ B692 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ B693 32 07 9E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ B696 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ B697 32 04 9D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ B69A C9           		ret
  68+ B69B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 674  B69B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ B69B
   2+ B69B              asm_defmutl:
   3+ B69B              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ B69B              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ B69B ED 30        	mul
   6+ B69D 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ B69E C9           	ret
   8+ B69F
   9+ B69F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 675  B69F              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 676  B69F              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 677  B69F              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 678  B69F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ B69F              APequQmulA:
   2+ B69F              asm_mult1:
   3+ B69F              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ B69F FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ B6A1 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ B6A3 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B6A4 3A 06 9E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ B6A7 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ B6A8 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ B6AA 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ B6AC AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ B6AD E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ B6AF 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ B6B0 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ B6B1 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ B6B3 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ B6B4 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ B6B5 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ B6B7 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ B6B8 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ B6BA 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ B6BB 32 04 9D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ B6BE 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ B6BF B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ B6C0 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ B6C1 C9           	ret
  27+ B6C2              .mul0:
  28+ B6C2 AF           	xor	a
  29+ B6C3 32 04 9D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ B6C6 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ B6C7 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ B6C8 C9           	ret
  33+ B6C9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 679  B6C9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ B6C9              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ B6C9              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ B6C9              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ B6C9              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ B6C9              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ B6C9              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ B6C9              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ B6C9              LL38:
   9+ B6C9              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ B6C9              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ B6C9              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ B6C9              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ B6C9              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ B6C9              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ B6C9              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ B6C9              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ B6C9              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ B6C9              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ B6C9              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ B6C9              ;	ret
  21+ B6C9              ; calculation table
  22+ B6C9              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ B6C9              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ B6C9              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ B6C9              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ B6C9              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ B6C9              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ B6C9              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ B6C9              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ B6C9              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ B6C9
  32+ B6C9              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ B6C9              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ B6C9              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ B6C9              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ B6C9
  37+ B6C9
  38+ B6C9              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ B6C9 21 08 9E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ B6CC AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ B6CD FA D8 B6     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ B6D0 3A 06 9E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ B6D3 21 07 9E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ B6D6 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ B6D7 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ B6D8              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ B6D8 3A 07 9E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ B6DB 21 06 9E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ B6DE              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ B6DE              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ B6DE B7          >                        or a
  51+ B6DF 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ B6E0 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ B6E2              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ B6E2              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ B6E2              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ B6E2 C9           	ret
  57+ B6E3              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ B6E3 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ B6E5 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ B6E7 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ B6E9 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ B6EA 3A 08 9E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ B6ED EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ B6EF 32 08 9E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ B6F2 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ B6F3                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ B6F3 B7          >                        or a
  67+ B6F4 C9           	ret
  68+ B6F5              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ B6F5 32 08 9E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ B6F8                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ B6F8 B7          >                        or a
  71+ B6F9 C9               ret
  72+ B6FA              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B6FA              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B6FA              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B6FA              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B6FA              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B6FA              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B6FA              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B6FA              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B6FA              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B6FA              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B6FA              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B6FA              ;--	ret
  84+ B6FA
  85+ B6FA              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B6FA              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B6FA              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B6FA              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B6FA              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B6FA              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B6FA              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B6FA              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B6FA              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B6FA              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B6FA              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B6FA              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B6FA              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B6FA              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B6FA              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B6FA              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B6FA              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B6FA              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B6FA              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B6FA              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B6FA              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B6FA              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B6FA              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B6FA              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B6FA              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B6FA              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B6FA              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B6FA              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B6FA              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B6FA              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B6FA              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B6FA              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B6FA              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B6FA              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B6FA              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B6FA              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B6FA              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B6FA              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B6FA              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B6FA              ;;;;	ret
 141+ B6FA
 142+ B6FA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 680  B6FA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ B6FA              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B6FA              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B6FA              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B6FA
   5+ B6FA
   6+ B6FA              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B6FA 3A EE 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B6FD 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B6FE              moveship4breg:
  10+ B6FE              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B6FE              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B6FE              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B6FE 3A 1C 9D     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B701 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B704 21 12 C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B707 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B708 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B70A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B70B 32 07 9E     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B70E 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B70F 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B710 32 08 9E     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B713 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B714 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B715 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B716 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ B717 32 04 9D     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ B71A 23           		inc		hl
  29+ B71B 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B71C EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B71E CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B721 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B722 23                   inc     hl
  34+ B723 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ B724 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ B725 3A ED 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ B728 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B729 32 04 9D             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B72C 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B72D 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B72E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B72F 32 07 9E             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B732 23                   inc     hl
  44+ B733 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ B734 32 08 9E             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ B737 23                   inc     hl
  47+ B738 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B739 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B73A CD E0 AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B73D 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B73E 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ B73F 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ B740 3A ED 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B743 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B744 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ B745 32 04 9D             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ B748 3A 0F 9D             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B74B 32 06 9E             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B74E 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B74F 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B750 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B751 32 07 9E             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B754 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B755 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B756 32 08 9E             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B759 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B75A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B75B 32 04 9D             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B75E 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B75F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B760 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B762 CD E0 AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B765 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B766 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B767 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B768 3A ED 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B76B 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B76C 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ B76D 32 04 9D             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ B770 23                   inc     hl
  81+ B771 23                   inc     hl
  82+ B772 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ B773 32 07 9E             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ B776 23                   inc     hl
  85+ B777 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ B778 32 08 9E             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ B77B 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ B77C 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ B77D 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ B77E CD E0 AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ B781 23                   inc     hl
  92+ B782 23                   inc     hl
  93+ B783 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ B784 3A ED 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ B787 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ B788 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ B789 C9                   ret

 681  B78A              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
 682  B78A              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
 683  B78A              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
 684  B78A              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
 685  B78A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B78A              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B78A              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B78A              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B78A              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B78A              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B78A              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B78A              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B78A              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B78A              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B78A              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B78A              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B78A              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B78A              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B78A              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B78A              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B78A              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B78A              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B78A              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B78A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B78A              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B78A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B78A              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B78A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B78A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B78A              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B78A              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B78A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B78A              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B78A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B78A              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B78A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B78A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B78A              ;;;	ret
  34+ B78A              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B78A              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B78A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B78A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B78A              ;;;	ret
  39+ B78A
  40+ B78A              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B78A 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B78B 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B78C 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B78E              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B78E 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B78F B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B790 C8             ret z
  48+ B791 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B794 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B796              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B796 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B798 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B799 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B79B C9             ret
  55+ B79C
  56+ B79C              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B79C              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B79C              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B79C              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B79C 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B79E AF                   xor a
  62+ B79F              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B79F 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B7A0 17                   rla
  65+ B7A1 B9                   cp c
  66+ B7A2 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B7A4 91                   sub c
  68+ B7A5 2C                   inc l
  69+ B7A6              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B7A6 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B7A8 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B7A9 32 07 9E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B7AC C9                   ret
  74+ B7AD
  75+ B7AD
  76+ B7AD
  77+ B7AD              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B7AD              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B7AD              BFRDIV:
  80+ B7AD F5           		push	af
  81+ B7AE 3A 06 9E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B7B1 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B7B2 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B7B3 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B7B5 CA CC B7     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B7B8              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B7B8 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B7BA 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B7BB              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B7BB 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B7BD AF           		xor a
  92+ B7BE              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B7BE 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B7BF 17           		rla
  95+ B7C0 B9           		cp c
  96+ B7C1 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B7C3 2C           		inc l
  98+ B7C4 91           		sub c
  99+ B7C5              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B7C5 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B7C7 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B7C8 32 07 9E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B7CB C9           		ret
 104+ B7CC              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B7CC 32 07 9E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B7CF C9           		ret
 107+ B7D0              ;	push	af
 108+ B7D0              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B7D0              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B7D0              ;	pop		af
 111+ B7D0              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B7D0              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B7D0              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B7D0              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B7D0              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B7D0              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B7D0              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B7D0              ;	sla		a
 119+ B7D0              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B7D0              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B7D0              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B7D0              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B7D0              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B7D0              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B7D0              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B7D0              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B7D0              ;	scf
 128+ B7D0              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B7D0              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B7D0              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B7D0              ;LL2:
 132+ B7D0              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B7D0              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B7D0              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B7D0              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B7D0              ;	ret
 137+ B7D0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 686  B7D0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B7D0              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B7D0              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B7D0              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B7D0 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B7D1 3A 06 9E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B7D4 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B7D6 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B7D8 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B7D9 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B7DB AF               xor a
  11+ B7DC              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B7DC CB 21            sla c
  13+ B7DE 17               rla
  14+ B7DF BA               cp d
  15+ B7E0 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B7E2 0C               inc c
  17+ B7E3 92               sub d
  18+ B7E4              LL64:
  19+ B7E4 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B7E6 32 05 9E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B7E9 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B7EA 32 07 9E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B7ED C9               ret
  24+ B7EE              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B7EE 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B7F0 32 07 9E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B7F3 32 05 9E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B7F6 C9           	ret
  29+ B7F7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 687  B7F7              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequABSrs-LL129.asm"

   1+ B7F7              asm_mult12:
   2+ B7F7              RSequQmulA:
   3+ B7F7              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ B7F7 CD 9F B6     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B7FA 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B7FB 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B7FC 32 08 9E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B7FF 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B800 32 07 9E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B803 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ B804 C9           	ret
  12+ B805

   1++B83E              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
