  32+ B877
  33+ B877              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B877              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B877              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B877 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B878 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B879 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B87C 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B87D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B87F CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B882              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B882              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B882              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B882 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B883 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B885 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B886 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B887 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B889 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B88B              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B88B CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B88D              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B88D FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B88F DA 9C B8    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B892 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B894 37           		scf
  56+ B895 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B897 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B899              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B899 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B89A B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B89B C9           		ret
  62+ B89C              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B89C B7           	or			a
  64+ B89D CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B89F 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B8A1 C3 99 B8     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B8A4
  68+ B8A4              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B8A4              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B8A4
  71+ B8A4
  72+ B8A4
  73+ B8A4
  74+ B8A4              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B8A4 CD CF B9     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B8A7 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B8AA C3 E0 B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B8AD
  79+ B8AD              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B8AD AF           		xor		a
  81+ B8AE 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B8AF 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B8B2 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B8B4 CA A4 B8     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B8B7 3A 2A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B8BA 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B8BB 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B8BE CD 95 B9     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B8C1 32 22 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B8C4 C3 E0 B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B8C7              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B8C7              TIDY:
  93+ B8C7 DD 01                break
  94+ B8C9              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B8C9              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B8C9 CD 05 B8     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B8CC CD CA B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B8CF CD 3E B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B8D2              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B8D2 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B8D5 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B8D7 CA AD B8     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B8DA              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B8DA CD 5B B9             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B8DD 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B8E0              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B8E0 CD 18 B8     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B8E3 CD CA B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B8E6              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B8E6 CD 51 B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B8E9 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B8EC 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B8EF 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B8F2 CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B8F5 3A 2A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B8F8 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B8F9 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B8FC CD 77 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B8FF                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B8FF A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B900 CA 05 B9    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B903 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B905              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B905 32 1A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B908              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B908 3A 2A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B90B 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B90E 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B911 CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B914 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B917 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B918 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B91B CD 77 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B91E                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B91E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B91F CA 24 B9    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B922 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B924              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B924 32 28 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B927              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B927 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B92A 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B92D 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B930 CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B933 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B936 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B937 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B93A CD 77 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B93D                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B93D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B93E CA 43 B9    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B941 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B943              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B943 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B946              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B946 21 25 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B949 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B94B AF                   xor     a
 153+ B94C              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B94C 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B94D 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B94E 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B94F 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B951 CD 2B B8     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B954 CD CA B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B957              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B957 CD 64 B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B95A
 163+ B95A C9           		ret
 164+ B95B
 165+ B95B
 166+ B95B
 167+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B95B              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B95B
 239+ B95B
 240+ B95B              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B95B              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B95B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B95B 3A 2A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B95E 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B961 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B964 CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B967              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B967 3A 28 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B96A 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B96D 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B970 CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B973 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B974 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B976 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B978              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B978 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B97B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B97C E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B97E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B980 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B982 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B983 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B985 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B986 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B987 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B988 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B98A CD 3C B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B98D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B98F EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B991 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B993 B0           		or		b
 268+ B994 C9           		ret
 269+ B995
 270+ B995
 271+ B995              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B995              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B995              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B995 3A 2A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B998 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B99B 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B99E CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B9A1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B9A1 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B9A4 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B9A7 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B9AA CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B9AD 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B9AE E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B9B0 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B9B2 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B9B5 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B9B6 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B9B8 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B9BA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B9BC 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B9BD E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B9BF 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B9C0 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B9C1 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B9C2 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B9C4 CD 3C B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B9C7 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B9C9 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B9CB E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B9CD B0           		or		b
 298+ B9CE C9           		ret
 299+ B9CF
 300+ B9CF              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B9CF              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B9CF              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B9CF 3A 28 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B9D2 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B9D5 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B9D8 CD F7 B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B9DB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B9DB 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B9DE 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B9E1 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B9E4 CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B9E7 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B9E8 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B9EA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B9EC 3A 2A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B9EF 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B9F0 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B9F2 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B9F4 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B9F6 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B9F7 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B9F9 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B9FA 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B9FB 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B9FC 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B9FE CD 3C B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ BA01 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ BA03 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ BA05 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ BA07 B0           		or		b
 327+ BA08 C9           		ret
 328+ BA09
 329+ BA09
 330+ BA09
 331+ BA09              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ BA09              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 335+ BA09              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ BA09              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 341+ BA09              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ BA09              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ BA09              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ BA09              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 348+ BA09              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ BA09              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 354+ BA09              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ BA09              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ BA09              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 360+ BA09              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ BA09              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ BA09              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ BA09              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ BA09              ;;		push	bc
 368+ BA09              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ BA09              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ BA09              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ BA09              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ BA09              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ BA09              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ BA09              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ BA09              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ BA09
 377+ BA09
 378+ BA09
 379+ BA09
 380+ BA09
 381+ BA09
 382+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ BA09              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:

 691  BA09                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ BA09
   2+ BA09              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ BA09 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ BA0A D2 28 BA    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ BA0D 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ BA0F CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ BA11 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ BA13                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ BA13 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ BA14 DA 19 BA    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ BA17 92                                   sub     d
   8+ BA18                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ BA18 B7          >                        or a
   9+ BA19 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ BA1A CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ BA1C 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ BA1E 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ BA1F C9                                   ret
  14+ BA20 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ BA21 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ BA22 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ BA24 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ BA26 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ BA27 C9                                   ret
  20+ BA28 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ BA2A C9                                   ret
  22+ BA2B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 692  BA2B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ BA2B              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ BA2B              TIS1:
   3+ BA2B 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ BA2C 3A ED 9C     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ BA2F 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ BA30 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ BA31              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ BA31 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ BA32 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ BA33 32 06 9E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ BA36 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ BA37 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ BA39 CD E0 AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ BA3C              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ BA3C              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ BA3C              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ BA3C 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ BA3D E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ BA3F 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ BA40 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ BA41 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ BA43 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ BA45 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ BA46              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ BA46 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ BA48 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ BA4A 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ BA4C DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ BA4E              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ BA4E CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ BA50 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ BA52 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ BA53 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ BA54 C9           		ret
  35+ BA55
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

   9+ BA69              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  10+ BA69              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS

  12+ BA6C 35                                  dec     (hl)
  13+ BA6D C0                                  ret     nz
  14+ BA6E 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  15+ BA70 32 7A 87                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  16+ BA73                                      ; call    TIDY TIDY IS BROKEN

  19+ BA76 21 55 BA                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  20+ BA79 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  21+ BA7B ED 31                               add      hl,a
  22+ BA7D E9                                  jp       (hl)                                    ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  23+ BA7E C9                                   ret

  72+ BACB              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
  72+ BACB AF          >                        xor a

  74+ BACF 21 10 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates

  84+ BAE5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  85+ BAE5              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  86+ BAE5 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  87+ BAE5 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  88+ BAE5 ~                                    xor     (hl)
  89+ BAE5 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  90+ BAE5 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  91+ BAE5 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  92+ BAE5 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  93+ BAE5 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
  94+ BAE5 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  95+ BAE5 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  96+ BAE5 ~                                    NegHL
  97+ BAE5 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
  98+ BAE5 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  99+ BAE5 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 100+ BAE5 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 101+ BAE5 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 102+ BAE5 ~                                    ld      a,l
 103+ BAE5 ~                                    and     a
 104+ BAE5 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 105+ BAE5                                      ENDM

 107+ BAE5              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work

 176+ BBD0              ;... Now the tactics if current ship is the missile, when we enter this SelectedUniverseSlot holds slot of missile

 177+ BBD4 CA D8 BC    >                        jp      z, .ProcessMissileHit
 178+ BBD7              .CheckForECM:           JumpIfMemNotZero ECMCountDown,.ECMIsActive        ; If ECM is running then kill the missile
 178+ BBD7 3A 18 9D    >                        ld  a,(ECMCountDown)
 178+ BBDA A7          >                        and a
 178+ BBDB C2 E1 BC    >                        jp  nz,.ECMIsActive
 179+ BBDE 3A 32 C3     .IsMissileHostile:      ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                 ; is missle attacking us?
 180+ BBE1 E6 04                                and     ShipIsHostile
 181+ BBE3                                      JumpIfZero .MissileTargetingShip            ; Missile is not targetting us
 181+ BBE3 CA FA BB    >                        jp	z,.MissileTargetingShip

 183+ BBE9 3A 2D C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileDetonateRange)
 184+ BBEC 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; c holds detonation range
 185+ BBED CD A6 BB                             call    MissileHitUsCheckPos
 186+ BBF0 D2 F9 BB     .MissileNotHitUsYet:    jp      nc, .UpdateTargetingUsPos
 187+ BBF3 CD B1 BA     .MissleHitUs:           call    PlayerHitByMissile

 191+ BBFD C6 46        .SaveMissileBank:       add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
 192+ BBFF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 193+ BC01 3A 35 C0     .SaveTargetBank:        ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)               ; target will be used a lot too
 194+ BC04 C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
 195+ BC06 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                               ; save target
 196+ BC08              .IsMissleTargetGone:    JumpIfSlotAEmpty    .ECMIsActive            ; if the target was blown up then detonate

 196+ BC0D 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 196+ BC0E 3C          >                        inc     a
 196+ BC0F CA E1 BC    >                        jp      z,.ECMIsActive    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 196+ BC12 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 197+ BC13              ;... Note we don't have to check for impact as we already have a loop doing that
 198+ BC13 FD 7C        .SelectTargetShip:      ld      a,iyh                               ; paged in target
 199+ BC15                                      MMUSelectUnivBankA
 199+ BC15 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 200+ BC18 3A 43 C0     .IsShipExploding:       ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                    ; check exploding status
 201+ BC1B E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ; as if exploding then the missile will also explode
 202+ BC1D 20 08                                jr      nz,.UpdateTargetingShipX
 203+ BC1F              .ShipIsExploding:       SelectMissileBank                           ; get missile back into memory
 203+ BC1F FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 203+ BC21             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 203+ BC21 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 204+ BC24 C3 E1 BC                             jp      .ECMIsActive
 205+ BC27              ;--- At this point we already have the target banked in ready for calculating vector
 206+ BC27              .UpdateTargetingShipX
 206+ BC27 ED 5B 10 C0   ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get target ship X
 207+ BC2B 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 208+ BC2E                                      FlipSignBitA
 208+ BC2E EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 209+ BC30 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 210+ BC31                                      SelectMissileBank
 210+ BC31 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 210+ BC33             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 210+ BC33 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 211+ BC36 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 212+ BC39 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 213+ BC3C 47                                   ld      b,a
 214+ BC3D CD A2 AC                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 215+ BC40 22 EB BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 216+ BC43 32 ED BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 217+ BC46              .UpdateTargetingShipY
 217+ BC46 ED 5B 13 C0   ld      de,(UBnKylo)                        ; get target ship X
 218+ BC4A 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 219+ BC4D                                      FlipSignBitA
 219+ BC4D EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 220+ BC4F 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 221+ BC50                                      SelectMissileBank
 221+ BC50 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 221+ BC52             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 221+ BC52 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 222+ BC55 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 223+ BC58 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 224+ BC5B 47                                   ld      b,a
 225+ BC5C CD A2 AC                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 226+ BC5F 22 EE BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 227+ BC62 32 F0 BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 228+ BC65              .UpdateTargetingShipZ
 228+ BC65 ED 5B 16 C0   ld      de,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get target ship X
 229+ BC69 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 230+ BC6C                                      FlipSignBitA
 230+ BC6C EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 231+ BC6E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 232+ BC6F                                      SelectMissileBank
 232+ BC6F FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 232+ BC71             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 232+ BC71 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 233+ BC74 2A 16 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 234+ BC77 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 235+ BC7A 47                                   ld      b,a
 236+ BC7B CD A2 AC                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 237+ BC7E 22 F1 BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 238+ BC81 32 F3 BC                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 239+ BC84              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 240+ BC84              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 241+ BC84 2A EC BC     .CheckDistance:         ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set
 242+ BC87 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 243+ BC88 ED 5B EF BC                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 244+ BC8C B2                                   or      d                                  ; .
 245+ BC8D ED 4B F2 BC                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 246+ BC91 B0                                   or      b                                  ; .
 247+ BC92                                      ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 247+ BC92 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 248+ BC94                                      JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 248+ BC94 C2 A3 BC    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 249+ BC97 B5                                   or      l                                  ; test for low byte bit 7
 250+ BC98 B3                                   or      e                                  ; .
 251+ BC99 B1                                   or      c                                  ; .
 252+ BC9A                                      JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 252+ BC9A C2 A3 BC    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 253+ BC9D              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 254+ BC9D 3A 35 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 255+ BCA0 C3 B2 BA                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 256+ BCA3              ;   *far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0
 257+ BCA3              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 257+ BCA3 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 257+ BCA5             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 257+ BCA5 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 258+ BCA8                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 258+ BCA8 3A 49 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 258+ BCAB A7          >                        and     a
 258+ BCAC C2 C9 BC    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 259+ BCAF                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 259+ BCAF 3A 47 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 259+ BCB2 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 259+ BCB4 DA C9 BC    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 260+ BCB7                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 260+ BCB7 3A 18 9D    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 260+ BCBA A7          >                        and     a
 260+ BCBB C2 C9 BC    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 261+ BCBE 3A FB 9C     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 262+ BCC1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 262+ BCC1 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 262+ BCC3 D2 C9 BC    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 263+ BCC6              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 264+ BCC6 C3 66 C5     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 265+ BCC9              ;                       implicit ret
 266+ BCC9              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 267+ BCC9              .NoECM:
 268+ BCC9              .UpdateMissilePos:      SelectMissileBank
 268+ BCC9 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 268+ BCCB             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 268+ BCCB ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 269+ BCCE 21 EB BC                             ld      hl,TacticsVectorX                  ;           normalise vector K3 into XX15
 270+ BCD1 11 92 C0                             ld      de,XX15
 271+ BCD4 01 09 00                             ld      bc, 9
 272+ BCD7                                    ;;; ldir
 273+ BCD7                                    ;;; call    ** Need a 24 bit normalise here
 274+ BCD7                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 275+ BCD7                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 276+ BCD7                                      ;           AX = nosev . XX15
 277+ BCD7                                      ;           CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 278+ BCD7                                      ;           negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 279+ BCD7                                      ;           negate value of CNT so +ve if facing or -ve if facing same way
 280+ BCD7                                      ;           AX = roofv.XX15
 281+ BCD7                                      ;           SaveA
 282+ BCD7                                      ;           ships pitch counter = calculate teh shipt pitch counter (jsr nroll)
 283+ BCD7                                      ;           get roll counter from ship byte 29 (value = abs(byte 29 * 2) ,e. shift left
 284+ BCD7                                      ;           if roll counter < 32
 285+ BCD7                                      ;               AX = sidev . XX15
 286+ BCD7                                      ;               A = A xor pitch counter sigh
 287+ BCD7                                      ;               byte 29 = calcualte nroll to get ship pitch counter into
 288+ BCD7                                      ;           get back CNT
 289+ BCD7                                      ;           if CNT >= 0 AND CNT < CNT2 ** how is CNT2 set up?
 290+ BCD7                                      ;             then
 291+ BCD7                                      ;               Accelleration (byte 28) = 3
 292+ BCD7                                      ;               return
 293+ BCD7                                      ;           A = ABS(CNT)
 294+ BCD7                                      ;          if |CNT| >=  18
 295+ BCD7                                      ;            then
 296+ BCD7                                      ;              ship accelleration = -2
 297+ BCD7 C9                                   ret
 298+ BCD8
 299+ BCD8
 300+ BCD8
 301+ BCD8
 302+ BCD8                                      ;
 303+ BCD8                                      ; else
 304+ BCD8                                      ;   *close enough for a detoniation
 305+ BCD8                                      ;   if target is a space station, set space station to trigger ECM and destroy missile (note that compromised station will not trigger ECM)
 306+ BCD8                                      ;   process missile hit object
 307+ BCD8                                      ;   work out if blast hit anythign else including us
 308+ BCD8
 309+ BCD8 3A D5 9E     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 310+ BCDB                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 310+ BCDB FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 310+ BCDD D0          >                        ret	 nc
 311+ BCDE C3 CB BA     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 312+ BCE1                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 313+ BCE1 CD ED C5     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 314+ BCE4                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 314+ BCE4 AF          >                        xor     a
 314+ BCE5 32 34 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 315+ BCE8 C3 D8 BC                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 316+ BCEB                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 317+ BCEB
 318+ BCEB
 319+ BCEB 00 00 00     TacticsVectorX:         DS 3
 320+ BCEE 00 00 00     TacticsVectorY:         DS 3
 321+ BCF1 00 00 00     TacticsVectorZ:         DS 3
 322+ BCF4 00 00        TacticsNormX:           DS 2
 323+ BCF6 00 00        TacticsNormY:           DS 2
 324+ BCF8 00 00        TacticsNormZ:           DS 2

# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm
 701  BCFA                  INCLUDE "./Hardware/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm
   1+ BCFA              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ BCFA              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ BCFA              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ BCFA              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ BCFA              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ BCFA              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ BCFA
   8+ BCFA              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ BCFA              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ BCFA              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ BCFA
  12+ BCFA              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  13+ BCFA              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  14+ BCFA F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  14+ BCFE DD E5
  15+ BD00 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  16+ BD01 CF                                   rst	    $08
  17+ BD02 89                                   db	    $89
  18+ BD03 32 0D BD                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  19+ BD06 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  19+ BD0A C1 F1
  20+ BD0C C9                                   ret
  21+ BD0D 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  22+ BD0E
  23+ BD0E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  24+ BD0E              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  25+ BD0E              ;	In:		ix = filename
  26+ BD0E              ;			b  = Open filemode
  27+ BD0E              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  28+ BD0E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  29+ BD0E E5           fOpen:	                push	hl
  30+ BD0F DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  31+ BD12 3A 0D BD                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  32+ BD15 CF                                   rst	    $08
  33+ BD16 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  34+ BD17 E1                                   pop	    hl
  35+ BD18 C9                                   ret
  36+ BD19
  37+ BD19              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  38+ BD19              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  39+ BD19              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  40+ BD19              ;			bc  = amount to read
  41+ BD19              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  42+ BD19              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  43+ BD19 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  44+ BD1A C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  45+ BD1B E5                                   push    hl
  46+ BD1C DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  47+ BD1F CF                                   rst	    $08
  48+ BD20 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  49+ BD21 E1                                   pop	    hl
  50+ BD22 C9                                   ret
  51+ BD23
  52+ BD23              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  53+ BD23              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  54+ BD23              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  55+ BD23              ;			bc  = amount to read
  56+ BD23              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  57+ BD23              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  58+ BD23 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  59+ BD24 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  60+ BD25 E5                                   push	hl
  61+ BD26 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  62+ BD29 CF                                   rst	    $08
  63+ BD2A 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  64+ BD2B E1                                   pop	    hl
  65+ BD2C C9                                   ret
  66+ BD2D
  67+ BD2D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  68+ BD2D              ;	Function:	Close open file
  69+ BD2D              ;	In:		a  = handle
  70+ BD2D              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  71+ BD2D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  72+ BD2D B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  73+ BD2E C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  74+ BD2F CF                                   rst	    $08
  75+ BD30 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  76+ BD31 C9                                   ret
  77+ BD32
  78+ BD32              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ BD32              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  80+ BD32              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  81+ BD32              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  82+ BD32              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  83+ BD32              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  84+ BD32              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  85+ BD32 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  86+ BD35 CF                                   rst	    $08
  87+ BD36 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  88+ BD37 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  89+ BD3A C9                                   ret
  90+ BD3B
  91+ BD3B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ BD3B              ; Init the file system
  93+ BD3B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  94+ BD3B CD FA BC     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  95+ BD3E C9                                   ret
  96+ BD3F
  97+ BD3F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  98+ BD3F              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  99+ BD3F              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 100+ BD3F              ;		    ix = address to load to
 101+ BD3F              ;           bc = filelength
 102+ BD3F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 103+ BD3F CD FA BC     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 104+ BD42 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 105+ BD45                                      ; get file size
 106+ BD45 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 107+ BD48 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 108+ BD4B 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 109+ BD4D CD 0E BD                             call    fOpen
 110+ BD50 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 111+ BD52 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 112+ BD54 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 113+ BD56 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 114+ BD59 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 115+ BD5A CD 19 BD                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 116+ BD5D 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 117+ BD5F F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 118+ BD60 CD 2D BD                             call	fClose			; close file
 119+ BD63 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 120+ BD65 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 121+ BD68 C9                                   ret
 122+ BD69              ;
 123+ BD69              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 124+ BD69              ;
 125+ BD69 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 126+ BD6B C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 127+ BD6C
 128+ BD6C              .error_closing:
 129+ BD6C C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 130+ BD6D D1                                   pop	de
 131+ BD6E C1                                   pop	bc
 132+ BD6F C9                                   ret
 133+ BD70
 134+ BD70              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 135+ BD70              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 136+ BD70              ; In:		hl = file name
 137+ BD70              ;		    ix = address to save from
 138+ BD70              ;		    bc = size
 139+ BD70              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 140+ BD70 CD FA BC     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 141+ BD73 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 142+ BD76 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 143+ BD79 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 144+ BD7B CD 0E BD                             call    fOpen
 145+ BD7E 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 146+ BD80 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 147+ BD82 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 148+ BD84 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 149+ BD87 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 150+ BD88 CD 23 BD                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 151+ BD8B 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 152+ BD8D F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 153+ BD8E CD 2D BD                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 154+ BD91 C9           .error:                 ret
 155+ BD92              ;
 156+ BD92              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 157+ BD92              ;
 158+ BD92 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 159+ BD95 C9                                   ret
 160+ BD96
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  18+ BE43
  19+ BE43              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ BE43              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ BE43              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ BE43 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ BE44 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ BE45 23           	inc			hl
  25+ BE46 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ BE47 23           	inc			hl
  27+ BE48 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ BE49 23           	inc			hl
  29+ BE4A 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ BE4B 23           	inc			hl
  31+ BE4C E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ BE4D EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ BE4E 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ BE50                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ BE50 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ BE54 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ BE57 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ BE58 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ BE59 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ BE5B C9           	ret
  40+ BE5C
  41+ BE5C
  42+ BE5C              print_boiler_text:
  43+ BE5C              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ BE5C              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ BE5C C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ BE5D 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ BE5E 23           	inc			hl
  48+ BE5F 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ BE60 23           	inc			hl
  50+ BE61 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ BE62 23           	inc			hl
  52+ BE63 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ BE64 23           	inc			hl
  54+ BE65 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ BE66 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ BE67 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ BE69 C5           	push		bc
  58+ BE6A D1           	pop			de
  59+ BE6B CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ BE6E E1           	pop			hl
  61+ BE6F C1           	pop			bc
  62+ BE70 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ BE72 C9           	ret

  65+ BE73              GetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
   1++BE73
   2++BE73
   3++BE73 3A 6C A3     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++BE76 11 21 BE     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++BE79 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++BE7B CD 85 BE     	call	.Num1
   7++BE7E 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++BE80 CD 85 BE     	call	.Num1
   9++BE83 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++BE85              .Num1:
  11++BE85 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++BE87              .Num2:
  13++BE87 04           	inc		b
  14++BE88 81           	add		a,c
  15++BE89 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++BE8B 91           	sub 	c
  17++BE8C C5           	push	bc
  18++BE8D F5           	push	af
  19++BE8E 79           	ld		a,c
  20++BE8F FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++BE91 CC 9A BE     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++BE94 78           	ld		a,b
  23++BE95 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++BE96 13           	inc		de
  25++BE97 F1           	pop		af
  26++BE98 C1           	pop		bc
  27++BE99 C9           	ret
  28++BE9A              .InsertDot:
  29++BE9A 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++BE9C 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++BE9D 13           	inc		de
  32++BE9E C9           	ret

  66+ BE9F
  67+ BE9F 2A 68 A3     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ BEA2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ BEA3 DD 2A 6A A3                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ BEA7 FD 21 32 BE                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ BEAB CD 5C B5                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ BEAE FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ BEB1 32 3E BE                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ BEB4 21 33 BE     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ BEB7 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ BEB8 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ BEBA C8                                   ret		z
  78+ BEBB FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ BEBF C9                                   ret

   1++C0C2

   3++C0C2              .BoilerTextLoop:

  49+ C0FD ED 5B 0E 9F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  50+ C101 0E 80                                ld		c,src_x_centre
  51+ C103 06 60                                ld		b,src_y_centre
  52+ C105                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank

  56+ C10D 3A FB 9E     src_get_name:           ld      a,(Galaxy)
  57+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
  57+ C110 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  58+ C113 ED 4B 10 9F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
  59+ C117 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
  60+ C11B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor
  61+ C11E FE 00                                cp      0
  62+ C120 C8                                   ret     z
  63+ C121 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  64+ C124 21 27 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
  65+ C127 CD 82 AB                             call	CapitaliseString
  66+ C12A 21 27 AC                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  67+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  68+ C12F C9                                   ret
  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B 10 9F                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B 0E 9F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD D0 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret

 149+ C1CD 3A FB 9E     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B 0E 9F                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B 10 9F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 97 9E                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 5C B5                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 80 B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 80 B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 80 B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 29 A4     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A FB 9E                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 257+ C2BF 21 27 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 258+ C2C2 CD 82 AB                             call	CapitaliseString
 259+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 260+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 263+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 27 AC                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 269+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 287+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 294+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 295+ C303 21 27 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 296+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 296+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 297+ C30A CD 24 E2                             call	l2_print_7at

 300+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 301+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 302+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 303+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 305+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 306+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 307+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 308+ C31A 21 CC 9D                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 309+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 310+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 311+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 312+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 313+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 314+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 315+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 317+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 318+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 319+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 320+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 321+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 322+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 323+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 324+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 325+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 326+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 327+ C33A CD 29 A4     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working

 329+ C340                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 329+ C340 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a

 335+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y

 337+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 361+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 362+ C38F 3A 0F 9F     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
