 438+ C736 C9                                   ret
 439+ C737
 440+ C737
 441+ C737 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 442+ C738 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 443+ C73A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 444+ C73B AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 445+ C73C                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 445+ C73C FA 54 C7    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 446+ C73F 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 447+ C740 B2                                   or      d
 448+ C741                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 448+ C741 FA 46 C7    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 449+ C744 19                                   add     hl,de
 450+ C745 C9                                   ret
 451+ C746 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 452+ C747 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 453+ C749 67                                   ld      h,a
 454+ C74A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 455+ C74B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 456+ C74D 57                                   ld      d,a
 457+ C74E 19                                   add     hl,de
 458+ C74F 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 459+ C751 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 460+ C752 67                                   ld      h,a
 461+ C753 C9                                   ret
 462+ C754 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 463+ C755 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 464+ C757 67                                   ld      h,a
 465+ C758 7A                                   ld      a,d
 466+ C759 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 467+ C75B 57                                   ld      d,a
 468+ C75C B7                                   or      a
 469+ C75D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 470+ C75F 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 471+ C761 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 472+ C762 B4                                   or      h
 473+ C763 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 474+ C764 C9                                   ret
 475+ C765              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 475+ C765 AF          >                    xor a
 475+ C766 95          >                    sub l
 475+ C767 6F          >                    ld l,a
 475+ C768 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 475+ C769 94          >                    sub h
 475+ C76A 67          >                    ld h,a
 476+ C76B 78                                   ld      a,b
 477+ C76C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 478+ C76E B4                                   or      h
 479+ C76F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 480+ C770 C9                                   ret
 481+ C771
 482+ C771              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 483+ C771 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 484+ C772 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 485+ C774 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 486+ C775 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 487+ C776                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 487+ C776 FA A4 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 488+ C779 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 489+ C77A B2                                   or      d
 490+ C77B                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 490+ C77B FA 85 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 491+ C77E B7                                   or      a
 492+ C77F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 493+ C781                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 493+ C781 FA 98 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 494+ C784 C9                                   ret
 495+ C785 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 496+ C786 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 497+ C788 67                                   ld      h,a
 498+ C789 7A                                   ld      a,d
 499+ C78A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 500+ C78C 57                                   ld      d,a
 501+ C78D B7                                   or      a
 502+ C78E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 503+ C790                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 503+ C790 FA 98 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 504+ C793 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 505+ C794 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 506+ C796 67                                   ld      h,a
 507+ C797 C9                                   ret
 508+ C798              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 508+ C798 AF          >                    xor a
 508+ C799 95          >                    sub l
 508+ C79A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 508+ C79B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 508+ C79C 94          >                    sub h
 508+ C79D 67          >                    ld h,a
 509+ C79E 78                                   ld      a,b
 510+ C79F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 511+ C7A1 B4                                   or      h
 512+ C7A2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 513+ C7A3 C9                                   ret
 514+ C7A4 B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 515+ C7A5 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 516+ C7A6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 517+ C7A8 67                                   ld      h,a
 518+ C7A9 7A                                   ld      a,d
 519+ C7AA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 520+ C7AC 57                                   ld      d,a
 521+ C7AD 19                                   add     hl,de
 522+ C7AE 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 523+ C7AF B4                                   or      h
 524+ C7B0 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 525+ C7B1 C9                                   ret
 526+ C7B2
 527+ C7B2
 528+ C7B2              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 528+ C7B2 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 528+ C7B4 C2 C5 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 529+ C7B7              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 529+ C7B7 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 529+ C7B9 C2 C5 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 530+ C7BC ED 52        SBCHLDEhlPosDePos:      sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 531+ C7BE C9                                   ret
 532+ C7BF CB BA        SBCHLDEhlPosDeNeg:      res     7,d
 533+ C7C1 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 534+ C7C2 CB FA                                set     7,d
 535+ C7C4 C9                                   ret
 536+ C7C5 CB BC        SBCHLDEhlNeg:           res     7,h
 537+ C7C7                                      JumpOnBitSet d,7,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 537+ C7C7 CB 7A       >                        bit 	7,d
 537+ C7C9 C2 D1 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 538+ C7CC ED 52        SBCHLDEhlNegdePos:      sbc     hl,de                       ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 539+ C7CE CB FC                                set     7,h
 540+ C7D0 C9                                   ret
 541+ C7D1 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 542+ C7D3 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 543+ C7D4 CB FA                                set     7,d
 544+ C7D6 CB FC                                set     7,h
 545+ C7D8 C9                                   ret
 546+ C7D9
 547+ C7D9              ; Roate around axis
 548+ C7D9              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 549+ C7D9              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 550+ C7D9              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 551+ C7D9              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 552+ C7D9              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 553+ C7D9              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 554+ C7D9              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 555+ C7D9              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 556+ C7D9              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 557+ C7D9 2A E9 9C     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 558+ C7DC 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 559+ C7DD 23                                   inc     hl
 560+ C7DE 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 561+ C7DF EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 562+ C7E0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 563+ C7E1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 564+ C7E3 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 565+ C7E5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 566+ C7E6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 567+ C7E8 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 568+ C7EA 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 569+ C7EB FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 570+ C7ED 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 571+ C7EE B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 572+ C7EF CD 71 C7                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 573+ C7F2              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 574+ C7F2 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 575+ C7F3 7D                                   ld      a,l
 576+ C7F4 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a
 577+ C7F7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 578+ C7F8 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 579+ C7FB              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 580+ C7FB 2A EB 9C                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 581+ C7FE 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 582+ C7FF 23                                   inc     hl
 583+ C800 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 584+ C801 7A                                   ld      a,d
 585+ C802 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 586+ C804 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 587+ C806 7A                                   ld      a,d
 588+ C807 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 589+ C809 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 590+ C80A                                      ShiftDERight1
 590+ C80A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 590+ C80C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 591+ C80E                                      ShiftDERight1
 591+ C80E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 591+ C810 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 592+ C812                                      ShiftDERight1
 592+ C812 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 592+ C814 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 593+ C816                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 593+ C816 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 593+ C818 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 594+ C81A 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 595+ C81D FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 596+ C81F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 597+ C821 B2                                   or      d
 598+ C822 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 599+ C823              ;;; ld      a,e
 600+ C823              ;;;     or      iyh
 601+ C823              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 602+ C823              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 603+ C823 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 604+ C824                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 605+ C824              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 606+ C824 CD 37 C7                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 607+ C827 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 608+ C828              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 609+ C828              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 610+ C828 2A EB 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 611+ C82B 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 612+ C82C 23                               inc     hl
 613+ C82D 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 614+ C82E EB                               ex      de,hl
 615+ C82F 7C                               ld      a,h
 616+ C830 E6 80                            and     $80
 617+ C832 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 618+ C834 7C                               ld      a,h
 619+ C835 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 620+ C837 CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 621+ C839 5F                               ld      e,a
 622+ C83A FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 623+ C83C 57                               ld      d,a
 624+ C83D B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 625+ C83E CD 71 C7                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 626+ C841              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 627+ C841 E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 628+ C842 7D                               ld      a,l
 629+ C843 32 04 9D                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 630+ C846 7C                               ld      a,h
 631+ C847 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 632+ C849 32 22 9E                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 633+ C84C              ;-- Set up TQ
 634+ C84C 2A E9 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 635+ C84F              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 636+ C84F 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 637+ C850 23                               inc     hl
 638+ C851 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 639+ C852 7A                               ld      a,d
 640+ C853 E6 80                            and     $80
 641+ C855 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 642+ C857 7A                               ld      a,d
 643+ C858 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 644+ C85A 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 645+ C85B                                  ShiftDERight1
 645+ C85B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 645+ C85D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 646+ C85F                                  ShiftDERight1
 646+ C85F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 646+ C861 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 647+ C863                                  ShiftDERight1
 647+ C863 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 647+ C865 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 648+ C867                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 648+ C867 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 648+ C869 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 649+ C86B 3A 3F C0                         ld      a,(univRAT2)
 650+ C86E FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 651+ C870 E6 80                            and     $80
 652+ C872 B2                               or      d
 653+ C873 57                               ld      d,a
 654+ C874              ;;; ld      a,e
 655+ C874              ;;;     or      iyh
 656+ C874              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 657+ C874 E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 658+ C875              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 659+ C875 CD 71 C7                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 660+ C878              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 661+ C878 EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 662+ C879 2A EB 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 663+ C87C 73                               ld      (hl),e
 664+ C87D 23                               inc     hl
 665+ C87E 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 666+ C87F              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 667+ C87F D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 668+ C880 2A E9 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 669+ C883 73                               ld      (hl),e
 670+ C884 23                               inc     hl
 671+ C885 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 672+ C886 C9                               ret
 673+ C887
 674+ C887                                  include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++C887              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   2++C887              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   3++C887              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++C887              InitialiseOrientation:
   5++C887 21 00 00     ZI1:                    ld      hl, 0
   6++C88A 22 1B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   7++C88D 22 1D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++C890 22 1F C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++C893 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++C896 22 25 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++C899 22 27 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++C89C 21 00 60                             ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  13++C89F                                      ;ld      hl,1
  14++C89F 22 19 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  15++C8A2 22 21 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  16++C8A5 21 00 E0                             ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  17++C8A8 22 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  18++C8AB C9                                   ret
  19++C8AC
  20++C8AC              InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation:
  21++C8AC CD 87 C8                             call    InitialiseOrientation
  22++C8AF 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000
  23++C8B2 22 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl           ; mius
  24++C8B5 C9                                   ret
  25++C8B6
  26++C8B6
  27++C8B6              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  28++C8B6              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  29++C8B6              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  30++C8B6 CD 87 C8     LaunchedOrientation:    call    InitialiseOrientation
  31++C8B9                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  31++C8B9 3A 26 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  31++C8BC EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  31++C8BE 32 26 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  32++C8C1                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  32++C8C1 3A 28 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  32++C8C4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  32++C8C6 32 28 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  33++C8C9                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  33++C8C9 3A 2A C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  33++C8CC EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  33++C8CE 32 2A C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  34++C8D1 C9                                   ret
  35++C8D2
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 675+ C8D2
 676+ C8D2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 677+ C8D2              OrientateVertex:
 678+ C8D2
 679+ C8D2              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 680+ C8D2              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 681+ C8D2              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 682+ C8D2              ;
 683+ C8D2
 684+ C8D2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 685+ C8D2              TransposeVertex:
 686+ C8D2              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 687+ C8D2              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 688+ C8D2              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 689+ C8D2              VectorToVertex:
 690+ C8D2              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 691+ C8D2              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 692+ C8D2              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 693+ C8D2              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 694+ C8D2              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 695+ C8D2 32 06 9D     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
 696+ C8D5                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
 696+ C8D5 2A 16 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
 696+ C8D8 22 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
 697+ C8DB 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
 698+ C8DE 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
 699+ C8E1 ED 5B 04 9D  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
 700+ C8E5 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
 701+ C8E6 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
 702+ C8E8 32 04 9D                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
 703+ C8EB 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
 704+ C8EC 3A 06 9D                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 705+ C8EF 21 08 9E                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 706+ C8F2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 707+ C8F3 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 708+ C8F5 32 22 9E                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 709+ C8F8 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 710+ C8FB 3A 06 9D                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 711+ C8FE E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 712+ C900              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 712+ C900 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 712+ C902 D2 10 C9    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 713+ C905                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 713+ C905 CB 23       >			   sla e
 713+ C907 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 714+ C909 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 715+ C90B FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 716+ C90D C2 00 C9                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 717+ C910 32 06 9D     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 718+ C913 ED 53 04 9D                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 719+ C917 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 720+ C91A E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 721+ C91C                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 722+ C91C 2A 06 9E                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 723+ C91F FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 724+ C921                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 724+ C921 CB 25       >			   sla l
 724+ C923 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 725+ C925 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 726+ C927 F2 1F C9                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 727+ C92A 22 06 9E     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 728+ C92D 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 729+ C930 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 730+ C932 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 731+ C935 3A 06 9D                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 732+ C938 CD 9A AE                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 733+ C93B 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 734+ C93D 32 1A 9E                             ld      (varKp1),a
 735+ C940 32 1B 9E                             ld      (varKp2),a
 736+ C943 32 1C 9E                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 737+ C946 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 738+ C948                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 738+ C948 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 738+ C94A CA 75 C9    >                        jp      z,DV12
 739+ C94D 3A 07 9E                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 740+ C950 ED 5B 19 9E                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 741+ C954 2A 1D 9E                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 742+ C957 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 743+ C958 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 744+ C95A CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 745+ C95C CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 746+ C95E CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 747+ C960 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 748+ C962 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 749+ C964 ED 53 19 9E  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 750+ C968 22 1D 9E                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 751+ C96B 3A 22 9E                             ld      a,(varT)
 752+ C96E 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 753+ C96F 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 754+ C970 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 755+ C971 32 2C 9E                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 756+ C974 C9                                   ret
 757+ C975              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 757+ C975 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 757+ C976 CA 8D C9    >                        jp	    z, DV13
 758+ C979 3A 07 9E                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 759+ C97C CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 760+ C97E FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 761+ C980 C2 7C C9                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 762+ C983 32 19 9E                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 763+ C986                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 763+ C986 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 763+ C989 32 1C 9E    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 764+ C98C C9                                   ret
 765+ C98D              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 765+ C98D 3A 07 9E    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 765+ C990 32 19 9E    >                        ld       (varK),a

 766+ C993 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 766+ C996 32 1C 9E    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 767+ C999 C9                                   ret
 768+ C99A
 769+ C99A CD D2 C8     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 770+ C99D 3A 1C 9E                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 771+ C9A0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 772+ C9A2 21 1B 9E                             ld      hl,varKp2
 773+ C9A5 B6                                   or      (hl)
 774+ C9A6 C2 BB C9                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 775+ C9A9 3A 1A 9E                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 776+ C9AC FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 777+ C9AE 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 778+ C9B0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 778+ C9B0 B7          >                        or a
 779+ C9B1 2A 19 9E                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 780+ C9B4 3A 1C 9E                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 781+ C9B7 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 782+ C9B9 C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 783+ C9BA C9           PL44:                   ret
 784+ C9BB 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 785+ C9BC C9                                   ret
 786+ C9BD              Project:
 787+ C9BD 2A 10 C0     PROJ:                   ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; Project K+INWK(x,y)/z to K3,K4 for center to screen
 788+ C9C0 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl
 789+ C9C3 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 790+ C9C6 CD 9A C9                             call    PLS6                            ; returns result in K (0 1) (unsigned) and K (3) = sign note to no longer does 2's C
 791+ C9C9 D8                                   ret     c                               ; carry means don't print
 792+ C9CA 2A 19 9E                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 793+ C9CD                                      ; Now the question is as hl is the fractional part, should this be multiplied by 127 to get the actual range
 794+ C9CD 3E 80                                ld      a,ViewCenterX
 795+ C9CF ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 796+ C9D1 22 2C 9E                             ld      (varK3),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 797+ C9D4 2A 13 C0     ProjectY:               ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 798+ C9D7 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl
 799+ C9DA 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 800+ C9DD CD 9A C9                             call    PLS6
 801+ C9E0 D8                                   ret     c
 802+ C9E1 2A 19 9E                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 803+ C9E4 3E 40                                ld      a,ViewCenterY
 804+ C9E6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 805+ C9E8 22 32 9E                             ld      (varK4),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 806+ C9EB C9                                   ret

  10++C9EC              	ReturnOnMemBitClear UBnKexplDsp,3       ; bit 3 denotes that there is nothing to erase as its already done

  10++C9EF CB 5F       >                        bit 	3,a

  30++CA1E                                      ;       push    af

  38++CA27 20 03                                jr      nz,.LL107

  43++CA2C                                      ;        pop     af

  45++CA2C              ; so XX13 = 0 if x2_hi = y2_hi = 0, y2_lo is on-screen,  XX13 = 191 if x2_hi or y2_hi are non-zero or y2_lo is off the bottom of the screen
  46++CA2C FD 7C        .LL107                  ld      a,iyh

  49++CA32 B0                                   or      b                           ;
  50++CA33 20 27                                jr      nz,.LL83                    ;
  51++CA35 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; or (y1 lo > bottom of screen)
  52++CA36 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; i.e  screen height < y1)
  53++CA39 20 21                                jr      nz,.LL83
  54++CA3B              ; If we get here, (x1, y1) is on-screen

  56++CA3D FE 00                                cp      0
  57++CA3F 20 15                                jr      nz, .LL108
  58++CA41              ; Finished clipping exit point ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  59++CA41 79           .ClipDone:              ld      a,c                         ; LL146 (Clip Done)               Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
  60++CA42 32 93 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
  61++CA45 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl

  67++CA52                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; carry is clear so valid to plot is in XX15(0to3)
  67++CA52 B7          >                        or a
  68++CA53 C9                                   ret                                 ; 2nd pro different, it swops based on swop flag around here.
  69++CA54              ; Finished out of bounds exit point -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70++CA54 37           .PointsOutofBounds:     scf                                 ; LL109 (ClipFailed) carry flag set as not visible
  71++CA55 C9                                   ret
  72++CA56 FD 7C        .LL108:                 ld      a,iyh
  73++CA58 B7                                   or      a

  75++CA5A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; (X2Y2 Off Screen)         XX13 = 95 (i.e. divide it by 2)                                                 -- X1Y1 on screen X2Y2 off screen

  83++CA63 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If both x1_hi and x2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  84++CA64 A2                                   and     d
  85++CA65                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  85++CA65 FA 54 CA    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds

  87++CA69 DD A4                                and     ixh
  88++CA6B                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds

  90++CA6F 3D                                   dec     a

  99++CA76 F2 54 CA    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds
 100++CA79              ;by here we have eliminated -ve Y1 bounds so can just test for positive high and bit 7 of lo
 101++CA79 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh

 110++CA88 FA 54 CA    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
 111++CA8B              ; Clip line: calulate the line's gradient
 112++CA8B              ; here as an optimisation we make sure X1 is always < X2  later on
 113++CA8B              .LL115:                 ClearCarryFlag
 113++CA8B B7          >                        or a
 114++CA8C E5 D5        .CalcDX:                push    hl,,de
 115++CA8E EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; so hl is x2 and de = x1
 116++CA8F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 117++CA91                                     ; pop     de                          ; we need de back
 118++CA91 22 FA C9                             ld      (clipDx),hl
 119++CA94 7C                                   ld      a,h
 120++CA95 32 FC C9                             ld      (clipDxHighNonABS),a

 122++CA98                                     ; sbc     a,l                         ;a= a - x1
 123++CA98                                     ; ld      (clipDx),a
 124++CA98                                     ; ld      a,d
 125++CA98                                     ; sbc     a,h
 126++CA98                                     ; ld      (clipDxHigh),a                ; later we will just move to sub hl,de
 127++CA98                                     ; ld      (clipDxHighNonABS),a          ; it looks liek we need this later post scale loop
 128++CA98              .CalcDy:                ClearCarryFlag
 128++CA98 B7          >                        or a
 129++CA99 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 130++CA9C ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc
 131++CA9E 54 5D                                ld      de,hl           ;;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21
 132++CAA0 22 FD C9                             ld      (clipDy),hl     ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 133++CAA3 7C           .CalcQuadrant:          ld      a,h
 134++CAA4                                     ; ld      a,ixl
 135++CAA4                                     ; sbc     c
 136++CAA4                                     ; ld      (clipDy),a
 137++CAA4                                     ; ld      a,ixh
 138++CAA4                                     ; sbc     a,b
 139++CAA4                                     ; ld      (clipDyHigh),a              ; so A = sign of deltay in effect
 140++CAA4                                     ; pop     hl
 141++CAA4
 142++CAA4              ;So we now have delta_x in XX12(3 2), delta_y in XX12(5 4)  where the delta is (x1, y1) - (x2, y2))
 143++CAA4                                    ;  push    hl                          ; Set S = the sign of delta_x * the sign of delta_y, so if bit 7 of S is set, the deltas have different signs
 144++CAA4 21 FB C9                             ld      hl,clipDxHigh
 145++CAA7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; now a = sign dx xor sign dy
 146++CAA8 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; DEBGU putting it in var S too for now
 147++CAAB 32 00 CA                             ld      (clipDxySign),a
 148++CAAE 3A FE C9     .AbsDy:                 ld      a,(clipDyHigh)
 149++CAB1 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 150++CAB4 28 0C                                jr      z,.LL110                    ; If delta_y_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 151++CAB6 2A FD C9                             ld      hl,(clipDy)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 152++CAB9                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 152++CAB9 AF          >					xor 	a
 152++CABA 93          >                    sub 	e
 152++CABB 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 152++CABC 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 152++CABD 92          >                    sub 	d
 152++CABE 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 153++CABF 22 FD C9                             ld      (clipDy),hl                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 154++CAC2 2A FA C9     .LL110:                 ld      hl,(clipDx)
 155++CAC5 3A FB C9                             ld      a,(clipDxHigh)
 156++CAC8 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; is it a negative X
 157++CACB 28 06                                jr      z,.LL111                    ; If delta_x_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 158++CACD                                      ;ld      hl,(clipDx)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 159++CACD                                      macronegate16hl                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 159++CACD AF          >					xor 	a
 159++CACE 95          >					sub 	l
 159++CACF 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 159++CAD0 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 159++CAD1 94          >					sub 	h
 159++CAD2 67          >					ld 		h,a
 160++CAD3                                     ; ld      (clipDx),hl                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out; we still retain the old sign in NonABS version
 161++CAD3              .LL111:               ;  push    de
 162++CAD3                                     ; ld      hl,(clipDx)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 163++CAD3                                     ; ld      de,(clipDy)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 164++CAD3 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                         ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 165++CAD4 B2                                   or      d
 166++CAD5 28 0A                                jr      z,.CalculateDelta
 166++CAD7
 167++CAD7                                      ShiftDERight1
 167++CAD7 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 167++CAD9 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 168++CADB                                      ShiftHLRight1
 168++CADB CB 3C       >			   srl h
 168++CADD CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 169++CADF 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                  ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been negative
 170++CAE1              .CalculateDelta:        ;ld      (clipDx),hl                ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 171++CAE1                                      ;ld      (clipDy),de                ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 172++CAE1              ; By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero We know that h and d are both = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ
 173++CAE1 AF           .LL113:                 xor     a
 174++CAE2 32 22 9E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; t = 0
 175++CAE5 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 176++CAE6                                      JumpIfALTNusng  e, .LL114           ;
 176++CAE6 BB          >                        cp      e
 176++CAE7 DA F7 CA    >                        jp		c, .LL114
 177++CAEA              ; Here Dx >= Dy sp calculate Delta Y / delta X
 178++CAEA 32 06 9E     .DxGTEDy:               ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = delta_x_lo
 179++CAED 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = also Q for calc
 180++CAEE 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; Set A = delta_y_lo
 181++CAEF CD D8 B0                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate:  R (actually a reg) = 256 * A / Q   = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 182++CAF2 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 183++CAF5 18 10                                jr      .LL116                      ; Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 184++CAF7              ; Here Delta Y > Delta X so calulate delta X / delta Y
 185++CAF7 7B           .LL114:                 ld      a,e                         ; Set Q = delta_y_lo
 186++CAF8 57                                   ld      d,a
 187++CAF9 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a
 188++CAFC 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; Set A = delta_x_lo
 189++CAFD CD D8 B0                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q  = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 190++CB00 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 191++CB03 21 22 9E                             ld      hl,varT                     ; T was set to 0 above, so this sets T = &FF
 192++CB06 35                                   dec     (hl)
 193++CB07 D1           .LL116:                 pop     de                          ; get back X2
 194++CB08 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; get back X1 into hl,
 195++CB09 3A 07 9E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; Store the gradient in XX12+2 this can be optimised later
 196++CB0C 32 FF C9                             ld      (clipGradient),a
 197++CB0F FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 198++CB11                                      ;       push    af                   ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 199++CB11                                      ;       ld      a,iyl                ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 200++CB11                                      ;       ld      (varXX12p2),a        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 201++CB11                                      ;       pop     af                   ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 202++CB11 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)
 203++CB14 32 00 CA                             ld      (clipDxySign),a             ;  Store the type of slope in XX12+3, bit 7 clear means ?Not needed as clipDxySign is used for varS earlier?
 204++CB17                                                                          ; top left to bottom right, bit 7 set means top right to bottom left **CODE IS WRONG HERE A TEST IS BL to TR
 205++CB17 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh was XX13 from earlier
 206++CB19 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; If XX13 = 0, skip the following instruction
 207++CB1B 28 05                                jr      z,.LL138                    ;
 208++CB1D ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If XX13 is positive, it must be 95. This means (x1, y1) is on-screen but (x2, y2) isn't, so we jump to LLX117 to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
 209++CB20 28 13                                jr      z,.LLX117                   ; coordinates around before doing the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 210++CB22              ; If we get here, XX13 = 0 or 191, so (x1, y1) is off-screen and needs clipping
 211++CB22 CD 49 CB     .LL138                  call    ClipPointHLBC               ; Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 212++CB25 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; If XX13 = 0, i.e. (x2, y2) is on-screen, jump down to LL124 to return with a successfully clipped line
 213++CB27 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 214++CB2A 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL124
 215++CB2C              ; If we get here, XX13 = 191 (both coordinates are off-screen)
 216++CB2C 7C           .LL117:                 ld      a,h                         ; If either of x1_hi or y1_hi are non-zero, jump to
 217++CB2D B0                                   or      b                           ; LL137 to return from the subroutine with the C flag
 218++CB2E C2 54 CA                             jp      nz, .PointsOutofBounds      ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 219++CB31 B1                                   or      c                           ; if x1 and y1 hi are both zero test bit 8 or Y1 to see if its > 128
 220++CB32 FA 54 CA                             jp      m, .PointsOutofBounds       ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 221++CB35              ; If we get here, XX13 = 95 or 191, and in both cases (x2, y2) is off-screen, so we now need to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) coordinates around before doing
 222++CB35              ; the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 223++CB35 EB           .LLX117:                ex      de,hl                       ;  swap X1 and X2
 224++CB36 DD E5                                push    ix                          ;  swap Y1 and Y2
 225++CB38 C5                                   push    bc
 226++CB39 DD E1                                pop     ix
 227++CB3B C1                                   pop     bc
 228++CB3C CD 49 CB                             call    ClipPointHLBC               ;  Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 229++CB3F 3A 03 CA                             ld      a,(SWAP)
 230++CB42 3D                                   dec     a
 231++CB43 32 03 CA                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; Set SWAP = &FF to indicate that we just clipped the line at the (x2, y2) end by swapping the coordinates (the DEC does this as we set SWAP to 0 at the start of this subroutine)
 232++CB46 C3 41 CA     .LL124:                 jp      .ClipDone                    ; now put points in place
 233++CB49
 234++CB49              ; Move a point along a line until it is on-screen point is held in HL(X) BC(Y) LL118
 235++CB49              ; iyh still holds XX13 iyl still holds gradient
 236++CB49 7C           ClipPointHLBC:          ld      a,h                         ; If x1_hi is positive, jump down to LL119 to skip the following
 237++CB4A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 238++CB4D 28 17                                jr      z,.LL119
 239++CB4F 32 08 9E     .X1isNegative:          ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is negative, i.e. off the left of the screen, so set S = x1_hi
 240++CB52 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 241++CB55 CD CB CB                             call    LL120                       ;  Call LL120 to calculate:   (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0   = x1 * gradient
 242++CB58                                                                          ;                             (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0  = x1 / gradient
 243++CB58                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 244++CB58 C1 D1 E1                             pop    hl,,de,,bc                   ;  get coordinates back
 245++CB5B 2A 04 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 246++CB5E              ;                        ex      hl,de
 247++CB5E                                  ;    ld      hl,bc
 248++CB5E 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; y1 = y1 + varYX
 249++CB5F 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 250++CB61 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; Set x1 = 0
 251++CB64               ;                       pop     de
 252++CB64 18 1A                                jr      .LL134                      ; in BBC is set x to 0 to force jump, we will just jump
 253++CB66 FE 00        .LL119:                 cp      0
 254++CB68 28 16                                jr      z,.LL134                    ;  If x1_hi = 0 then jump down to LL134 to skip the following, as the x-coordinate is already on-screen (as 0 <= (x_hi x_lo) <= 255)
 255++CB6A 3D                                   dec     a
 256++CB6B 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is positive, i.e. x1 >= 256 and off the right side of the screen, so set S = x1_hi - 1
 257++CB6E E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 258++CB71 CD CB CB                             call    LL120                      ;  Call LL120 to calculate: (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0  = (x1 - 256) * gradient
 259++CB74                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0 = (x1 - 256) / gradient
 260++CB74                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of theline's direction of slope
 261++CB74 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 262++CB77                                    ;  push    de                          ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 263++CB77 2A 04 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 264++CB7A                                    ; ex      de,hl                       ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 265++CB7A 09                                   add     hl,bc                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 266++CB7B 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 267++CB7D                                    ; ex      hl,de                       ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 268++CB7D                                    ; ld      hl,bc                       ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 269++CB7D                                    ; add     hl,de                       ; y1 = y1 + varYX
 270++CB7D 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                      ; Set x1 = 255
 271++CB80                                    ;  pop     de
 272++CB80              ; We have moved the point so the x-coordinate is on screen (i.e. in the range 0-255), so now for they-coordinate
 273++CB80 78           .LL134:                 ld      a,b                         ; If y1_hi is positive, jump down to LL135  to skip the following
 274++CB81 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
 275++CB84 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL135                    ;
 276++CB86 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; Otherwise y1_hi is negative, i.e. off the top of the screen, so set S = y1_hi
 277++CB89 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; Set R = y1_lo
 278++CB8A 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 279++CB8D E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 280++CB90 CD F2 CB                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 281++CB93                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 282++CB93                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 283++CB93 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 284++CB96 D5                                   push    de
 285++CB97 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; de = x1
 286++CB98 2A 04 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)                  ; hl = varYX
 287++CB9B 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 288++CB9C D1                                   pop     de                          ; de = x2 again
 289++CB9D 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                        ; Set y1 = 0
 290++CBA0 79           .LL135:                 ld      a,c                         ; if bc < 128 then no work to do
 291++CBA1 E6 80                                and     $80
 292++CBA3 B0                                   or      b                           ; here we see if c bit 8 is set or anything in b as we know if its 0 this would mean there is no need to clip
 293++CBA4 C8                                   ret     z
 294++CBA5 E5                                   push    hl
 295++CBA6 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 296++CBA8 01 80 00                             ld      bc,128
 297++CBAB B7                                   or      a
 298++CBAC ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                       ; hl =  (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - 128
 299++CBAE 22 07 9E                             ld      (varRS), hl                 ; and now RS (or SR)
 300++CBB1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 301++CBB2 E1                                   pop     hl
 302++CBB3 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If the subtraction underflowed, i.e. if y1 < 192, then y1 is already on-screen, so jump to LL136 to return from the subroutine, as we are done
 303++CBB6 C0                                   ret     nz
 304++CBB7              ; If we get here then y1 >= 192, i.e. off the bottom of the screen
 305++CBB7 E5 D5 C5     .LL139:                 push    hl,,de,,bc
 306++CBBA CD F2 CB                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 307++CBBD                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 308++CBBD                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 309++CBBD C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 310++CBC0 D5                                   push    de
 311++CBC1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 312++CBC2 2A 04 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 313++CBC5 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 314++CBC6 01 7F 00                             ld      bc,127                      ; set bc to 127 bottom of screen
 315++CBC9 D1                                   pop     de
 316++CBCA C9           .LL136:                 ret                                 ;  Return from the subroutine
 317++CBCB
 318++CBCB
 319++CBCB              ; Calculate the following:   * If T = 0  (more vertical than horizontal), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2
 320++CBCB              ;                            * If T <> 0 (more horizontal than vertical), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2
 321++CBCB              ;                              giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 322++CBCB              ; Other entry points        LL122                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) * Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 323++CBCB 7D           LL120:                  ld      a,l                          ; Set R = x1_lo
 324++CBCC 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a
 325++CBCF CD 3A CC                             call    LL129                        ;  Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 326++CBD2 F5                                   push    af                           ;  Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 327++CBD3 C5                                   push    bc
 328++CBD4 47                                   ld      b,a
 329++CBD5 3A 22 9E                             ld      a,(varT)                     ; instead : (Y X) = (S R ) / Q
 330++CBD8 FE 00                                cp      0
 331++CBDA 78                                   ld      a,b
 332++CBDB C1                                   pop     bc                           ; we can't use af as that would disrupt the flags
 333++CBDC 20 23                                jr      nz, LL121
 334++CBDE              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 335++CBDE 3A FF C9     LL122:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 336++CBE1 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 337++CBE4 CD BB AE                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 338++CBE7 22 04 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 339++CBEA F1                                   pop     af
 340++CBEB ED 27 80                             test    $80
 341++CBEE CA 2D CC                             jp      z,LL133
 342++CBF1 C9                                   ret
 343++CBF2              ; Calculate the following: * If T = 0,  calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2 (actually SR & XX12+2 /256)
 344++CBF2              ;                          * If T <> 0, calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 345++CBF2              ;                          giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 346++CBF2              ;
 347++CBF2              ; Other entry points:      LL121                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) / Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 348++CBF2              ;                          LL133                Negate (Y X) and return from the subroutine
 349++CBF2              ;                          LL128                Contains an RTS
 350++CBF2 CD 3A CC     LL123:                  call    LL129                       ; Call LL129 to do the following: Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 351++CBF5 F5                                   push    af                          ; Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 352++CBF6 C5                                   push    bc                          ; If T is non-zero, so it's more horizontal than vertical, jump down to LL121 to calculate this
 353++CBF7 47                                   ld      b,a
 354++CBF8 3A 22 9E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; instead : (Y X) = (S R) * Q *** this looks to be the wrong way roudn for Y!!!!
 355++CBFB FE 00                                cp      0
 356++CBFD 78                                   ld      a,b
 357++CBFE C1                                   pop     bc
 358++CBFF 20 DD                                jr      nz, LL122
 359++CC01              ; The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2, its actually X.Y=R.S*256/Q
 360++CC01 11 FE FF     LL121:                  ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 361++CC04 2A 07 9E                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 362++CC07 3A 06 9E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 363++CC0A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 364++CC0B              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 364++CC0B CB 25       >			   sla l
 364++CC0D CB 14       >			   rl  h
 365++CC0F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 366++CC10 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 367++CC12                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 367++CC12 B8          >                        cp      b
 367++CC13 DA 1E CC    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 368++CC16 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 369++CC17 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 370++CC18 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 371++CC19 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 372++CC1A DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 373++CC1C 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 374++CC1D 3F                                   ccf
 375++CC1E              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 375++CC1E CB 13       >               rl  e
 375++CC20 CB 12       >               rl  d
 376++CC22 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 377++CC24 ED 53 04 CA                          ld      (varYX),de
 378++CC28 F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 379++CC29 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 380++CC2C C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 381++CC2D 2A 04 CA     LL133:                  ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 382++CC30                                      NegHL
 382++CC30 AF          >                    xor a
 382++CC31 95          >                    sub l
 382++CC32 6F          >                    ld l,a
 382++CC33 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 382++CC34 94          >                    sub h
 382++CC35 67          >                    ld h,a
 383++CC36 22 04 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 384++CC39 C9           LL128:                  ret
 385++CC3A              ; Do the following, in this order:  Q = XX12+2
 386++CC3A              ;                                   A = S EOR XX12+3
 387++CC3A              ;                                   (S R) = |S R|
 388++CC3A              ; This sets up the variables required above to calculate (S R) / XX12+2 and give the result the opposite sign to XX13+3.
 389++CC3A 3A FF C9     LL129:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 390++CC3D 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;Set Q = XX12+2
 391++CC40 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; If S is positive, jump to LL127
 392++CC43 E5 F5                                push    hl,,af
 393++CC45 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 394++CC48 28 0C                                jr      z,.LL127
 395++CC4A 2A 07 9E                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; else SR = | SR|
 396++CC4D                                      NegHL
 396++CC4D AF          >                    xor a
 396++CC4E 95          >                    sub l
 396++CC4F 6F          >                    ld l,a
 396++CC50 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 396++CC51 94          >                    sub h
 396++CC52 67          >                    ld h,a
 397++CC53 22 07 9E                             ld      (varRS),hl
 398++CC56 21 00 CA     .LL127:                 ld      hl,clipDxySign
 399++CC59 F1                                   pop     af
 400++CC5A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; a = S XOR clipDxySign
 401++CC5B E1                                   pop     hl
 402++CC5C C9                                   ret
 403++CC5D
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
 811+ CC5D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 812+ CC5D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CC5D              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CC5D              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CC5D              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CC5D              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CC5D              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CC5D              CopyRotmatToTransMat:                       ; Tested
   7++CC5D 21 19 C0     LL15_CopyRotMat:        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
   8++CC60
   9++CC60 11 4D C0                             ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  10++CC63                                      SixLDIInstrunctions
  10++CC63 ED A0       >                        ldi
  10++CC65 ED A0       >                        ldi
  10++CC67 ED A0       >                        ldi
  10++CC69 ED A0       >                        ldi
  10++CC6B ED A0       >                        ldi
  10++CC6D ED A0       >                        ldi
  11++CC6F 21 1F C0                             ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  12++CC72 11 53 C0                             ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  13++CC75                                      SixLDIInstrunctions
  13++CC75 ED A0       >                        ldi
  13++CC77 ED A0       >                        ldi
  13++CC79 ED A0       >                        ldi
  13++CC7B ED A0       >                        ldi
  13++CC7D ED A0       >                        ldi
  13++CC7F ED A0       >                        ldi
  14++CC81 21 25 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  15++CC84 11 59 C0                             ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  16++CC87                                      SixLDIInstrunctions

  16++CC89 ED A0       >                        ldi
  16++CC8B ED A0       >                        ldi

  17++CC93 C9                                   ret
  18++CC94

  20++CC94 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX

  22++CC94 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
