 813+ CC94                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CC94              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CC94 2A 98 C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CC97 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CC98 E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CC9A 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CC9B                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CC9B 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CC9C E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CC9E 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CC9F                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CC9F ED 5B 10 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CCA3 3A 12 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CCA6 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CCA8 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CCA9 CD A2 AC     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CCAC B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CCAD 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CCAE 22 92 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CCB1              ; ..................................
  20++CCB1 2A 9A C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CCB4 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CCB5 E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CCB7 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CCB8                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CCB8 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CCB9 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CCBB 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CCBC                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CCBC ED 5B 13 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CCC0 3A 15 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CCC3 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CCC5 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CCC6 CD A2 AC     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CCC9 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CCCA 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CCCB 22 94 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CCCE              ; ..................................
  38++CCCE 2A 9C C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CCD1 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CCD2 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CCD4 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CCD5                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CCD5 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CCD6 E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CCD8 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CCD9                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CCD9 ED 5B 16 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CCDD 3A 18 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CCE0 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CCE2 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CCE3 CD A2 AC     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CCE6 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CCE7 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CCE8 CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CCEA 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CCEC E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CCEE 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CCF0 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CCF1              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CCF1 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CCF3 DA 02 CD    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CCF6              NoClampZto4:
  61++CCF6 22 96 C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CCF9 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CCFA 32 22 9E             ld      (varT),a
  64++CCFD 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CCFE 32 05 9E             ld      (varU),a
  66++CD01 C9           		ret
  67++CD02              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CD02 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CD05 22 96 C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CD08 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CD09 32 22 9E             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CD0C 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CD0D 32 05 9E             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CD10 C9           		ret
  75++CD11
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 814+ CD11                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CD11              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CD11 ED 4B 96 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CD15 2A 92 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CD18 ED 5B 94 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CD1C              SetABSbc:
   6++CD1C 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CD1D DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CD1F E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CD21 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CD22              SetABShl:
  11++CD22 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CD23 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CD25 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CD27 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CD28              SetABSde:
  16++CD28 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CD29 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CD2B E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CD2D 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CD2E              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CD2E 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CD2F B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CD30 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CD31 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CD33                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CD33 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CD35 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CD37                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CD37 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CD39 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CD3B              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CD3B CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CD3D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CD3F C3 2E CD         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CD42              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CD42 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CD44 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CD46 B0           	or			b
  33++CD47 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CD48              SignforHL:
  35++CD48 DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CD4A E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CD4C B4           	or			h
  38++CD4D 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CD4E              SignforDE:
  40++CD4E FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CD50 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CD52 B2           	or			d
  43++CD53 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CD54              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CD54 ED 43 96 C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CD58 22 92 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CD5B ED 53 94 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CD5F 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CD60 32 05 9E     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CD63 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CD64 32 22 9E     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CD67 C9           	ret
  53++CD68
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 842+ CD8E CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;

 863+ CD9F                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CD9F              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CD9F              Norm256mulAdivQ:
   3++CD9F 47               ld      b,a
   4++CDA0 0E 00            ld      c,0
   5++CDA2 16 00            ld      d,0
   6++CDA4 3A 06 9E         ld      a,(varQ)
   7++CDA7 5F               ld      e,a
   8++CDA8              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   9++CDA8              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  10++CDA8              NormDIV16UNDOC:
  11++CDA8 21 00 00         ld      hl,0
  12++CDAB 78               ld      a,b
  13++CDAC 06 10            ld      b,16
  14++CDAE              NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:
  15++CDAE CB 31        	sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  16++CDB0 17           	rla	    		; ...
  17++CDB1 ED 6A        	adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  18++CDB3 ED 52        	sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  19++CDB5 30 02        	jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  20++CDB7 19           	add	    hl,de		; ...
  21++CDB8 0D           	dec	    c		; ...
  22++CDB9              NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:
  23++CDB9 10 F3            djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  24++CDBB 79               ld      a,c
  25++CDBC 32 07 9E         ld      (varR),a
  26++CDBF C9               ret
  27++CDC0
  28++CDC0 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  29++CDC2                                      ClearSignBitA
  29++CDC2 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  30++CDC4 CD 9F CD                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  31++CDC7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  32++CDC9                                      SignBitOnlyA
  32++CDC9 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  33++CDCB B1                                   or      c
  34++CDCC 32 07 9E                             ld      (varR),a
  35++CDCF C9                                   ret
  36++CDD0
  37++CDD0              ; Tested OK
  38++CDD0              ;LL21
  39++CDD0              NormaliseTransMat:
  40++CDD0                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  41++CDD0 21 5E C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  42++CDD3 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  43++CDD5                              MMUSelectMathsTables
  43++CDD5 ED 91 50 63 >                     nextreg MathsTablesMMU,    BankMathsTables
  44++CDD9 56           .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  45++CDDA 2B                           dec     hl
  46++CDDB 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  47++CDDC                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  47++CDDC CB 23       >			   sla e
  47++CDDE CB 12       >			   rl  d
  48++CDE0 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  49++CDE1 E5                           push	hl
  50++CDE2 C5                           push	bc
  51++CDE3 CD CB 00                     call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  52++CDE6                              ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  53++CDE6 C1                           pop		bc
  54++CDE7 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  55++CDE8 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  56++CDE9 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  57++CDEA 10 ED                        djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  58++CDEC                              MMUSelectROM0
  58++CDEC ED 91 50 FF >                     nextreg EXSDOSMMU0,        BankROM
  59++CDF0 C9                           ret
  60++CDF1                      ELSE
  61++CDF1 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  62++CDF1 ~                            ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  63++CDF1 ~                            ld      a,c
  64++CDF1 ~                            ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  65++CDF1 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  66++CDF1 ~            LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  67++CDF1 ~                            dec     hl
  68++CDF1 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  69++CDF1 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  70++CDF1 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  71++CDF1 ~                            push	hl
  72++CDF1 ~                            push	bc
  73++CDF1 ~                            call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  74++CDF1 ~                            ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  75++CDF1 ~                            ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  76++CDF1 ~                            pop		bc
  77++CDF1 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  78++CDF1 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  79++CDF1 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  80++CDF1 ~                            djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  81++CDF1 ~                            ret
  82++CDF1                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm

# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm
   1++CDF1              ; Tested OK
   2++CDF1              ;LL21
   3++CDF1
   4++CDF1
   5++CDF1 2A EB BC     NormaliseTactics:   ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
   6++CDF4 ED 5B EE BC                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
   7++CDF8 ED 4B F1 BC                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
   8++CDFC 3A ED BC                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
   9++CDFF FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
  10++CE01 3A F0 BC                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
  11++CE04 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
  12++CE06 3A F3 BC                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
  13++CE09 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
  14++CE0B FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
  15++CE0D FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
  16++CE0F                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
  16++CE0F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  17++CE11 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
  18++CE13 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
  19++CE15 CB 2F                            sra     a
  20++CE17 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
  21++CE19 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
  22++CE1B CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
  23++CE1D FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
  24++CE1F CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
  25++CE21 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
  26++CE23 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
  27++CE25 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
  28++CE27 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
  29++CE29 CB 2F                            sra     a
  30++CE2B DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
  31++CE2D CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
  32++CE2F CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
  33++CE31 C3 0B CE                         jp      .ScaleLoop
  34++CE34 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
  35++CE35 B2                               or      d
  36++CE36 B0                               or      b
  37++CE37                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
  37++CE37 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  38++CE39 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
  39++CE3B              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
  39++CE3B CB 3C       >			   srl h
  39++CE3D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  40++CE3F                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
  40++CE3F CB 3A       >			   srl d
  40++CE41 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  41++CE43                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
  41++CE43 CB 38       >			   srl b
  41++CE45 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  42++CE47 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
  43++CE48 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
  44++CE4A 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
  45++CE4B 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
  46++CE4C FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
  47++CE4E 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
  48++CE4F 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
  49++CE50 DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
  50++CE52 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
  51++CE53 22 F4 BC                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
  52++CE56 22 F6 BC                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
  53++CE59 22 F8 BC                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
  54++CE5C                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  55++CE5C 21 F9 BC                         ld      hl,TacticsNormZ+1           ; initialise loop
  56++CE5F 06 03                            ld      b,3                         ; total of 3 elements to transform
  57++CE61                                  MMUSelectMathsTables
  57++CE61 ED 91 50 63 >                     nextreg MathsTablesMMU,    BankMathsTables
  58++CE65 56           .LL21Loop:          ld      d,(hl)
  59++CE66 2B                               dec     hl
  60++CE67 5E                               ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  61++CE68                                  ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  61++CE68 CB 23       >			   sla e
  61++CE6A CB 12       >			   rl  d
  62++CE6C 7A                               ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  63++CE6D E5                               push	hl
  64++CE6E C5                               push	bc
  65++CE6F CD CB 00                         call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  66++CE72                                  ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  67++CE72 C1                               pop		bc
  68++CE73 E1                               pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  69++CE74 77                               ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  70++CE75 2B                               dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  71++CE76 10 ED                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  72++CE78                                  MMUSelectROM0
  72++CE78 ED 91 50 FF >                     nextreg EXSDOSMMU0,        BankROM
  73++CE7C C9                               ret
  74++CE7D                      ELSE
  75++CE7D ~                                ld      hl,TacticsNormZ+1           ; initialise loop
  76++CE7D ~                                ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  77++CE7D ~                                ld      a,c
  78++CE7D ~                                ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  79++CE7D ~                                ld      b,3                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  80++CE7D ~            LL21Loop:           ld      d,(hl)
  81++CE7D ~                                dec     hl
  82++CE7D ~                                ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  83++CE7D ~                                ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  84++CE7D ~                                ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  85++CE7D ~                                push	hl
  86++CE7D ~                                push	bc
  87++CE7D ~                                call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  88++CE7D ~                                ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  89++CE7D ~                                ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  90++CE7D ~                                pop		bc
  91++CE7D ~                                pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  92++CE7D ~                                ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  93++CE7D ~                                dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  94++CE7D ~                                djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  95++CE7D ~                                ret
  96++CE7D                      ENDIF

   1++CE7D              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CE7D
   3++CE7D              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CE7D              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CE7D              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CE7D              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CE7D              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CE7D              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CE7D              ;ScaleNode:

  21++CE7D
  22++CE7D              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CE7D              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CE7D              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CE7D              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CE7D              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CE7D              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CE7D              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CE7D              ; OUTPUT
  30++CE7D              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CE7D              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CE7D              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CE7D              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CE7D 2A 4D C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CE80 ED 5B 53 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CE84 ED 4B 59 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CE88 22 65 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CE8B ED 53 67 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CE8F ED 43 69 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CE93 2A 4F C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CE96 ED 5B 55 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CE9A ED 4B 5B C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CE9E 22 6D C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CEA1 ED 53 6F C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CEA5 ED 43 71 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CEA9 2A 51 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CEAC ED 5B 57 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CEB0 ED 4B 5D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CEB4 22 75 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CEB7 ED 53 77 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CEBB ED 43 79 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CEBF C9                   ret
  53++CEC0
  54++CEC0
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 874+ CEC0              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 875+ CEC0              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 876+ CEC0              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 877+ CEC0              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 878+ CEC0              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 879+ CEC0              ; Returns
 880+ CEC0              ;
 881+ CEC0              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 882+ CEC0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 883+ CEC0              ;
 884+ CEC0              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 885+ CEC0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 886+ CEC0              ;
 887+ CEC0              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 888+ CEC0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 889+ CEC0              XXCURRENTN0equN1byN2div256: MACRO param1, param2, param3
 890+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      c,0
 891+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,param3                      ;
 892+ CEC0 ~                                    bit     7,a
 893+ CEC0 ~                                    jr      z,.val2Pos
 894+ CEC0 ~            ;HandleSignebits
 895+ CEC0 ~                                    neg
 896+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      c,$80
 897+ CEC0 ~            .val2Pos:               ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 898+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,param2                        ; A = XX16 element
 899+ CEC0 ~                                    bit     7,a
 900+ CEC0 ~                                    jr      z,.val1Pos
 901+ CEC0 ~            ;HandleSignebits
 902+ CEC0 ~                                    neg
 903+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      b,a
 904+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,c
 905+ CEC0 ~                                    xor     $80
 906+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      c,a
 907+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,b
 908+ CEC0 ~            .val1Pos:               ld      d,a
 909+ CEC0 ~            ;AequAmulQdiv256:
 910+ CEC0 ~                                    mul
 911+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,c
 912+ CEC0 ~                                    bit     7,a
 913+ CEC0 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 914+ CEC0 ~                                    jr      z,.resultPos
 915+ CEC0 ~                                    neg
 916+ CEC0 ~            .resultPos:             ld      (param1),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 917+ CEC0                                      ENDM
 918+ CEC0
 919+ CEC0
 920+ CEC0               ; TESTEDOK
 921+ CEC0              XX12DotOneRow:
 922+ CEC0              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 922+ CEC0 3A 92 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 922+ CEC3 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 922+ CEC4 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 922+ CEC5 57          >                        ld      d,a
 922+ CEC6 ED 30       >                        mul
 922+ CEC8 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 922+ CEC9 32 22 9E    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 923+ CECC 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 924+ CECD              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 924+ CECD 3A 93 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 924+ CED0 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 925+ CED1 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 926+ CED4 23                                   inc     hl
 927+ CED5              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 927+ CED5 3A 94 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 927+ CED8 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 927+ CED9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 927+ CEDA 57          >                        ld      d,a
 927+ CEDB ED 30       >                        mul
 927+ CEDD 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 927+ CEDE 32 06 9E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 928+ CEE1                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 928+ CEE1 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 928+ CEE4 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 929+ CEE7 23                                   inc     hl
 930+ CEE8                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 930+ CEE8 3A 95 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 930+ CEEB AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 931+ CEEC              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 932+ CEEC E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 933+ CEED CD C9 B6                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 934+ CEF0 E1                                   pop     hl
 935+ CEF1 32 22 9E                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 936+ CEF4 23                                   inc     hl
 937+ CEF5              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 937+ CEF5 3A 96 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 937+ CEF8 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 937+ CEF9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 937+ CEFA 57          >                        ld      d,a
 937+ CEFB ED 30       >                        mul
 937+ CEFD 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 937+ CEFE 32 06 9E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 938+ CF01                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 938+ CF01 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 938+ CF04 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 939+ CF07 23                                   inc     hl
 940+ CF08                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 940+ CF08 3A 97 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 940+ CF0B AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 941+ CF0C              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 942+ CF0C CD C9 B6                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 943+ CF0F              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 944+ CF0F C9                                   ret
 945+ CF10
 946+ CF10
 947+ CF10              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 948+ CF10              ;TESTED OK
 949+ CF10              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 950+ CF10              XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 951+ CF10 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 952+ CF13 21 4D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 953+ CF16 CD C0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 954+ CF19 32 98 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 955+ CF1C 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)
 956+ CF1F 32 99 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 957+ CF22 21 53 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 958+ CF25 CD C0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 959+ CF28 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 960+ CF2B 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)
 961+ CF2E 32 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 962+ CF31 21 59 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 963+ CF34 CD C0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 964+ CF37 32 9C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 965+ CF3A 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)
 966+ CF3D 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 967+ CF40 C9                                   ret
 968+ CF41              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 969+ CF41                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm

   1++D099              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D099              CopyResultToScaled:

   3++D099 3A 98 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D09C 32 92 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D09F                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D09F 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D0A2 32 94 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a

 974+ D0AC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 975+ D0AC                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D0AC              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D0AC              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D0AC              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D0AC              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D0AC              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D0AC              ;;; R = T
   7++D0AC              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D0AC              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D0AC              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D0AC              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D0AC              ;;; R = T
  12++D0AC              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D0AC
  14++D0AC
  15++D0AC
  16++D0AC
  17++D0AC
  18++D0AC              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D0AC ~            						mul
  20++D0AC ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D0AC              						ENDM
  22++D0AC              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D0AC 3A 98 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D0AF                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D0AF A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D0B0 CA CD D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D0B3 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D0B4 3A 92 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D0B7 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D0B8                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D0B8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D0B9 CA CD D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D0BC ED 30        		mul
  30++D0BE 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D0BF 3A 99 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D0C2 21 93 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D0C5 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D0C6 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D0C8 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D0CA C3 D1 D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D0CD              dotxskipzero:
  38++D0CD AF                   xor         a
  39++D0CE 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D0CF FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D0D1              dotmuly:
  42++D0D1              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D0D1 3A 9A C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D0D4                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D0D4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D0D5 CA F4 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D0D8 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D0D9 3A 94 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D0DC                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D0DC A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D0DD CA F4 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D0E0 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D0E1 ED 30                mul
  50++D0E3 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D0E4 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D0E6 3A 9B C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D0E9 21 95 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D0EC AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D0ED E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D0EF DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D0F1 C3 F8 D0             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D0F4              dotyskipzero:
  59++D0F4 AF                   xor         a
  60++D0F5 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D0F6 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D0F8              dotaddxy:
  63++D0F8              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D0F8 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D0FA 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D0FB 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D0FD 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D0FE FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D100 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D101 CD A2 AC             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D104 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D105 3A 9C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D108                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D108 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D109 CA 2E D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D10C 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D10D 3A 96 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D110                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D110 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D111 CA 2E D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D114 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D115 ED 30                mul
  79++D117 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D118 3A 97 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D11B 21 9D C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D11E AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D11F E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D121 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D122 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D123 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D124 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D126 CD A2 AC             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D129 32 08 9E             ld          (varS),a
  90++D12C 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D12D C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D12E              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D12E 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D12F 32 08 9E             ld          (varS),a
  95++D132 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D133 C9                   ret
  97++D134              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D134              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D134              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D134              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D134              ;;;;		mul
 104++D134              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D134              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D134              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D134              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D134              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D134              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D134              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D134              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D134              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D134              ;;;;       mul
 117++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D134              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D134              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D134              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D134              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D134              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D134              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D134              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D134              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D134              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D134              ;;;;       mul
 132++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D134              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D134              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D134              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D134              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D134              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D134              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D134              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D134              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D134
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 976+ D134              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 977+ D134              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 978+ D134                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D134              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D134              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D134              ScaleNormal:
   4++D134              LL93:
   5++D134 3A 0D 9E             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D137 DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D139 3A 96 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D13C DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D13E F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D13F              ScaleLoop:
  11++D13F              LL933:
  12++D13F 21 92 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D142 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D144 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D145 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D146 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D148 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D149 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D14A CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D14C 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D14D DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D14F F2 3F D1             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D152 C9                   ret
  24++D153
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 979+ D153              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 980+ D153                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D153              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D153              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D153 3A 2D C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D156 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D157              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D157 3A 8D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D15A 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D15B                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D15B A7          >                        and     a
   8++D15C C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D15D              LL90Loop:
  10++D15D              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D15D 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D15E                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D15E 2A 89 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D161 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D163 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D165 22 89 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D168                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D168 2A 86 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D16B CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D16D CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D16F 22 86 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D172                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D172 2A 8C C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D175 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D177 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D179 22 8C C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D17C 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D17D                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D17D A7          >                        and     a
  16++D17E C2 5D D1    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D181 C9                   ret
  18++D182
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 981+ D182              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 982+ D182
 983+ D182              ; Backface cull
 984+ D182              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 985+ D182              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 986+ D182              ;
 987+ D182
 988+ D182                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D182 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D183 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D184 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D186 32 93 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D189 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D18A CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D18C 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D18D E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D18F 32 95 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D192 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D193 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D195 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D197 32 97 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D19A 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D19B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D19C 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D19F 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D1A0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D1A1 32 94 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D1A4 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D1A5 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D1A6 32 96 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D1A9 C9                                   ret
  24++D1AA
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 989+ D1AA                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D1AA 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D1AB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D1AC E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D1AE 32 99 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D1B1 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D1B2 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D1B4 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D1B5 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D1B7 32 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D1BA 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D1BB CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D1BD E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D1BF 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D1C2 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D1C3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D1C4 32 98 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D1C7 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D1C8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D1C9 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D1CC 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D1CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D1CE 32 9C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D1D1 C9                                   ret
  24++D1D2
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 990+ D1D2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 991+ D1D2              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 992+ D1D2              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 993+ D1D2              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 994+ D1D2              ; return if no faces
 995+ D1D2              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 996+ D1D2              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 997+ D1D2              ; While Z hi <> 0
 998+ D1D2              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 999+ D1D2              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
1000+ D1D2              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
1001+ D1D2              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
1002+ D1D2              ; Loop
1003+ D1D2              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
1004+ D1D2              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
1005+ D1D2              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
1006+ D1D2              ; For each face
1007+ D1D2              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
1008+ D1D2              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
1009+ D1D2              ;        Get Face data into XX12
1010+ D1D2              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
1011+ D1D2              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
1012+ D1D2              ;        else
1013+ D1D2              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
1014+ D1D2              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
1015+ D1D2              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
1016+ D1D2              ;           While X >= 0
1017+ D1D2              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
1018+ D1D2              ;              if  x >= 0
1019+ D1D2              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
1020+ D1D2              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1021+ D1D2              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1022+ D1D2              ;           loop
1023+ D1D2              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
1024+ D1D2              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1025+ D1D2              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1026+ D1D2              ;               X = 1
1027+ D1D2              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1028+ D1D2              ;           else
1029+ D1D2              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
1030+ D1D2              ;           endif
1031+ D1D2              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
1032+ D1D2              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1033+ D1D2              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1034+ D1D2              ;               X = 1
1035+ D1D2              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1036+ D1D2              ;           else
1037+ D1D2              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
1038+ D1D2              ;           endif
1039+ D1D2              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
1040+ D1D2              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1041+ D1D2              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1042+ D1D2              ;               X = 1
1043+ D1D2              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1044+ D1D2              ;           else
1045+ D1D2              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
1046+ D1D2              ;           endif
1047+ D1D2              ;        endif
1048+ D1D2              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
1049+ D1D2              ;        if dot product < 0
1050+ D1D2              ;           set face visible
1051+ D1D2              ;        else
1052+ D1D2              ;           set face invisible
1053+ D1D2              ;        end if
1054+ D1D2              ;     else
1055+ D1D2              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
1056+ D1D2              ;     end if
1057+ D1D2              ; Next Face
1058+ D1D2
1059+ D1D2 DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
1060+ D1D4 F8                                   ret     m
1061+ D1D5 21 92 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
1062+ D1D8 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
1063+ D1DA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
1064+ D1DB 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
1065+ D1DC CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
1066+ D1DE 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
1067+ D1DF 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
1068+ D1E0 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1069+ D1E2 C3 D2 D1                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
1070+ D1E5 C9                                   ret
1071+ D1E6
1072+ D1E6 21 86 C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
1073+ D1E9 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
1074+ D1EB 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
1075+ D1EC 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
1076+ D1ED CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
1077+ D1EF 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
1078+ D1F0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
1079+ D1F1 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1080+ D1F3 C9                                   ret
1081+ D1F4
1082+ D1F4              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
1083+ D1F4
1084+ D1F4              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
1085+ D1F4              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
1086+ D1F4              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
1087+ D1F4              ;
1088+ D1F4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1089+ D1F4              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
1090+ D1F4              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
1091+ D1F4              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
1092+ D1F4              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
1093+ D1F4
1094+ D1F4              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
1095+ D1F4 21 4D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1096+ D1F7 CD 03 95                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1097+ D1FA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1098+ D1FB 7D                                   ld      a,l
1099+ D1FC B0                                   or      b
1100+ D1FD 32 99 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1101+ D200 7D                                   ld      a,l
1102+ D201 32 98 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1103+ D204
1104+ D204 21 53 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1105+ D207 CD 03 95                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1106+ D20A 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1107+ D20B 7D                                   ld      a,l
1108+ D20C B0                                   or      b
1109+ D20D 32 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1110+ D210 7D                                   ld      a,l
1111+ D211 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1112+ D214
1113+ D214 21 59 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1114+ D217 CD 03 95                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1115+ D21A 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1116+ D21B 7D                                   ld      a,l
1117+ D21C B0                                   or      b
1118+ D21D 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1119+ D220 7D                                   ld      a,l
1120+ D221 32 9C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1121+ D224 C9                                   ret
1122+ D225
1123+ D225                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D225 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D226              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D226              ; EE29:
   4++D226
   5++D226              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D226              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D226              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D226              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D226              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D226              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D226              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D226              ;
  13++D226              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D226              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D226              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D226              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D226              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D226              ;
  19++D226              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D226              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D226              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D226              ;
  23++D226              ; so
  24++D226              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D226              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D226              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D226              ;
  28++D226              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D226              ;
  30++D226              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D226              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D226              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D226              ;
  34++D226
  35++D226
  36++D226
  37++D226 3A 8D C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D229                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D229 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D22A CA 56 D2    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  39++D22D 2A 86 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D230 ED 5B 89 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D234 ED 4B 8C C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D238 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D23A                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D23A CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D23C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D23E                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D23E CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D240 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D242                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D242 CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D244 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D246 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D247                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D247 A7          >                        and     a
  47++D248 C2 38 D2    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D24B 22 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D24E ED 53 89 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D252 ED 43 8C C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D256 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D258 32 0D 9E                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D25B C9                                   ret

  63++D25C              ;;--                       ; break

  77++D25C              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl

  90++D25C              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible

  96++D25C              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D25C              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D25C              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D25C              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a

 101++D25C              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D25C              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a

 105++D25C              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D25C              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well

 108++D25C              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled

 295++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a

 300++D25C              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D25C              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D25C              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
