 307++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D25C              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D25C              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D25C              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D25C              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D25C              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D25C              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D25C              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D25C              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D25C              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D25C              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D25C              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D25C              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D25C              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D25C              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D25C              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D25C              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D25C              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D25C              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D25C              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D25C              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D25C              ;;;;;
 333++D25C
 334++D25C
 335++D25C
 336++D25C 3A 18 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 337++D25F E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 338++D261 20 44                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 339++D263 2A 16 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 340++D266 7C                                   ld      a,h
 341++D267                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 341++D267 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 341++D269 D2 A7 D2    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 342++D26C ED 5B 10 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 343++D270 CD 80 B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 344++D273 38 32                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 345++D275 ED 5B 13 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 346++D279 CD 80 B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 347++D27C 38 29                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 348++D27E              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 348++D27E CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348++D280 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349++D282                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 349++D282 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D284 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D286                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D286 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D288 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D28A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 352++D28B CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 353++D28D              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 353++D28D C2 AD D2    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 354++D290                                      ; Check visbility distance
 355++D290              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 356++D290 7D                                   ld      a,l
 357++D291 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 358++D292 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 359++D294 CB 3F                                srl     a
 360++D296 CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D298 32 42 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 362++D29B 3A 43 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 363++D29E F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
 364++D2A0 E6 F7                                and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
 365++D2A2 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 366++D2A5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 366++D2A5 B7          >                        or a
 367++D2A6 C9                                   ret
 368++D2A7              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 368++D2A7 21 43 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 368++D2AA CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 369++D2AC C9                                   ret
 370++D2AD 3A 43 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 371++D2B0 F6 48                                or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 372++D2B2 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 373++D2B5 C9                                   ret
 374++D2B6
 375++D2B6
 376++D2B6              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 377++D2B6              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 377++D2B6 3A 27 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 377++D2B9 A7          >                        and a
 377++D2BA C8          >                        ret    z
 378++D2BB                                     ; break
 379++D2BB CD 5D CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 380++D2BE CD 97 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 381++D2C1 CD B0 CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 382++D2C4                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 383++D2C4 3A 2D C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 384++D2C7 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 385++D2C9              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 386++D2C9 CD 26 D2                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 387++D2CC CD C9 CF                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 388++D2CF CD EE 95     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 389++D2D2 CD 41 CF                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 390++D2D5 21 ED C4     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 391++D2D8 22 09 9D                             ld      (varV),hl
 392++D2DB 3A 27 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 393++D2DE CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 394++D2E0 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 395++D2E2 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 396++D2E3 AF                                   xor     a
 397++D2E4 32 25 D2                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 398++D2E7 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 399++D2E8 C5                                   push    bc
 400++D2E9 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 401++D2EA E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 402++D2EC E5                                   push    hl
 403++D2ED 21 42 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 404++D2F0 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 405++D2F1 E1                                   pop     hl
 406++D2F2 DA 37 D4                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 407++D2F5              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 408++D2F5 CD AA D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 409++D2F8 3A 0D 9E                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 410++D2FB 47                                   ld      b,a
 411++D2FC                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 411++D2FC FE 04       >                        cp      4
 411++D2FE DA 39 D3    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 412++D301 CD 8B CF     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 413++D304 C3 C8 D3                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 414++D307 3A 86 C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 415++D30A CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 416++D30C 32 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 417++D30F 3A 8C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 418++D312 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 419++D314 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 420++D317 3A 89 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 421++D31A CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 422++D31C 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 423++D31F 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 424++D321                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 424++D321 3A 92 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 424++D324 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 424++D326 32 92 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 425++D329                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 425++D329 3A 94 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 425++D32C CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 425++D32E 32 94 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 426++D331                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 426++D331 3A 96 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 426++D334 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 426++D336 32 96 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 427++D339              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 428++D339              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 429++D339 CD 66 CF                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 430++D33C 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 431++D33D FA 5C D3                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 432++D340              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 432++D340 3A 92 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 432++D343 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 432++D345 32 92 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 433++D348                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 433++D348 3A 94 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 433++D34B CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 433++D34D 32 94 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 434++D350                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 434++D350 3A 96 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 434++D353 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 434++D355 32 96 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 435++D358 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 436++D359 F2 40 D3                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 437++D35C              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 438++D35C              ; Add normal to XX15
 439++D35C              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 440++D35C              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 441++D35C              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 442++D35C              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 443++D35C              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 443++D35C 3A 96 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 443++D35F 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 444++D362                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 444++D362 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 444++D365 32 08 9E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 445++D368                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 445++D368 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 445++D36B 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 446++D36E 3A 8E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 447++D371 CD C9 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 448++D374 DA 07 D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 449++D377 32 96 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 450++D37A                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 450++D37A 3A 08 9E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 450++D37D 32 97 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 451++D380                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 451++D380 3A 92 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 451++D383 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 452++D386                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 452++D386 3A 99 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 452++D389 32 08 9E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 453++D38C                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 453++D38C 3A 86 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 453++D38F 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454++D392 3A 88 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 455++D395 CD C9 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 456++D398 DA 07 D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 457++D39B 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 458++D39E                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 458++D39E 3A 08 9E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 458++D3A1 32 93 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 459++D3A4                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 459++D3A4 3A 94 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 459++D3A7 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 460++D3AA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 460++D3AA 3A 9B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 460++D3AD 32 08 9E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 461++D3B0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 461++D3B0 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 461++D3B3 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 462++D3B6 3A 8B C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 463++D3B9 CD C9 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 464++D3BC DA 07 D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 465++D3BF 32 94 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 466++D3C2                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 466++D3C2 3A 08 9E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 466++D3C5 32 95 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 467++D3C8              ; calculate dot product LL89
 468++D3C8              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 468++D3C8 3A 98 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 468++D3CB 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 469++D3CE 3A 92 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 470++D3D1 CD 30 B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 471++D3D4 32 22 9E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 472++D3D7 3A 99 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 473++D3DA 21 93 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 474++D3DD AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 475++D3DE 32 08 9E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 476++D3E1                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 476++D3E1 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 476++D3E4 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 477++D3E7 3A 94 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 478++D3EA CD 30 B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 479++D3ED 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 480++D3F0                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 480++D3F0 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 480++D3F3 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 481++D3F6 3A 9B C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 482++D3F9 21 95 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 483++D3FC AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 484++D3FD CD C9 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 485++D400 32 22 9E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 486++D403                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 486++D403 3A 9C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 486++D406 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 487++D409 3A 96 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 488++D40C CD 30 B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 489++D40F 32 06 9E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 490++D412                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 490++D412 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 490++D415 32 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 491++D418 3A 97 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 492++D41B 21 9D C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 493++D41E AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 494++D41F CD C9 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 495++D422 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 496++D424 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 497++D426 3A 08 9E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 498++D429 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 499++D42C 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 500++D42E 3A 25 D2     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 501++D431 CD 71 CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 502++D434 C3 3D D4                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 503++D437 3A 25 D2     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 504++D43A CD 68 CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 505++D43D 21 25 D2     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 506++D440 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 507++D441 C1                                   pop         bc
 508++D442 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 509++D443 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 510++D445 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 511++D447 22 09 9D                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 512++D44A 05                                   dec         b
 513++D44B C2 E7 D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 514++D44E C9                                   ret
 515++D44F
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
1124+ D44F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1125+ D44F              ; Process edges
1126+ D44F              ; .....................................................
1127+ D44F              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
1128+ D44F ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1129+ D44F ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1130+ D44F ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1131+ D44F ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1132+ D44F ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1133+ D44F ~            NodeXPositive\1
1133+ D44F ~
1134+ D44F ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1135+ D44F ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1136+ D44F ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1137+ D44F ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1138+ D44F ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1139+ D44F ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1140+ D44F ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1141+ D44F ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1142+ D44F ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
1143+ D44F ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1144+ D44F ~            NodeNegative\1
1144+ D44F ~
1145+ D44F ~            LL52\1
1145+ D44F ~                                                              ;
1146+ D44F ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
1147+ D44F ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
1148+ D44F ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1149+ D44F ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1150+ D44F ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1151+ D44F ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
1151+ D44F ~
1152+ D44F ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1153+ D44F ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1154+ D44F ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1155+ D44F ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1156+ D44F ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1157+ D44F ~            SetAndMop\1
1157+ D44F ~
1158+ D44F ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1159+ D44F ~            FinishedThisNode\1
1160+ D44F                                  ENDM
1161+ D44F
1162+ D44F              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1163+ D44F
1164+ D44F              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
1165+ D44F                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1165+ D44F 3A 12 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
1165+ D452 32 94 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
1166+ D455 ED 4B 98 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1167+ D459 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1168+ D45A FA 70 D4             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1169+ D45D              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1170+ D45D              NodeXPositiveX:
1171+ D45D 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1172+ D45E 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1173+ D460 2A 10 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1174+ D463 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1175+ D465 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1176+ D466 22 92 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1177+ D469 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1178+ D46A 32 94 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1179+ D46D C3 8C D4             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
1180+ D470              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1181+ D470              NodeNegativeX:
1182+ D470              LL52X:                                                 ;
1183+ D470 2A 10 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
1184+ D473 ED 4B 98 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
1185+ D477 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1186+ D479 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1187+ D47B F2 89 D4             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1188+ D47E              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
1189+ D47E              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1190+ D47E CD 96 B3             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1191+ D481 3A 94 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1192+ D484 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1193+ D486 32 94 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1194+ D489              SetAndMopX:
1195+ D489 22 10 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1196+ D48C              FinishedThisNodeX:
1197+ D48C
1198+ D48C              LL53:
1199+ D48C
1200+ D48C                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1200+ D48C 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKysgn)
1200+ D48F 32 97 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkYPointSign),a
1201+ D492 ED 4B 9A C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1202+ D496 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1203+ D497 FA AD D4             jp          m,NodeNegativeY                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1204+ D49A              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1205+ D49A              NodeXPositiveY:
1206+ D49A 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1207+ D49B 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1208+ D49D 2A 13 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1209+ D4A0 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1210+ D4A2 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1211+ D4A3 22 95 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1212+ D4A6 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1213+ D4A7 32 94 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1214+ D4AA C3 C9 D4             jp          FinishedThisNodeY
1215+ D4AD              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1216+ D4AD              NodeNegativeY:
1217+ D4AD              LL52Y:                                                 ;
1218+ D4AD 2A 13 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
1219+ D4B0 ED 4B 9A C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
1220+ D4B4 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1221+ D4B6 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1222+ D4B8 F2 C6 D4             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1223+ D4BB              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
1224+ D4BB              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1225+ D4BB CD 96 B3             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1226+ D4BE 3A 97 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1227+ D4C1 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1228+ D4C3 32 97 C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1229+ D4C6              SetAndMopY:
1230+ D4C6 22 13 C0             ld          (UBnKylo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1231+ D4C9              FinishedThisNodeY:
1232+ D4C9
1233+ D4C9
1234+ D4C9              TransposeZ:
1235+ D4C9              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
1236+ D4C9 3A 9D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
1237+ D4CC                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
1237+ D4CC CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1237+ D4CE C2 E2 D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
1238+ D4D1 3A 9C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
1239+ D4D4 2A 16 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
1240+ D4D7 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
1241+ D4D9 7D                   ld          a,l
1242+ D4DA 32 22 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
1243+ D4DD 7C                   ld          a,h
1244+ D4DE 32 05 9E             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
1245+ D4E1 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
1246+ D4E2              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1247+ D4E2              NegativeNodeZ:
1248+ D4E2              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1249+ D4E2 2A 16 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1250+ D4E5 ED 4B 9C C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
1251+ D4E9 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
1252+ D4EB                      ClearCarryFlag
1252+ D4EB B7          >                        or a
1253+ D4EC ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1254+ D4EE 7D                   ld          a,l
1255+ D4EF 32 22 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1256+ D4F2 7C                   ld          a,h
1257+ D4F3 32 05 9E             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1258+ D4F6 E2 03 D5             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1259+ D4F9              LL56Overflow:
1260+ D4F9 FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1261+ D4FB 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1262+ D4FD 3A 22 9E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1263+ D500                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1263+ D500 FE 04       >                        cp    4
1263+ D502 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1264+ D503              MakeNodeClose:
1265+ D503              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1266+ D503 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1267+ D504 32 05 9E             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1268+ D507 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1269+ D509 32 22 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1270+ D50C C9                   ret
1271+ D50D              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1272+ D50D              ProcessVisibleNode:
1273+ D50D              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1274+ D50D CD 10 CF             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1275+ D510              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1276+ D510              TransposeNode:
1277+ D510 CD 4F D4             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1278+ D513
1279+ D513              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1280+ D513              NodeAdditionsDone:
1281+ D513              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1282+ D513              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1283+ D513 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1284+ D516 21 93 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1285+ D519 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1286+ D51A 21 96 C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1287+ D51D B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1288+ D51E              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1289+ D51E 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1290+ D520              DivideXYZBy2:
1291+ D520                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1291+ D520 2A 92 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1291+ D523 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1291+ D525 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1291+ D527 22 92 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1292+ D52A                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1292+ D52A 2A 95 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1292+ D52D CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1292+ D52F CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1292+ D531 22 95 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1293+ D534 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1294+ D537 67                   ld          h,a
1295+ D538 3A 22 9E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1296+ D53B 6F                   ld          l,a
1297+ D53C                      ShiftHLRight1
1297+ D53C CB 3C       >			   srl h
1297+ D53E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1298+ D540 7C                   ld          a,h
1299+ D541 32 05 9E             ld          (varU),a
1300+ D544 7D                   ld          a,l
1301+ D545 32 22 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1302+ D548 C3 13 D5             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1303+ D54B              NodeScalingDone:
1304+ D54B              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1305+ D54B              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1306+ D54B                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1306+ D54B 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1306+ D54E 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1307+ D551 3A 92 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1308+ D554 21 06 9E             ld          hl,varQ
1309+ D557 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1310+ D558                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1310+ D558 DA 61 D5    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1311+ D55B CD D0 B7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1312+ D55E C3 69 D5             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1313+ D561              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1314+ D561              LL69:
1315+ D561              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1316+ D561              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1317+ D561              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1318+ D561 47                   ld      b,a
1319+ D562 CD A1 B1             call    DIV16UNDOC
1320+ D565 79                   ld      a,c
1321+ D566 32 07 9E             ld      (varR),a
1322+ D569               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1323+ D569              SkipSmallAngle:
1324+ D569              ScaleX:
1325+ D569              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1326+ D569 3A 94 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1327+ D56C                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1327+ D56C CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1327+ D56E C2 81 D5    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1328+ D571              ; ......................................................
1329+ D571              PositiveXPoint:
1330+ D571 3A 07 9E             ld          a,(varR)
1331+ D574 6F                   ld          l,a
1332+ D575 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)
1333+ D578 67                   ld          h,a
1334+ D579 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1335+ D57B ED 31                add         hl,a
1336+ D57D EB                   ex          de,hl
1337+ D57E C3 91 D5             jp          StoreXPoint
1338+ D581              NegativeXPoint:
1339+ D581              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1340+ D581 3A 07 9E             ld          a,(varR)
1341+ D584 6F                   ld          l,a
1342+ D585 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)
1343+ D588 67                   ld          h,a
1344+ D589 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1345+ D58B 06 00                ld          b,0
1346+ D58D                      ClearCarryFlag
1346+ D58D B7          >                        or a
1347+ D58E ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1348+ D590 EB                   ex          de,hl
1349+ D591              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1350+ D591 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1351+ D594 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1352+ D597 FD 23                inc         iy
1353+ D599 FD 23                inc         iy
1354+ D59B              ; ......................................................
1355+ D59B              LL66:
1356+ D59B              ProcessYPoint:
1357+ D59B AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1358+ D59C 32 05 9E             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1359+ D59F                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1359+ D59F 3A 22 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1359+ D5A2 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1360+ D5A5 3A 95 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1361+ D5A8 21 06 9E             ld          hl,varQ
1362+ D5AB BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1363+ D5AC                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1363+ D5AC DA B5 D5    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1364+ D5AF              SmallYPoint:
1365+ D5AF CD D0 B7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1366+ D5B2 C3 B8 D5             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1367+ D5B5              SmallYHop:
1368+ D5B5              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1369+ D5B5 CD AD B7             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1370+ D5B8              SkipYScale:
1371+ D5B8              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1372+ D5B8 3A 97 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1373+ D5BB CB 7F                bit         7,a
1374+ D5BD C2 D0 D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1375+ D5C0              PositiveYPoint:
1376+ D5C0 3A 07 9E             ld          a,(varR)
1377+ D5C3 6F                   ld          l,a
1378+ D5C4 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)
1379+ D5C7 67                   ld          h,a
1380+ D5C8 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1381+ D5CA ED 31                add         hl,a
1382+ D5CC EB                   ex          de,hl
1383+ D5CD C3 E0 D5             jp          LL50
1384+ D5D0              NegativeYPoint:
1385+ D5D0              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1386+ D5D0 3A 07 9E             ld          a,(varR)
1387+ D5D3 6F                   ld          l,a
1388+ D5D4 3A 05 9E             ld          a,(varU)
1389+ D5D7 67                   ld          h,a
1390+ D5D8 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1391+ D5DA 06 00                ld          b,0
1392+ D5DC                      ClearCarryFlag
1392+ D5DC B7          >                        or a
1393+ D5DD ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1394+ D5DF EB                   ex          de,hl
1395+ D5E0              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1396+ D5E0 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1397+ D5E3 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1398+ D5E6 FD 23                inc         iy
1399+ D5E8 FD 23                inc         iy
1400+ D5EA C9                   ret
1401+ D5EB              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1402+ D5EB              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1403+ D5EB              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1404+ D5EB              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1405+ D5EB              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1406+ D5EB              CopyNodeToXX15:
1407+ D5EB                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1407+ D5EB 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1407+ D5EC 32 92 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1408+ D5EF 23                   inc         hl
1409+ D5F0                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1409+ D5F0 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1409+ D5F1 32 94 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1410+ D5F4 23                   inc         hl
1411+ D5F5                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1411+ D5F5 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1411+ D5F6 32 96 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1412+ D5F9 23                   inc         hl
1413+ D5FA              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1414+ D5FA              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1415+ D5FA 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1416+ D5FB 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1417+ D5FC 47                   ld          b,a
1418+ D5FD E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1419+ D5FF 32 93 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1420+ D602 78                   ld          a,b
1421+ D603 E6 40                and         $40
1422+ D605 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1423+ D607 32 95 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1424+ D60A 78                   ld          a,b
1425+ D60B E6 20                and         $20
1426+ D60D CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1427+ D60F CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1428+ D611 32 97 C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1429+ D614 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1430+ D615 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1431+ D617 32 22 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1432+ D61A C9                   ret
1433+ D61B
1434+ D61B              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1435+ D61B              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1436+ D61B              ;..............................................................................................................................
1437+ D61B              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1438+ D61B              LL48GetScale:
1439+ D61B 3A F5 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1440+ D61E 5F                   ld          e,a
1441+ D61F CD EB D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1442+ D622              LL48GetVertices:
1443+ D622              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1444+ D622                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1444+ D622 BB          >                        cp      e
1444+ D623 DA 60 D6    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1445+ D626              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1446+ D626                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1446+ D626 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1446+ D627 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1446+ D628 32 04 9D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1447+ D62B 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1448+ D62C E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1449+ D62E E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1450+ D62F                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1450+ D62F 21 BE C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1450+ D632 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1450+ D634 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1451+ D635 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1452+ D636                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1452+ D636 A7          >                        and     a
1452+ D637 C2 66 D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1453+ D63A              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1454+ D63A 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1455+ D63B ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1456+ D63D E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1457+ D63F                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1457+ D63F A7          >                        and     a
1457+ D640 C2 66 D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1458+ D643              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1459+ D643                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1459+ D643 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1459+ D644 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1459+ D645 32 04 9D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1460+ D648 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1461+ D649 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1462+ D64B E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1463+ D64C                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1463+ D64C 21 BE C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1463+ D64F ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1463+ D651 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1464+ D652 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1465+ D653                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1465+ D653 A7          >                        and     a
1465+ D654 C2 66 D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1466+ D657              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1467+ D657 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1468+ D658 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1469+ D65A E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1470+ D65C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1470+ D65C A7          >                        and     a
1470+ D65D C2 66 D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1471+ D660              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1472+ D660 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1473+ D663 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1474+ D665                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1475+ D665 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1476+ D666              NodeIsVisible:
1477+ D666              LL49:
1478+ D666 CD 0D D5             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1479+ D669 C9                   ret
1480+ D66A
1481+ D66A
1482+ D66A              ProjectNodeToEye:
1483+ D66A ED 4B 96 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1484+ D66E 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1485+ D66F 32 06 9E     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1486+ D672 3A 92 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1487+ D675 CD 8A B1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1488+ D678 3A 93 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1489+ D67B                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1489+ D67B CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1489+ D67D C2 88 D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1490+ D680              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1491+ D680 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1492+ D682 26 00            ld          h,0
1493+ D684 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1494+ D685 C3 8F D6         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1495+ D688              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1496+ D688 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1497+ D68A 26 00            ld          h,0
1498+ D68C                  ClearCarryFlag
1498+ D68C B7          >                        or a
1499+ D68D ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1500+ D68F              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1501+ D68F EB               ex          de,hl
1502+ D690 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1503+ D693 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1504+ D696              EyeProcessYPoint:
1505+ D696 ED 4B 96 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1506+ D69A 79           	ld			a,c
1507+ D69B 32 06 9E     	ld			(varQ),a
1508+ D69E 3A 94 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1509+ D6A1 CD 8A B1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1510+ D6A4 3A 95 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1511+ D6A7                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1511+ D6A7 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1511+ D6A9 C2 B4 D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1512+ D6AC              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1513+ D6AC 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1514+ D6AE                  ClearCarryFlag
1514+ D6AE B7          >                        or a
1515+ D6AF ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1516+ D6B1 C3 B9 D6         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1517+ D6B4              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1518+ D6B4 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1519+ D6B6 26 00            ld          h,0
1520+ D6B8 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1521+ D6B9              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1522+ D6B9 EB               ex          de,hl
1523+ D6BA FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1524+ D6BD FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1525+ D6C0 C9               ret
1526+ D6C1
1527+ D6C1
1528+ D6C1
1529+ D6C1              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1530+ D6C1              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1531+ D6C1              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1532+ D6C1              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1533+ D6C1              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1534+ D6C1              ; which can be simplified as:
1535+ D6C1              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1536+ D6C1              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1537+ D6C1              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1538+ D6C1              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1539+ D6C1              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1540+ D6C1              ;      Roll calculations:
1541+ D6C1              ;
1542+ D6C1              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1543+ D6C1              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1544+ D6C1              ;      Pitch calculations:
1545+ D6C1              ;
1546+ D6C1              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1547+ D6C1              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1548+ D6C1
1549+ D6C1
1550+ D6C1              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1551+ D6C1                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D6C1
   2++D6C1              ; Full version
   3++D6C1              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D6C1              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D6C1              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D6C1              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D6C1
   8++D6C1
   9++D6C1              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D6C1             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D6C1 3A 1C 9D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D6C4 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D6C7             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D6C7 2A 27 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D6CA 22 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D6CD             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D6CD 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D6D0 32 04 9D    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D6D3 3A 26 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D6D6 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D6D8 CD E0 AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D6DB ED 53 27 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D6DF             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D6DF 2A 25 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D6E2 22 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D6E5 3A 28 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D6E8 CD E0 AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D6EB ED 53 25 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D6EF C9                                   ret
  11++D6F0              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++D6F0             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++D6F0 3A 1C 9D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++D6F3 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++D6F6             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++D6F6 2A 1B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++D6F9 22 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D6FC             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++D6FC 3A 19 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D6FF 32 04 9D    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++D702 3A 1A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++D705 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++D707 CD E0 AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++D70A ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++D70E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++D70E 2A 19 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D711 22 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D714 3A 1C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++D717 CD E0 AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++D71A ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++D71E C9                                   ret
  13++D71F              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++D71F             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)

  13++D722 32 06 9E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++D725             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++D725 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)

  13++D73D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++D73D 2A 1F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D740 22 07 9E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D743 3A 22 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++D746 CD E0 AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++D749 ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++D74D C9                                   ret
  15++D74E

  18++D783             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y

  20++D7CA             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++D7CA 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
