  21++D7DA C9                                   ret
  22++D7DB
  23++D7DB
  24++D7DB              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++D7DB ~                                    push    bc
  26++D7DB ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++D7DB ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++D7DB ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++D7DB ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++D7DB ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++D7DB ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++D7DB ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++D7DB ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++D7DB ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++D7DB ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++D7DB ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++D7DB ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++D7DB ~                                    pop     bc
  39++D7DB ~                                    ret
  40++D7DB ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++D7DB ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++D7DB ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++D7DB ~                                    or      a
  44++D7DB ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++D7DB ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D7DB ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++D7DB ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D7DB ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++D7DB ~                                    pop     bc
  50++D7DB ~                                    ret
  51++D7DB ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++D7DB ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++D7DB ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++D7DB ~                                    pop     bc
  55++D7DB ~                                    ret
  56++D7DB                                      ENDM
  57++D7DB
  58++D7DB
  59++D7DB              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++D7DB C5          >                        push    bc
  59++D7DC 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++D7DD 3A 12 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++D7E0 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++D7E1 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++D7E2 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++D7E3 FA F4 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++D7E6             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++D7E6 ED 5B 05 9D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++D7EA 2A 10 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D7ED 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++D7EE 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++D7F1 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++D7F2 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D7F3 C9          >                        ret
  59++D7F4             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++D7F4 ED 5B 05 9D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++D7F8 2A 10 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D7FB B7          >                        or      a
  59++D7FC ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++D7FE 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++D800 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++D801 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++D804 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++D806 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D807 C9          >                        ret
  59++D808             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++D808 AF          >                    xor a
  59++D809 95          >                    sub l
  59++D80A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++D80B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++D80C 94          >                    sub h
  59++D80D 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++D80E 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++D811 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++D812 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D813 C9          >                        ret
  60++D814
  61++D814              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++D814 C5          >                        push    bc
  61++D815 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++D816 3A 15 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++D819 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++D81A 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++D81B A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++D81C FA 2D D8    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++D81F             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++D81F ED 5B 05 9D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++D823 2A 13 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D826 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++D827 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++D82A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++D82B C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D82C C9          >                        ret
  61++D82D             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++D82D ED 5B 05 9D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++D831 2A 13 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D834 B7          >                        or      a
  61++D835 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++D837 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++D839 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++D83A 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++D83D EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++D83F C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D840 C9          >                        ret
  61++D841             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++D841 AF          >                    xor a
  61++D842 95          >                    sub l
  61++D843 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++D844 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++D845 94          >                    sub h
  61++D846 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++D847 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++D84A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++D84B C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D84C C9          >                        ret
  62++D84D
  63++D84D              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++D84D C5          >                        push    bc
  63++D84E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++D84F 3A 18 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++D852 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++D853 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++D854 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++D855 FA 66 D8    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++D858             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++D858 ED 5B 05 9D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++D85C 2A 16 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D85F 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++D860 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++D863 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++D864 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D865 C9          >                        ret
  63++D866             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++D866 ED 5B 05 9D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++D86A 2A 16 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D86D B7          >                        or      a
  63++D86E ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++D870 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++D872 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++D873 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++D876 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++D878 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D879 C9          >                        ret
  63++D87A             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++D87A AF          >                    xor a
  63++D87B 95          >                    sub l
  63++D87C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++D87D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++D87E 94          >                    sub h
  63++D87F 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++D880 22 05 9D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++D883 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++D884 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D885 C9          >                        ret
  64++D886
  65++D886              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++D886 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++D889              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++D889              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++D889              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++D889
  71++D889              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++D889              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++D889 3A 1D 9D     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++D88C 21 11 9D                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++D88F B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++D890 CA 4A D9                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++D893                                      ;break
  78++D893              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++D893 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++D894 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++D897 CD 3C AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++D89A 32 06 9D                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++D89D 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++D8A0              ; A = Flip sign
  85++D8A0 3A 1F 9D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++D8A3 21 12 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++D8A6 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++D8A7              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++D8A7 CD 14 D8                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++D8AA              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++D8AA 32 88 D8                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++D8AD 22 86 D8                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++D8B0              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++D8B0 3A 11 9D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++D8B3 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D8B4 CD 3C AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++D8B7 32 06 9D                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++D8BA 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++D8BD              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++D8BD 3A 88 D8                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++D8C0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++D8C1 3A 12 9D                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++D8C4 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++D8C5              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++D8C5 CD 4D D8                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++D8C8 32 18 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++D8CB 22 16 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++D8CE              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++D8CE 3A 11 9D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++D8D1 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++D8D2 CD 3C AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++D8D5 32 06 9D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++D8D8 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++D8DB              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++D8DB 3A 88 D8                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++D8DE 32 15 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++D8E1 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++D8E2 3A 12 9D                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++D8E5 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++D8E6 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++D8E7 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++D8EA AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++D8EB F2 FA D8                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++D8EE 2A 05 9D                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++D8F1 ED 5B 86 D8                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++D8F5 B7                                   or      a
 127++D8F6 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++D8F7 C3 14 D9                             jp      .MV44
 129++D8FA 2A 86 D8     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++D8FD ED 5B 05 9D                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++D901 B7                                   or      a
 132++D902 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++D904 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++D906                                      NegHL
 134++D906 AF          >                    xor a
 134++D907 95          >                    sub l
 134++D908 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++D909 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++D90A 94          >                    sub h
 134++D90B 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++D90C 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++D90F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++D911 32 15 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++D914              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++D914 22 13 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++D917 3A 1D 9D                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++D91A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++D91B 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++D91E CD 3C AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++D921 32 06 9D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++D924 22 04 9D                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++D927 3A 1E 9D                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++D92A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++D92B 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++D92E AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++D92F CD DB D7                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++D932 32 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++D935 22 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++D938                                      ;break
 154++D938                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++D938
 156++D938 CD C1 D6                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++D93B CD F0 D6                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++D93E CD 1F D7                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++D941 CD 4E D7                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++D944 CD 7D D7                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++D947 CD AC D7                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++D94A 3A 02 9E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++D94D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++D94F 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++D950 2A 16 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++D953 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++D956 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++D957 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++D959 CD A2 AC                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++D95C 22 16 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++D95F 32 18 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++D962 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1552+ D963                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D963              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++D963              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++D963 3A 39 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++D966 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++D967 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++D969 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++D96A 32 3F C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++D96D 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++D96E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++D970 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++D972 FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++D974 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++D976 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++D977 32 40 C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++D97A 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++D97B B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++D97C 32 39 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++D97F 21 1F C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++D982 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++D985 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++D988 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++D98B CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++D98E 21 21 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++D991 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++D994 21 27 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++D997 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++D99A CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++D99D 21 23 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++D9A0 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++D9A3 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++D9A6 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++D9A9 CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++D9AC 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++D9AF 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++D9B0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++D9B2 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++D9B3 32 3F C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++D9B6 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++D9B7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++D9B9 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++D9BA FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++D9BC 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++D9BE 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++D9BF 32 40 C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D9C2 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++D9C3 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++D9C4 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++D9C7 21 1F C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++D9CA 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++D9CD 21 19 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++D9D0 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++D9D3 CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++D9D6 21 21 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++D9D9 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  55++D9DC 21 1B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  56++D9DF 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  57++D9E2 CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  58++D9E5 21 23 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  59++D9E8 22 E9 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  60++D9EB 21 1D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  61++D9EE 22 EB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  62++D9F1 CD D9 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  63++D9F4 C9                                   ret
  64++D9F5
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1553+ D9F5                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm
   1++D9F5              SpeedMulAxis:           MACRO   speedreg, axis
   2++D9F5 ~                                    ld      e,speedreg
   3++D9F5 ~                                    ld      hl,(axis)
   4++D9F5 ~                                    ld      a,h
   5++D9F5 ~                                    ClearSignBitA
   6++D9F5 ~                                    ld      d,a
   7++D9F5 ~                                    mul     de
   8++D9F5 ~                                    ld      a,h
   9++D9F5 ~                                    SignBitOnlyA
  10++D9F5 ~                                    ld      c,a
  11++D9F5 ~                                    ld      e,d
  12++D9F5 ~                                    ld      d,0
  13++D9F5                                      ENDM
  14++D9F5
  15++D9F5              AddSpeedToVert:         MACRO   vertex
  16++D9F5 ~                                    ld      hl,(vertex)
  17++D9F5 ~                                    ld      a,(vertex+2)
  18++D9F5 ~                                    ld      b,a
  19++D9F5 ~                                    call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  20++D9F5 ~                                    ld      (vertex),hl
  21++D9F5 ~                                    ld      (vertex+2),a
  22++D9F5                                      ENDM
  23++D9F5
  24++D9F5
  25++D9F5              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  26++D9F5 3A 36 C0     ApplyShipSpeed:         ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; get speed * 4
  27++D9F8 CB 27                                sla     a
  28++D9FA CB 27                                sla     a
  29++D9FC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  30++D9FE              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  30++D9FE 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  30++D9FF 2A 25 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  30++DA02 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  30++DA03             >                        ClearSignBitA
  30++DA03 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  30++DA05 57          >                        ld      d,a
  30++DA06 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  30++DA08 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  30++DA09             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  30++DA09 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  30++DA0B 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  30++DA0C 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  30++DA0D 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  31++DA0F              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKxlo
  31++DA0F 2A 10 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  31++DA12 3A 12 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxlo+2)
  31++DA15 47          >                        ld      b,a
  31++DA16 CD 69 AC    >                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  31++DA19 22 10 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
  31++DA1C 32 12 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+2),a
  32++DA1F              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  32++DA1F FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  32++DA21 2A 27 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  32++DA24 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++DA25             >                        ClearSignBitA
  32++DA25 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  32++DA27 57          >                        ld      d,a
  32++DA28 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  32++DA2A 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++DA2B             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  32++DA2B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  32++DA2D 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  32++DA2E 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  32++DA2F 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  33++DA31              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKylo
  33++DA31 2A 13 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  33++DA34 3A 15 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKylo+2)
  33++DA37 47          >                        ld      b,a
  33++DA38 CD 69 AC    >                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  33++DA3B 22 13 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo),hl
  33++DA3E 32 15 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo+2),a
  34++DA41              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  34++DA41 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  34++DA43 2A 29 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  34++DA46 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  34++DA47             >                        ClearSignBitA
  34++DA47 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  34++DA49 57          >                        ld      d,a
  34++DA4A ED 30       >                        mul     de
  34++DA4C 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  34++DA4D             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  34++DA4D E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  34++DA4F 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  34++DA50 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  34++DA51 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  35++DA53              .AddSpeedToZ:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKzlo

  35++DA59 47          >                        ld      b,a

  36++DA63 C9                                   ret

1593+ DAD9 16 06                                ld      d,6
1594+ DADB CD BA B1                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1595+ DADE 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1596+ DADF FD 21 DC C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray

1667+ DB70 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1667+ DB72 C2 26 DB    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1668+ DB75 2A 16 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1669+ DB78 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1670+ DB79                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1670+ DB79 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1670+ DB7B DA 83 DB    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1671+ DB7E 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1672+ DB80 C3 8E DB                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1673+ DB83              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1673+ DB83 CB 25       >			   sla l
1673+ DB85 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1674+ DB87                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1674+ DB87 CB 25       >			   sla l
1674+ DB89 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1675+ DB8B                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1675+ DB8B 37          >                        scf
1676+ DB8C CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1677+ DB8E 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1678+ DB90 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1679+ DB91 3A 4B C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1680+ DB94                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1681+ DB94                                      MMUSelectMathsTables
1681+ DB94 ED 91 50 63 >                     nextreg MathsTablesMMU,    BankMathsTables
1682+ DB98 44                                   ld      b,h
1683+ DB99 CD 6F 00                             call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1684+ DB9C 57                                   ld      d,a
1685+ DB9D                                      MMUSelectROM0
1685+ DB9D ED 91 50 FF >                     nextreg EXSDOSMMU0,        BankROM
1686+ DBA1                      ELSE
1687+ DBA1 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ;
1688+ DBA1 ~                                    ld      e,0                         ;
1689+ DBA1 ~                                    call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1690+ DBA1 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1691+ DBA1                      ENDIF
1692+ DBA1                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1692+ DBA1 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1692+ DBA3 DA AB DB    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1693+ DBA6 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1694+ DBA8 C3 B7 DB                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1695+ DBAB              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1695+ DBAB CB 23       >			   sla e
1695+ DBAD CB 12       >			   rl  d
1696+ DBAF                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1696+ DBAF CB 23       >			   sla e
1696+ DBB1 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1697+ DBB3                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1697+ DBB3 CB 23       >			   sla e
1697+ DBB5 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1698+ DBB7 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1699+ DBB8 32 4C C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1700+ DBBB DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1701+ DBBD 3A 4B C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1702+ DBC0 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1703+ DBC2 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1704+ DBC4 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1705+ DBC6 21 38 DC                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1706+ DBC9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1707+ DBCB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1708+ DBCC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1709+ DBCE 3A 4B C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1710+ DBD1                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1710+ DBD1 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1710+ DBD3 CA D8 DB    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1710+ DBD6 ED 44       >                        neg
1710+ DBD8             >.DoneABSa:
1711+ DBD8 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1712+ DBDA CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1713+ DBDC CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1714+ DBDE F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1715+ DBE0 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1716+ DBE2 3A 22 C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1717+ DBE5 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1718+ DBE6 21 DC C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1719+ DBE9 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1720+ DBEB DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1721+ DBED 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1722+ DBEE 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1723+ DBEF 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1724+ DBF0 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1725+ DBF1 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1726+ DBF2 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1727+ DBF3 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1728+ DBF4 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1729+ DBF6 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1730+ DBF8                                          ;break
1731+ DBF8 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1732+ DBFA EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1733+ DBFB DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1734+ DBFD CD 40 DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1735+ DC00 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1736+ DC01                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1736+ DC01 A7          >                        and     a
1736+ DC02 C2 1D DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1737+ DC05 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1738+ DC06 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1739+ DC07 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1740+ DC08 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1741+ DC09 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1742+ DC0B CD 40 DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1743+ DC0E D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1744+ DC0F 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1745+ DC10                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1745+ DC10 A7          >                        and     a
1745+ DC11 C2 1D DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1746+ DC14 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1747+ DC15 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1748+ DC16                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1748+ DC16 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1749+ DC1A CD 66 E1                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1750+ DC1D C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1751+ DC1F FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1752+ DC21 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1753+ DC23 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1754+ DC25 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1755+ DC27 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1756+ DC29 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1757+ DC2B C9                                   ret
1758+ DC2C              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1759+ DC2C 3A 2F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1760+ DC2F CD 17 A3                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1761+ DC32                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1761+ DC32 21 43 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1761+ DC35 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1762+ DC37 C9                                   ret
1763+ DC38
1764+ DC38
1765+ DC38 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1765+ DC3C 6C 48 24 25
1766+ DC40                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1767+ DC40
1768+ DC40              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1769+ DC40              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1770+ DC40              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1771+ DC40              ; uses registers hl, de
1772+ DC40 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1773+ DC41 CD A3 A3                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1774+ DC44 E1                                   pop     hl
1775+ DC45 17                                   rla                                 ;
1776+ DC46 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1777+ DC48 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1778+ DC49 ED 30                                mul
1779+ DC4B 5A                                   ld  e,d
1780+ DC4C 16 00                                ld  d,0
1781+ DC4E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1781+ DC4E B7          >                        or a
1782+ DC4F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1783+ DC51 C9                                   ret
1784+ DC52 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1785+ DC53 ED 30                                mul
1786+ DC55 5A                                   ld  e,d
1787+ DC56 16 00                                ld  d,0
1788+ DC58                                      ClearCarryFlag
1788+ DC58 B7          >                        or a
1789+ DC59 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1790+ DC5B C9                                   ret
1791+ DC5C
1792+ DC5C              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1793+ DC5C                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1794+ DC5C C9                                   ret
1795+ DC5D
1796+ DC5D              ; ......................................................
1797+ DC5D 3A 31 C3     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1798+ DC60 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1799+ DC62 C8                                   ret     z
1800+ DC63 3A 43 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1801+ DC66 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1802+ DC68 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1803+ DC6A 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1804+ DC6D                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1804+ DC6D 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1804+ DC6F 32 41 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1805+ DC72                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1805+ DC72 AF          >                        xor      a
1805+ DC73 32 47 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1806+ DC76 32 4C C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1807+ DC79 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1808+ DC7B 32 4B C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1809+ DC7E                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1810+ DC7E C9                                   ret
1811+ DC7F
1812+ DC7F              ; in a = damage
1813+ DC7F 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1814+ DC80 3A 31 C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1815+ DC83 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1816+ DC85 C8                                   ret     z
1817+ DC86 3A 47 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1818+ DC89                                      ClearCarryFlag
1818+ DC89 B7          >                        or a
1819+ DC8A 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1820+ DC8B D2 92 DC     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1821+ DC8E CD 5D DC                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1822+ DC91 C9                                   ret
1823+ DC92 32 47 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1824+ DC95 C9                                   ret
1825+ DC96              ; need recovery for energy too
1826+ DC96              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1827+ DC96
1828+ DC96              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1829+ DC96              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1830+ DC96              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1831+ DC96              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1832+ DC96              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1833+ DC96              ;
1834+ DC96              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1835+ DC96              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1836+ DC96              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1837+ DC96              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1838+ DC96              AddLaserBeamLine:
1839+ DC96              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1840+ DC96              GetGunVertexNode:
1841+ DC96 3A 20 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1842+ DC99 21 DC C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1843+ DC9C ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1844+ DC9E FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1845+ DCA1              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1846+ DCA1 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1847+ DCA2 23                   inc         hl
1848+ DCA3 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1849+ DCA4 23                   inc         hl
1850+ DCA5 ED 43 92 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1851+ DCA9 0C                   inc         c
1852+ DCAA C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1853+ DCAB 04                   inc         b
1854+ DCAC C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1855+ DCAD              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1856+ DCAD 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1857+ DCAE 23                   inc         hl
1858+ DCAF 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1859+ DCB0 23                   inc         hl
1860+ DCB1 ED 43 94 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1861+ DCB5              SetX2PointToXX15:
1862+ DCB5 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1863+ DCB8 ED 43 96 C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1864+ DCBC 3A 16 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1865+ DCBF 4F                   ld          c,a
1866+ DCC0              SetY2PointToXX15:
1867+ DCC0 ED 43 98 C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1868+ DCC4 3A 12 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1869+ DCC7                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1869+ DCC7 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1869+ DCC9 CA D1 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1870+ DCCC              LL74DecX2:
1871+ DCCC 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1872+ DCCE 32 96 C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1873+ DCD1              LL74SkipDec:
1874+ DCD1 CD 07 CA             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1875+ DCD4 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1876+ DCD6              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1877+ DCD6 2A 09 9E             ld          hl,(varU16)
1878+ DCD9 3A 92 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1879+ DCDC 77                   ld          (hl),a
1880+ DCDD 23                   inc         hl
1881+ DCDE 3A 94 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1882+ DCE1 77                   ld          (hl),a
1883+ DCE2 23                   inc         hl
1884+ DCE3 3A 96 C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1885+ DCE6 77                   ld          (hl),a
1886+ DCE7 23                   inc         hl
1887+ DCE8 3A 98 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1888+ DCEB 77                   ld          (hl),a
1889+ DCEC FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1890+ DCEE 23                   inc         hl
1891+ DCEF FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1892+ DCF1 22 09 9E             ld          (varU16),hl
1893+ DCF4 C9                   ret
1894+ DCF5
1895+ DCF5                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
   1++DCF5              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DCF5                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DCF5              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DCF5              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DCF5 21 DC C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DCF8 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DCFA 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DCFB 11 92 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DCFE ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DD00 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DD02 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DD04 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DD06 C9                                   ret
  12++DD07
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   3++DD07                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DD07              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD07              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DD07 21 DC C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DD0A ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DD0C 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DD0D 11 96 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DD10 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DD12 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DD14 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DD16 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DD18 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   4++DD19                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DD19              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD19              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DD19 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DD19 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DD19 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DD19                                  ENDM
   7++DD19
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DD19              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DD19              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DD19               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DD19 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DD1A
  10++DD1A              PrepLines:
  11++DD1A              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DD1A
  13++DD1A              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DD1A              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DD1A              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DD1A              ;        or          8
  17++DD1A              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DD1A              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DD1A              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DD1A              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DD1A              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DD1A              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DD1A              ;
  24++DD1A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DD1A              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DD1A                      ;break
  27++DD1A                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DD1A AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DD1B 32 0E C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DD1E                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DD1E AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DD1F 32 0F C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DD22                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DD22 AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DD23 32 19 DD    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DD26 3A 24 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DD29 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DD2B FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DD2E 21 1C C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DD31 22 09 9E             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DD34                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DD34 3A 24 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DD37 32 0D 9E    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DD3A 3A 41 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DD3D                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DD3D CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DD3F CA 47 DD    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DD42 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DD44 32 41 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DD47              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DD47              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DD47              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DD47              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DD47              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DD47 21 25 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DD4A                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DD4A 22 09 9D             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DD4D 3A 1F C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DD50 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DD51              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DD51              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DD51 2A 09 9D             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DD54 E5                   push        hl
  54++DD55 FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DD57                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DD57 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DD57                      ENDIF
  58++DD57 3A F5 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DD5A 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DD5B              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DD5B FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DD5E                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DD5E BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DD5F DA B1 DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DD62              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DD62              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DD62              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DD62 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DD65 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DD66 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DD68                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DD68 21 BE C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DD6B ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DD6D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DD6E              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DD6E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DD6E A7          >                        and     a
  71++DD6F C2 83 DD    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DD72              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DD72 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DD73 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DD75 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DD77 E5                   push        hl
  77++DD78                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DD78 21 BE C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DD7B ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DD7D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DD7E E1                   pop         hl
  79++DD7F                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DD7F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DD80 CA B1 DD    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DD83              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DD83              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DD83              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DD83 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DD86 CD F5 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DD89 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DD8C CD 07 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DD8F CD 07 CA             call        ClipLine
  88++DD92 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DD94              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DD94 ED 5B 09 9E          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DD98 21 92 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DD9B                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DD9B ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DD9D ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DD9F ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DDA1 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DDA3 ED 53 09 9E          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DDA7 21 0E C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DDAA 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DDAB 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DDAC                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DDAC FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DDAE D2 C7 DD    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DDB1              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DDB1              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DDB1              LL78:
 101++DDB1 2A 09 9D             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DDB4 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DDB6 ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DDB8 22 09 9D             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DDBB 21 19 DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DDBE 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DDBF 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DDC0                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DDC0 21 0D 9E    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DDC3 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DDC4 C2 51 DD    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DDC7              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DDC7              LL81:
 111++DDC7              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DDC7 3A 0E C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DDCA CB 27                sla         a
 114++DDCC CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DDCE 32 0F C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DDD1              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DDD1 C9                   ret
 118++DDD2
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

 984  C000                  INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  36+ C010              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ C010              SBnKDataBlock:
  38+ C010                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunPosVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunPosVars.asm
   1++C010              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C010 00           SBnKxlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+0
   3++C011 00           SBnKxhi                     DB  0                       ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
   4++C012 00           SBnKxsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK+2
   5++C013 00           SBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo
   6++C014 00           SBnKyhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK+4 \ yHi
   7++C015 00           SBnKysgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +5
   8++C016 00           SBnKzlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK +6
   9++C017 00           SBnKzhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK +7
  10++C018 00           SBnKzsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +8
  11++C019 00 00        SunCompassX                 DW  0
  12++C01B 00 00        SunCompassY                 DW  0
  13++C01D
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/SunPosVars.asm
  39+ C01D                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunRotationMatrixVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunRotationMatrixVars.asm
   1++C01D              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C01D              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C01D 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C01F              SBnKrotmatSidev             equ SBnKrotmatSidevX
   5++C01F 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C021 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
   7++C023 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15
   8++C025              SBnKrotmatRoofv             equ SBnKrotmatRoofvX
   9++C025 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17
  10++C027 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +19
  11++C029 00 00        SBnKrotmatNosevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +9
  12++C02B              SBnKrotmatNosev             EQU SBnKrotmatNosevX
  13++C02B 00 00        SBnKrotmatNosevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +11
  14++C02D 00 00        SBnKrotmatNosevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +13
  15++C02F
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/SunRotationMatrixVars.asm

  53+ C07E                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunXX12Vars.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunXX12Vars.asm
   1++C07E              ;-- transmat0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C07E              ; Note XX12 comes after as some logic in normal processing uses XX15 and XX12 combines
   3++C07E 00           SBnKXX12xLo                 DB  0               ; XX12+0
   4++C07F 00           SBnKXX12xSign               DB  0               ; XX12+1
   5++C080 00           SBnKXX12yLo                 DB  0               ; XX12+2
   6++C081 00           SBnKXX12ySign               DB  0               ; XX12+3
   7++C082 00           SBnKXX12zLo                 DB  0               ; XX12+4
   8++C083 00           SBnKXX12zSign               DB  0               ; XX12+5
   9++C084 00 00 00...  SXX12Save                   DS  6
  10++C08A 00 00 00...  SXX12Save2                  DS  6
  11++C090              SXX12                       equ SBnKXX12xLo
  12++C090              varSXX12                    equ SBnKXX12xLo
  13++C090              ; Repurposed XX12 when plotting lines
  14++C090              SBnkY2                      equ SXX12+0
  15++C090              SbnKy2Lo                    equ SXX12+0
  16++C090              SBnkY2Hi                    equ SXX12+1
  17++C090              SBnkDeltaXLo                equ SXX12+2
  18++C090              SBnkDeltaXHi                equ SXX12+3
  19++C090              SBnkDeltaYLo                equ SXX12+4
